comments:
The place is absolutely fabulous! Very neat and spacious and the lovely balcony & roof terrace are a definite bonus!
I didn't meet Aafje in person as she was on a trip but it was really simple to communicate with her through email and sms, she's very easy going en helpful. Klaas, the upstairs neighbor, was also very accommodating in Aafje's absence.
This was my first experience with Airbnb and I loved it!
I definitely recommend staying at this apartment!
Beatuiful flat and well located for transport, supermarket, restaurants & bars.

Die Wohnung hat einesehr angenehme AtmosphÃ?re, traf unseren Geschmack.Sie liegt ruhig, aber so zentral, dass wir keine FahrrÃ?der mieten mussten, sondern zu FuÃü Ã?berall hinkamen.Restaurants und EinkaufsmÃ¶glichkeiten gibts auch in unmittelbarer NÃ?he. -Der schriftliche Kontakt mit Aafje war sehr nett, wir bekamen viele gut Tips, auch die Nachbarn zeigten sich freundlich und hilfsbereit.
Die Versorgung des Katers war kein Problem.

I decided to extend my stay in Amsterdam last minute and Aafje was kind enough to accommodate me that afternoon on very short notice for two nights. Her apartment is beautiful and spacious and just a block or so away from Vondelpark. The neighborhood was very nice  safe. Checking in and out were easy and very flexible. I would happily stay in this flat if I find myself in Amsterdam once again.
Everything was perfect! The apartment is superb, so is the location. You also get to know the wonderful cat Muis :) Best choice!

My friend and I had a lovely long weekend at Aafje's place, we didn't meet Aafje because she was on holiday but her neigbor let us in and was very helpful. The apartment is really perfect, big and clean and bright. It's right around the corner from both a grocery store and the tram. We also had lunch at Forno on the corner which was one of our best meals in Amsterdam.

A couple of things i wish were better was towels (we only found three towels laid out for us), a hair dryer and maybe another duvet.

We thought it was a lot of fun living with a cat, although I was worried about his health after he peed on my clothes. I'm not too squeamish about these things, but I know a lot of other people would be. While we were there he peed inside at least three times and I hope he wasn't stressed because of us. He really was a very sweet and cuddly cat.

But all in all it was really great, I would definitely book this apartment again.

The apartment was very welcoming and Aafje was very responsive. The apartment is spacious and delightful and within easy biking or public transportation to all Amsterdam sites. Grocery, restaurants, and bars are only a few minutes walk. The building has a lovely rooftop terrace for warm weather, and the surrounds were quiet. This was our first experience with an AirBnB, and we couldn't have enjoyed our stay more!

Eva heeft een zeer leuk, ruim en verlicht appartement met 2 terrasjes! De buurt is rustig en toch dichtbij een tramhalte om je te verplaatsen naar het centrum. Als je naar Amsterdam gaat is dit zeker een goede plaats om te verblijven. Eerst waren er wat complicaties omdat wij onze trip naar Amsterdam al geboekt hadden en Eva er helaas die dag niet kon zijn om ons binnen te laten. Ze heeft een goede oplossing gevonden door haar vriendin de deur te laten open doen voor ons, zij was ook perfect op tijd !

The listing was exactly as described. The furnishings are basic but completely functional. The apartment is bright and airy, and the kitchen has everything you need. The amount of space was quite nice and more than enough for one or two persons. The two balconies and rooftop were wonderful bonuses, and Caroline and Klass, Eva's friends who greeted me for her, were very responsive and gracious. My flight was delated repeatedly, and they made sure they were available. I would definitely stay here again.

We stayed at Eva's for a Long Weekend and really enjoyed her place. It is very homy and we felt welcomed. Also we came really late and the Check-In was so easy and no Problem at all, the whole communication with Eva was really easy and nice.
We liked the neighborhood a lot, it's easy too reach the inner City and there are a few nice Restaurants and bars just around the Corner.
I would definitely recommend Evas place.

Eva's place was exactly as depicted in her pictures and her description. It is in a residential area which is awesome if you want to meet the locals and hang out where the locals hang out. The tram (train) is right around the corner and takes you directly to the city centre, but if you are up for a walk it is only a 15 minute walk. This apartment was clean and beautiful and Eva was super accommodating. 5/5 stars! Definitely recommend staying here!
Perfect wonderful place in great area terrifick

We had a great time at the apartment. Aafje our host was helpful and the flat is excellent. 1 min away from the tram, close to supermarket and other stuff. The house is spacious and cozy, amazing for couples. Totally recommend it for everyone to stay there :)
The host canceled this reservation 19 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed in Aafje apartment for 3 nights. She's been very kind so I could check in when it was most convenient for me. The apartment was bigger than I expected from the pictures and very comfortable, in a nice yet quiet location. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Had the best stay ever in Amsterdam this year- the location is perfect. The apartment is lovely... if you want to stay in an authentic Amsterdam style apartment itâÄôs the right place to be. Beautiful place, relaxed area but with plenty of buzz when it comes to restaurants and bars nearby. The neighbours were so lovely too. CouldnâÄôt fault it. Hope to return again next time.

Thanks again Aafje!
A beutiful place in a quite neighborhood. Close to everything. We really enjoyed the stay.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Aafje's apartment, which was incredibly "homey", and in an excellent locationâÄîvery close to local cafes, restaurants and public transportâÄîwith plenty of space inside!

One particular item worth consideringâÄîand this is more than likely an Amsterdam/Netherlands expectation; rather than something unique to this apartment blockâÄîis the long, steep and narrow staircase(s).Â Â We travelled with heavy luggage which required both of us to navigate the staircase to and from the third floor.

Aafje's communication was excellent and responsive, and was an helpful resource for discovering local knowledge.

We would stay again if available during any subsequent visits to Amsterdam.
Avery nice apartment and good location!

The apartment was quiet, clean and has a great view on a river. It is also  close to the city centre (15 min walk or 2 stations by tram). We had a great stay in Amsterdam. Thank you for your hospitality, Stephan!

The stay in Stephan's apartment was our first experience with airbnb. So we are really thankful for his confidence. Stephan was flexible and a very friendly helpful host. Even at 6:30 in the morning he answered on our messages for an earlier check-in.
The apartment was absolut amazing and in perfect condition. The view out of the window is the highlight. It's better than a TV. ;)
The location is perfect for renting a bike. You only need 10-15min to the centrum.
I would definitely recommend this place. Thanks for the great stay.

Stephan's apartment was beautiful. The view out the main window is a great way to wake up in the morning and finish the day in the evening. It is very close to transportation that takes you anywhere you need to go.  There is a supermarket nearby to buy what ever you need.  I highly recommend Stephan and his apartment.  He was a gracious host and very helpful with information about Amsterdam.

It was a fantastic experience staying in this wonderful apartment.
Stephan was a great host, really friendly and welcoming! He was extremely gracious and helpful. He gave us a lot of useful info on Amsterdam as well as he prepared a brochure of recommendations for us with the best places to visit/eat and entertaiment that alighed perfectly with our interests.
His apartment was beautiful, modern, clean and cosy with everything that we possibly could have needed. There is a wonderful view on the nice canal with ducks and swans. Location is excellent for quality sleep as well. Definitely will be coming back to stay here again if we ever go back to Amsterdam. I highly recommend staying in this apartment. Thanks Stephan!

Very nice, bright, clean, quiet, well-kept apartment in a good location. Easy tram access to anywhere in the city, short walk to grocery stores. Perfect for two, fine for three. A little tight but manageable for the four of us. Underground parking is convenient.

Our stay at Stephan's place was great. He's an excellent host, and a really nice and good-hearted guy. Communication was fast and pleasant, with great flexibility regarding check- in and -out, and everything went absolutely smooth. The apartment is very nice, clean and convenient, with a good and positive vibe to it. It is very bright, with a great view outside and very quiet. The location in Amsterdam Oost is fantastic. Very close to the center, by walk, public transportation and bike. And Oost, with the redeveloped harbour, all it's architecture, parks, cafes and restaurants and the close-by Ijburg is a real treat, and in our experience way better and more fun then the center. And Stephan's place is the perfect spot for it to stay at. We can wholeheartedly recommend it, and like to stay there again for our next trip to Amsterdam.

Sehr netter und unkomplizierer Empfang. SchÃ¶ne, saubere Wohnung, sehr gut Anbindung an Nahverkehr (Linie 26, 3 Stationen bis Innenstadt), sehr sonnige Wohnung, schÃ¶nes Bad.
Ideal fÃ?r 3 Personen.

I booked a 2 night stay in Amsterdam as a surprise birthday present for my boyfriend. This was my first time using air bnb and i came across Stephan's apartment. Stephan was great when i enquired, answering all my emails quickly and i knew this apartment would make an amazing surprise. The apartment did not disappoint, the views were breathtaking and Stephan was very welcoming and accomadating, he even fulfilled a request of flowers and champagne made by boyfriend a couple of days before our stay. The apartment was 2 stops on the tram from the centre and in a great area. We loved it here and would most definately return and reccommend Stephan's apartment to friends and family!
The reservation was canceled 71 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Si en algun momento penso viajar y conocer Amsterdan no dude en rentar el dto de sthefan. La vista del mismo es maravilloso , su gran ventanal da al canal , sus plantas y la tranquilidad del lugar es inmejorable. Sthefan un gran anfitriÃ?n y lo ayudara en todo lo que necesite. A solo 30 minutos caminando se va al centro o 3paradas tomando el tranvia.
El dto es muy lindo , comodo , amplio .,tiene todo lo que necesitas .
(Website hidden by Airbnb) pasamos genial . Y lo recomendariamos sin dudarlo .
Oscar / Malena.
Argentina - octubre 2012

Stephan was a gracious and accommodating host from beginning to end. And what a great apartment!!! My two friends and I, weary from a long drive from Berlin that day, felt so welcomed as soon as we were greeted by Stephan. He showed us everything we needed to know around the apartment and truly made us feel like his home was now our home. He offered advice on transportation, recommendations for the area, and said to contact him at any time during our stay, if needed.
We felt relaxed and comfortable here - hooked up our i-pod to the stereo, sipped tea, and enjoyed the beautiful view from the couch. Even the cushy carpet was comfortable to lounge on. Not to mention the rain shower... what a treat!

Stephan and his home are A+++.

Thanks a million!

Hello Stephan your house is very beautiful, full of every comfort and useful accessories. I remained hours watching the rain from the view it offers your home in a very relaxing atmosphere. You have been very kind and helpful, I regret not having been able to talk to you in real time with you because of my English too narrow. the holiday despite the bad weather was ok.
thank you again!

We had an absolutely amazing time at Stephan's place. He was such a welcoming host, giving us tips on things to do and making us feel completely at home as soon as we arrived.

The apartment is stunning - the view across the canal is pure Amsterdam, while being away from the hustle and bustle of the centre. It was so easy to get around (luckily for us, as my sense of direction is awful) - just 3 tram stops from the centre, and Zeeburg has all you could need too.

We loved it so much we found it hard to leave the flat every morning - one of our favourite memories of our trip will be sitting on that sofa, watching the geese waddle past the window.

We totally recommend this place to anyone who wants to visit Amsterdam... book it! Now!

I don't want to write too much, bcz otherwise people will start to rent this place more and next time we may miss it.. But let's be honest !.
We are very happy with our choice, the place looks the same like on the photos, even better. View is just amazing, there is a big channel with swans, geese and ducks. The location nd apartment itself are peaceful and quiet, design is modern, but very cosy. Together with alive plant make you feel like in Oasis...
Everything was just great, thank you, Stephan, for this opportunity!

Stephan's apartment has great atmosphere and is really cosy - it is just like in the description, if not even better. The location is very convenient to go around Amsterdam. Overall, great value and very friendly attitude - highly recommend this place.

Stephan is welcoming, very friendly, attentive that all goes well. He takes care to provide a guide and a brochure of housing and neighborhoods. He gave us some good local places to visit. The apartment is really peacefull, a kind of green paradise which makes the experience very pleasant. Even more beautiful in real life. There are very good vibes, it's almost meditative! Quiet, spacious, super clean and perfect size for three people. Very close to the city center by tram or bike. Perfect host and perfect experience!

We spent a great vacations staing in Stephan's apartment! Apartment was very comfortable, clearn and cozy, we were feeling  like at home. It's 15 min from Central Station, very close to differents places of interest. Stephan was a great host, he was very polite, charming and always ready to help!

I came to Amsterdam to research at the International Institute for Social History, and Stephan's apartment was a short block away. The pictures do the apartment justice - what am amazing view,  and what a comfortable place to wake up in the morning and come back to in the evening.  I was able to cook and save money, though there are plenty of restaurants in the area, and Stephan was very helpful and accommodating. If I come back to Amsterdam I'll definitely stay here!

We with my wife and daughter spent several days in the apartment of Stephen, and it was an amazing time. I was in Amsterdam many times, but the first, during our stay in Amsterdam we had a feeling that we live outside the city. A delightful view of the pond, geese, regularly come on right under our window, herons, walking by the pond, seagulls - all this gives a sense of calm and a confident harmony. The apartment was absolutely everything you need for a comfortable stay, but most importantly - it was a pleasure to meet such a man as Stephen. Thank you very much for this time! I hope we will be back

Alloggio bello e pulito, collocato in un quartiere molto tranquillo e rilassante,a sole tre fermate di tram dalla stazione centrale(da dove puoi girare il centro praticamente a piedi),ben servito da supermercati e mezzi pubblici.
Stephan e' un host disponibile e cordiale,con il quale e' facile intendersi anche se non conosci l'inglese (come noi!!)
E' stata veramente dura andarsene da questo alloggio dove ci siamo sentiti come a casa nostra
Alloggio consigliatissimo per un viaggio ad amsterdam(citta' bellissima)
grazie Stephan

Just Wonderfull!

The place, the area, Stephan...we had a great moment! Many thanks again Stephan we felt at home!
Wir haben uns super wohl gefÃ?hlt. Sehr guter Gastgeber! Traumhafte Aussicht.
The reservation was canceled 42 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Es war ein super Aufenthalt.bestens weiter zu empfehlen.

Hello, Stephan! We spent a great vacations staying in your apartment! You are excellent host. Apartment was very comfortable, clean and cozy. The location is very convenient to go around Amsterdam. We liked to feed the ducks and geese on the river channel))).  Thank you very much for this time. If we come back to Amsterdam we'll definitely stay here. We highly recommend this great place.

Stephan was very helpful and welcoming. He provided all needed information and assistance to facilitate our arrival to the apartment and to make us have a pleasant stay in Amsterdam.
He provided accurate information about the apartment. It is kept it in a very good condition and fully equipped. Apartment is located in a nice and safe area within walking distance from tram station and supermarkets.

Hallo Stephan!

Der Aufenthalt war super, du bist ein toller Gastgener und die Wohnung war sauber und schÃ¶n. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr wohl gefÃ?hlt.

Wenn ich wieder nach Amsterdam komme ist das meine erste Adresse.

We stayed in Stefan's place for 3 days at the beginning of May
The apartment was very cozy, clean and the view from the living room window was amazing. The apartment was very close to central of Amsterdam with great tram connection.
Unfortunately we didn't meet Stefan but his friend Riki welcomed us on arrivals.
We had a great time in Amsterdam adn for sure nect time we will stay in Stefan's apartment again :)
Thank you so much

The apartment is like as you can see in the picture attached to the apartment description. The huge windows offer you a wonderful view when you are in the living room /kitchen area. The apartment is easy to be reached by Amsterdam Centraal Station by tram and Stephan is a kind and accomodating host. We had a huge delay with our flight and he has always been in touch with us and available to greet us when we finally got there. He has prepared an amazing leaflet full of information and suggestion of the surrounding area and how to reach the centre and main area of interest.
That was a really great experience, unfortunately too short!!

Stephan was really helpful and kept in touch before checking in. His neighbour, Riki, was really nice as well and answered whatever queries we had. The apartment was very homely and was a great place to stay. Thanks for everything.
Staphan was really helpfull  for us, he gave all the informations we needed
Stephan is a very kind host.  We felt completely at home.  His place is perfekt, close to downtown, but far enough away that it is perfectly quiet there.  We will definitely return!

Stephan was a great host!  His apartment is AMAZING.  We loved staying there.  It is his home so it has all the amenities for cooking.  The view is breathtaking from the sliding windows in the living room.  He gives great directions to get to his place from the train/airport.  It's close to everything and the metro is close to get everywhere.

The flat is exactly the way that it was described here, the view is amazing and the flat is warm and cozy. Riki (Stephan's friend) received us very well, she's really friendly and explained us everything about the flat and city. I'll stay in this place in my next trip to Amsterdam, for sure. Thanks a lot my friend.

Comfortable and beautiful. Made my first stay in Amsterdam memorable. Stephan is a lovely host, had an amazing chat and his advice about the city was invaluable. Takes no longer than 15min  to get to the main city. Highly recommended!

L'appartement est parfaitement conforme aux photos parfaitement agencÃ© et trÃ¨s joliment dÃ©corÃ©. Le quartier est trÃ¨s calme et bien situÃ© (3 arrÃªts de tramway du centre). Une super communication de la part de Stephan qui nous as faciliter notre premier voyage Airbnb !
On recommande !

non ho conosciuto il padrone di casa personalmente poiche non in Olanda ma ho comunicato in maniera semplice ed efficace con lui e la sua amica riki la quale si Ã¨ occupata del check-in e del check-out.
La casa era come descritta: pulita ordinata e dotata di tutto cio che serve per una breve/media permanenza.
si trova in un quartiere tranquillo a circa 30 minuti a piedi dalla stazione centrale.
ottimo posto per alloggiare ad Amsterdam

It was a lovely weekend at Stephan's apartment. He meet us at the tram station and everything was very easy. We could share a cup of tea and discover a charming man. His home is like you could see at the pictures: beautifully decorated, comfortable, very quiet, equipped with everything you need and lovely views to a waterway where geese and other birds are around all day.
We repeat if we will travel to Amsterdam again because the location is perfect, not so far from the city center allows you to experience Amsterdam far away the crowded streets and turistic routes.

We had a great time in Amsterdam, is a nice city. Stephan's appartment is very clean and modern, with a nice Living room where if you get sunny days the ilumination is perfect, and the views to the cannel too. The appartment is 10 min from the center by bike, is near.

Es war wirklich ein schÃ¶nes Wochenende in Amsterdam - die Wohnung ist super - der Ausblick, vor allem bei Sonne, echt toll - und Stephan ist ein toller Gastgeber! Die Lage ist auch perfekt, alles ist gut zu erreichen - zu FuÃü und mit Bus und Bahn - Stephan hat uns an der Haltestelle abgeholt und uns ein paar gute Tipps gegeben! Es war alles da, was man so braucht (HandtÃ?cher, BettwÃ?sche, FÃ¶hn etc) und fÃ?r drei Leute auf jeden Fall genug Platz (Couch und Bett auch sehr gemÃ?tlich). Upon arrival stephan greeted us and discussed what was expected during our stay,he was warm and welcoming giving us plenty of advice and local insider information. The apartment was everything we expected and more with wide expansive views from the living room window which can let sunlight shine though ought the room all day. Vey clean and homely plus a great easily accessible location.

FR

Nous reviendrons !

ENG

Stephane has been very nice form the start, making us feeling at home and giving us informations about the trams and the city.
Two tram ways will let you easily go in the town center, either at the north (station) or the south (museums...).
The apartment is splendid, with a tremendous view of the Amstel.
That was hard for us to leave it.
It is worth going to Stephane's place even when its raining all
week-end ;)

Stephan est super chaleureux. Il nous attendait Ã  la station de tramway. Il nous a mis trÃ¨s Ã  l'aise. Un accueil vraiment exceptionnel ! Et son appartement est magnifique et Ã  seulement 3 stations du centre ville.

I have been using Airbnb many times throughout my years of traveling throughout Europe, and Stephan's apartment is definitely on my top 5 list! As the photos indicate, the main living room is magnificent facing a large pond with geese, and most importantly the apartment is "dead quiet". So getting a deep night's uninterrupted sleep is a guarantee. Most importantly, Stephan is a sweet, friendly and gracious man! I spent a wonderful nine days and nights here!

The apartment is as pictured, even better. ItâÄôs great to be on a canal where you can watch people, dogs, birds and boats.

Stephan, our host, is obviously an experienced AirBnB host. The booklet we received prior to our visit to Amsterdam and to his apartment made our arrival process straightforward and simple. Stephan, a charming man, greeted us upon our arrival, showed us the ins and outs of the apartment, readily answered our questions and then left us to enjoy the delightful experience of having the outside environment as part of our living environment.

The living room, dining area and kitchen are all one open room facing floor to ceiling windows. The sofa comfortable, the kitchen well equipped, in fact, one of the best equipped kitchens we have had the pleasure to use. Even the knives are sharp!

The bathroom is huge. You could spend hours in the shower, if you werenâÄôt busy watching the life on the canal. The bedroom was entirely satisfactory for our needs.

It was great being in an area that has gone through the urban revival experience. We enjoyed watching the children being taken to school by their parents in the morning, shopping at the charming Italian âÄúdeliâÄù on one of the nearby shopping streets and easily acquiring our groceries at the local AH.

The train going to Central Station and surface tram to the museum area are both a 5 minute walk from the apartment and run frequently.

We would definitely stay in this apartment again and would highly recommend it to friends.

P.S. If you enjoy watching birds you are in for a treat. We saw Egyptian geese and rose-ringed parakeets.

Closed to many public transports.
Very well furnished.
Stephan is really available
Raymond was very kind and helpful!  A great place to rest after a long flight, bed was super comfortable!

Good place to stay, affordable and good value for money. For a busy day as Queensday without public transport was though to get there but in regular days is connected with trams to the center of Amsterdam. Raymond is a good host and waited for us on our way=)

Raymond is a great host and a happy person that will make you feel very comfortable. The room was exactly what I needed and the fact that he has a lovely cat is a plus!
I would highly recommend staying here while experiencing Amsterdam! And if you want to go out, ask him. He'll recommend you the best clubs. :)
Raymond is a very kind and accommodating host. The location is great, quiet, just a few minutes from both Vondel park and the train/metro station.

I liked my stay at Raymond's place and can say only good words about him as a person: hospitable, nice and really happy :) .
Location is just perfect (you should defeninetly have a walk in Vondelpark which is very close to Raymond's flat).
Verdict: recommended:)
What a charming host!

All I can ask for an airbnb in Amsterdam!: beautiful location, nice host with nice cat, simple but very decent room, and of course unbeatable price.
Highly recommendable.
I will surely get back and follow his tips for the club-cultuur in A'dam ;)
asi que no hablara ingles o holandes me ha atendido muy bien raymond,cuando regrese de vacaciones de nuevo no dudare en volver a hospedarme en su casa.
Had a lovely time in Amsterdam and in Raymond's apartment. Raymond is a great host who made us feel at ease as soon as we arrived.
Great location. Comfy bed. Really fun experience!

We stayed two nights at Raymonds place and enjoyed our stay!
His house is near to Vondelpark and a tram station to the city center is only a few minutes away. The room is a very simple one, with a comfortable bed, a chair and and a little desk. It is on the first floor with a view to the canal in front of the house.
Raymond is a very good host, who makes you always feel comfortable.
But be careful, his little cat loves bags and suitcases ;-)

Raymond was a really good host. I've been welcomed very warmly into his home. He made sure I had everything I needed. His place is just a couple of minutes walking from the tram, so it's definitely easy accessible. He was gladly to help when asked for some tips on what to visit in Amsterdam. The room is simple, but definitely all that I'd wish for. I can recommend it to anyone who is visiting Amsterdam.

Wonderful location on the "other end" of Vondelpark. the place was perfect for us. clean and charming and the bedroom was perfectly comfortable. I will gladly return upon my next visit. Mia the cat is a sweetheart with a lot of character as well

really good value for money, the room is basic, but clean and comfortable. It's easily reach via No.2 tram and in a very pleasant part of the city....................I've never seen a canal with such a view, I loved sitting on a bench at night, looking at the villas opposite.

Room and facilities exactly as described. Raymond was very welcoming and friendly. We'd been to Amsterdam before and had things in mind to do, but Raymond was still helpful in directing us and telling us about the local area. Thouroughly recommended, would definitely stay again.

cosy place in a quiet area, a short walk to vondelpark

friendly host

We spent  9 days at Raymond's. He is a great host, friendly and happy. We had everything we needed. Location is very beautiful and it is easy  to get in any place by tram. It is close to the Vondelpark, a great place for running and sports, if one needs it. If we in Amsterdam again, will be happy to stay here.

Enjoyed staying there a lot! Quite area, but still close enough to the centre. Public transfer within a 3 minute walk - as well as a little bakery with very lecker croissants :-) Perfectly located and a nice leaned back host! So - everything fine!
Raymond is very cool host. He is very helpful providing every information needed and showing the dutch stzle of living. highlz recommendable

Raymonds place is exactly as described - simple, comfortable & convenient. Raymond is a welcoming and really interesting host. He really makes you feel like his home is also yours and hopefully you'll get to spend a bit of time chatting to him about all the interesting things he's doing.

I've spent 7 nights at Raymond. He is such a person - when you don't need him he is never on you way but when you do - he always ready for you - was really cool staying in his apartment.
Regarding the place itself. Public transport in 3 minutes walk, big and beautiful park in 7, big supermarket also around 7 minutes. Other than that - a rather big bed, a table and chair in the room. Kitchen with all needed stuff, bathroom, washing machine, wi-fi. I had everything one could imagine.
Definitely recommended place
House was close to airport train, and close to tram going into downtown.

Raymond,he has a super cuuuute black cat.
Located on the river of westlandgracht and close to Vondel park.
I was a pleasant stay.
Because he was so busy,I couldn't talk much.
but he is a nice guy.

Since we were in Amsterdam for just 1 night, Raymond's extra room was sufficient for our purposes. It's a good thing he's a night owl since we checked in a bit late. We're very thankful that he accepted our booking since we're 4 adults -- and he was upfront that the room would be a tight squeeze for us, but we managed to sleep well and soundly. Location-wise, it's not that central, particularly if you just want to walk to places of interest. But if riding the tram isn't a problem, you'd enjoy staying at Raymond's (especially with the pretty lake across his apartment). One word of advice -- don't let the cat slip out of the door! She's a character, that one. :)

Raymond is an awesome guy, we had and very good time at his place. He is uncomplicated, welcoming and also helped us to find another place where we could stay after. The apartment is very much what the pictures tell so if you don't need much comfort and just wanna have an easy stay you're right. And he really knows about what is going on in Amsterdam!

great location,tram/line 2 is only a 3min walk away and goes directly to the city centre.
Raymond is helpfull and friendly! Nevertheless my girlfriend and i were really dissapointed about the room. It is exactly as on the picture except that the room was really dirty especially the ground and the walls. Bed was ok and sheets were clean. Raymond, just give the walls a quick paint and clean the floor(i takes 5min)before guests arrive. Bathroom was ok but again we encountered a dirty kitchen...! A smell of the housecat (lovely by the way)is also all over the house.
We wanted to stay 2 nights but left after the 1st. Sorry Raymond but i had to write this so the next guests will hopefully profit...

Locatie van deze kamer is prima! met OV of fiets is het centrum van Amsterdam prima bereikbaar. Simpele kamer zoals ook wordt aangegeven in de omschrijving maar wel met een heel mooi uitzicht over het water! De gastheer helaas niet ontmoet maar verzorging was goed geregeld, handdoeken lagen klaar en we hadden een eigen sleutel van de woning. Een aanrader als je niet op zoek bent naar luxe maar gewoon voor een nacht of aantal nachten een bed nodig hebt tijdens een verblijf in Amsterdam.
Very nice and uncomplicated!
Very nice and uncomplicated!

Although I booked Raymond spot last minute it was the greatest decision I made last-minute just because it was near the airport I had a broken hand and this place was within walking distance from the train.Ramen and his friends are just nice people very very laid-back and chill and so if you're looking for people that actually no answer them have good tips that are laid-back and go on with their own business then you also kind of feel part of the of this culture I would definitely highly recommend this place! it is located near the water very much near everything you need to be near,  definitely would stay again

Raymond, you have a lovely apartment, thats well located and you are very nice. But I think it is important to comment that the apartment was not clean at all when I arrived (I know you had a deadline that day, but thats why we schedule things). Also I think it would've been appropriate that you would have let me know that you where going to have people over those days (1-2 very nice people).

On the other hand I can't avoid the fact that you are super nice so as your friends and I had a really good time talking with them. But sometimes it made me feel a little bit uncomfortable the fact that the apartment was so crowded.
Nice house with a beatiful view and peaceful atmosphere. We spend a really nice weekend there. The owner it's very kind and you'll find your space and privacy.
The reservation was canceled 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Raymond es muy amable. Vale la pena hospedarse alli, aunque la distancia al centro sea bastante. De cualquier manera el barrio donde vive vale la pena conocer.

The house is very easy to find, and convenient. The room is clean and simple and Raymond is a very friendly host! Also his superrr cute cat. Just watch out when you leave your room or the flat, remember to keep the door closed, or the cat will run in and smell all your things, (probably some scratching too). The kitchen is dirty, but we didn't really cook so it's okay for us.

Our stay at Raymond's place was perfect!
The neighbourghood is very nice and relaxing. We had a very comfortable sleep. Raymond was really helpfull and gave us fantastic informations.
Perfect mix between privacy and conviviality.
Really cool guy and place to be at. Its well connected with trams and Raymond's hosting is precious. Watch for the cat, she likes to escape from the flat :))
Raymond is a great guy, The house is really nice with a beautiful view. I spent a really nice weekend there. Most recommended.

Raymond was awesome! Very pleasant person to talk to and he was very helpful in my nieve lack of planning. He provided a wonderful bed to sleep on and a towel fo the shower. I spent a good amount of time sleeping, since I was sick, but it was very comfortable and he was really easy to talk to and work with.

Definitly would stay again if he accepted.

Staying at RaymondÂ´s place was awesome !   it was a perfect place for me, exactly what i was looking for. He is a great man, i felt very confortable in his house. Just the fact of crossing the Voldenpark with my bike everyday to reach the city centre was very nice; and the neighborhood where he lives is nice and quiet. I hope to come back sometime in the future. Totally recommended !

Raymond is a very welcoming host and made my stay at his place enjoyable.  While not in the heart of the attractions, Raymond's place is super-easy to get to via tram.  If you're looking for a comfortable place to stay while visiting Amsterdam, I recommend Raymond's guest room.

I stayed for 5 nights at Raymond's. He is a great host. very nice and helpful. He is not in your way, and sometimes I was coming back very late/early but he is a night bird working late so I didn't have to worry about waking him up. The room was very basic but comfortable. it is very close to the tram no 2 that takes you straight to the city center in less than 15 minutes so very good location for the value of money.
His friends were also very nice and helpful.
the cat is quite a character, she will get in your suitcase one way or another or you will have to chase her down the street if she runs out:D

Estuve en casa de Raymond solo una noche. Raymond fue simpÃ¡tico y me ayudÃ? en todo lo que le preguntÃ©. La casa es su lugar de trabajo, asÃ? que hubo flexibilidad en las horas de llegada y salida. La habitaciÃ?n era muy bÃ¡sica (no necesitaba mÃ¡s tampoco). Todo limpio. A la gata le gustÃ? mi maleta y casi se vuelve conmigo a EspaÃ±a.

Raymond is a nice guy and has a cute cat. He is helpful in showing you around town and happy to show you Amsterdam nightlife.
Make sure to ask Raymond a trampass you can charge yourself so your rides to the city centre will be at a reasonable price

Yo, it was really cool place, I was staying at Raymond's house for 4 days, there is a beautiful park not far from, what can I say, NICE!

Raymond was a great host; very accommodating and gave me some tips on things to see and do. It helps that thereâÄôs an amazing view from the room. ItâÄôs very easy to get to lots of places from RaymondâÄôs whether youâÄôre walking or catching the tram. Mia, his cat, is also very friendly. Also heâÄôs got some amazing photos that heâÄôs taken and has up around the main room.

Very nice stay at Raymond's place. Really nice host and very affectionate cat.
Raymond has plenty of tips on where to go, especially for night life but not only!
The view from the room is beautiful, and Raymond's place is really well connected to the centre and station thanks to the tram.
Enjoy!
Great Place, Location and owner, plus a small matter of a Europe Football Final which I was taking my son to. His team won too - happy on all fronts
I spend a night in Raymonds place. We had some problems but at least Raymond was honest about it.

Raymond was nice enough to let us leave our bags when we arrived early and was an easy going host. He has great taste in music and likes to be up late! Room is a little dirty but a nice place if you are backpacking through. I would suggest renting a bike during your stay, the ride through Vondelpark is very nice. Grab a club sandwich at Singel 404 for lunch (you will not regret it)
It has been a fantastic holiday. We really enjoyed Amsterdam and probably we will come back soon. The house was really confortable and cozy. We will love to come back to Hinde's house the next time.

When we saw the pictures on Hindi apartments we fell in love with them at first sight! In reality, they were even more comfortable and impressive! We spent a lovely time in Hindi, which will take care of everything to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Hindi is lovely and very hospitable hostess and we were very glad to meet her. Thank you so much!

Hinde and her family welcome us very warmly. Staying in their house was comfortable and the apartment is very nice and full of light (and it was clean too). The girls were comfortably accomodate in a inflatable bed. Hinde gave us also advice on where to buy food or have dinner, very useful! We want to thank Hinde very much! Next time we'll go to Amsterdam, we will like to come to Hinde's house again!

We had the most wonderful stay at this Mediterranean apartment located in the west of Amsterdam! The location was perfect for us, as we rented bikes right after arrival. The apartment itself was super cozy with a lovely balcony/kitchen which we used more then once to enjoy a bottle of red and cheese. Since there were three of us, one of the girls had to sleep on the sofa in the living room, but from our experience this worked great and the sofa was very comfortable.

The communication and preparation arrangements with Hinde was very effective, and he provided us with everything we needed before arrival.

If we would ever go back to Amsterdam again, this would definitely be the apartment we would like to stay at!

Thank you!

We loved staying at Hinde and Rafael's house. The house was perfect for our family of five. We had two cribs and a little bed for the kids. Also they loved to play with Chadi's toys. The house is great if you travel with kids.

The kitchen is very luminous and has all the necessary tools and tableware to cook at home. The apartment is conveniently located around 10 min. walk from tram 13 that takes you to central station. There are two super markets close to the house too.

If I had something to say I think the bathroom could have been a little cleaner. Anyway, it is a great and charming place to stay that I would definitely recommend. I want to thank Hinde and Rafael for being so nice and helpful with all our needs.

We had a wonderful in
Your amazing apartment!!! The neighborhood is quiet and nice and the apartment is beautifully designed and super comfortable!!! Thanks so much;))

Je me recommande vivement! !

Beautiful apartment in a fantastic location - super easy to get in to the centre, but a much more relaxed area to stay for when the hustle and bustle of tourists gets too much.
Hinde was a really great host - easy to contact and very helpful when needed. I felt like she went above and beyond to ensure we were happy and comfortable for our stay in her place.
Thanks Hinde and I'm sure we'll be back in Amsterdam before long!

Nous avons passÃ© un trÃ¨s bon sÃ©jour dans l'appartement de Hinde et Ã§a petite tribu!
Elle nous a aidÃ©e du dÃ©but Ã  la fin, elle a toujours rÃ©pondu rapidement Ã  nos questions (beaucoup)!
PrÃ©venante, souriante (on l'a mÃªme vu en vrai!

Hinde's apartment was perfect for my friend and I during our week long stay in Amsterdam. Des Baarsjes was a perfect neighborhood, just far away enough from the city center to escape the crowds (and we didn't even go during peak tourist season), but right around the corner from several tram stops. There are several great restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood as well. We did not get to meet Hinde, but check in was very easy with their very flexible neighbor! Would stay here again, definitely.
Very nice apartment, everything we needed. Hinde was very helpful with everything and sorted out all our questions. Thank you!

Hinde's home was exactly as she has described. Beautifully and tastefully done up house. We had a great stay at Hinde's place and loved every moment spent there. The house is in convenient locality and 10-15 min distance from city centre by Tram/bus.

Whilst we found the house a bit cramped, but you will see everything is on it's right place and isn't an obstruction. The house needs special care if you have small child, it would be good to be upfront with Hinde. The house is on the 3rd floor with no lift, be mindful if you are travelling with heavy luggage.

A great stay for our visit at Amsterdam.
Everything was great staying here! I loved the house and location. It was convenient to get pretty much anywhere in Amsterdam. Would recommend to couples or a very small group of people.

Great apartment close to city center. Charming decoration/ real home. Everything you need. Big place can (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication with owner and arrival was super easy. Very nice in general :)
We had a wonderful time at Hinde's place. Would definitely recommend this place to others. It is close enough to transportation & has required amenities & shops close by.

Great space! Plenty of space for the 3 of us (couple +1) staying there. I actually opted to sleep on the couch bc it was so big and comfortable! There is balcony access which is lovely, and the apartment is a very cozy and  in a great location. Hinde was very accommodating, responded quickly, check in was easy, all great things!

The experience into a houseboat was really particular and exciting.
The apartment was clean, brand new and really nice!
To recommend for a unique experience in Amsterdam.
The communication with the host was really simple and functioning.
Thanks Harry for your kindness.

We booked HarryÂ´s houseboat in the last minute but Harry confirmed it fast. The houseboat itself is very nice, we enjoyed our stay there. It is new, pleasant, has a nice atmosphere and the neighborhood is quiet. There is a good public transportation connection, you can reach the city center very easy. Harry is an excellent host!
If you would like to stay in Amsterdam, this place is a great choice!

We were four friends visiting Amsterdam and staying on Harry's houseboat was the best decision we could have made. It's brand new, very stylish with a great rooftop terrace and an awesome bathroom. The rooms are cozy and the beds (2 real ones) had good matresses. Only advice, bring towels (we had to buy some because we forgot to bring our own :-) )

Harry loue une partie de sa splendide maison-bateau, toute neuve. Le lieu, un peu Ã  l'Ã©cart du centre-ville, est trÃ¨s calme et le cadre est trÃ¨s dÃ©paysant. On voit passer des cygnes par la fenÃªtre du salon ! Harry est trÃ¨s sympathique et accueillant, et il a meublÃ© sa maison avec goÃ»t et esprit pratique.
Nice stay, and hosts. Clean and spacious, modern house boat. Would come again.

We stayed for two nights and overall our experience was fantastic. This property is in a great location that was quiet and relaxing but also very close to Amsterdam centre by tram (15 mins to central Amsterdam), which you can pick up at the end of the road (number 16 or 24).

The accommodation itself was comfortable, very clean, modern and decorated to a very high standard. It also has great roof deck and just being on the water was such a novelty for us we really enjoyed it.

There are four brand new bikes which you can use free of charge and we cycled to a local park (Amsterdam Bose) that was more like a forest, which was amazing to cycle around. If you like the outdoors this is the place for you. You can have a bit of nature and the city all in one weekend.

Harry thanks again we will hopefully be back again soon!

Very stylish houseboat in a nice and quite location of Amsterdam. It takes you a 15min bustransfer and a 10 minute walk from Schiphol Airport to get there by public transport. The houseboat is located next to the Olympic Stadium and surrounded by sports fields (tennis, soccer, icehockey, etc.) and of course water.
The housboat is brand new, is very clean, modern and stylsish. The location is designed for up to 4 guests with 2 bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, lovely roof terrace and of course 4 brand new bikes. It was a pleasure to get arround with them in Amsterdam. It takes you about 5 minutes to the Vondelpark by bike and another 10 minutes to the City Center. If you go the opposite direction you will get in 5-10 Minutes to the Amsterdam Forest (Amsterdam Bos).
We really enojed our stay in this location. As Harry lives just next door even our late arrival was no problem. Thanks again for this. I really can recomend this location to everyone who wantâÄôs to stay stylish and relaxed.

A weekend on a houseboat is just so Amsterdam-ish! Everything worked out perfectly at Harry & AnnaÂ´s. Staying in a houseboat community felt very home-like. Bikes were great and having to come in to town from a bit longer distance than if you stay right downtown makes you see new and really nice parts of Amst. Our hosts gave us some real good tips on where to eat.
Appartement trÃ¨s agrÃ©able pour son lieu, son espace, son Ã©quipement. On se sens chez soi. Un havre de paix. Accueil trÃ¨s sympathique.

Nice houseboat. Two floors + sunroof. One bedroom is large enough, another - a bit small for two persons.

A bit far from center, but Harry provided bikes for us, so it wasn't a problem.

New experience.

Overall impression - 4+/5

Harry and Anna's boathouse is absolutely wonderful! It is designed perfectly - we were 4 people and yet there was more than enough space. The decor and facilities were lovely - made you feel right at home. I have no words about the setting which was idylic to say the least - completely in touch with nature yet very close to the center of Amsterdam (about 10-12 minutes by tram, which is about a 5 minutes walk from the house. The tram stops along all the points of interests such as museums, shopping, etc. so basically you can hop on and off. Two tram lines are perfect for this - 16 and 24. You can also take these from Central Station directly to the house and then it is a 5 minute walk to the house.)). It is a perfect place to relax and to visit the city at the same time. We are looking forward to coing back for a longer stay soon!
Harry and Anna were perfect hosts, lovely to talk to and very professional about how they run this property. Bravo!
(4 bikes also come with this property which is a great touch- also the location is perfect for running. There are no supermarkets in very close walking distance from what I saw, but it is easy to get to quickly get to one by bike and of course all sorts of restaurants deliver).

Wir verbrachten leider nur 2 NÃ?chte auf dem Hausboot und haben uns dort sehr wohl gefÃ?hlt. Harry ist ein sehr freundlicher Gastgeber, er wohnt direkt nebenan, so dass man jederzeit schnell Kontakt hÃ?tte haben kÃ¶nnen. Man wohnt wie in einem kleinen Dorf, mit dem Rad nur 10 Minuten vom Zentrum entfernt. Wir hatten eine sehr schÃ¶ne Zeit und mÃ¶chten gern wiederkommen.
Richard und Ludwiga

This place is awesome. Who wouldn't want to stay on a houseboat? The interior is more or less impeccable (looks fairly new), and accommodated three of us quite comfortably. It's a little ways from the city center, but with the bikes that were provided, it was very easy to get there (riding through the city on bikes was actually one of the highlights of my trip...given how bike-friendly Amsterdam is, I would consider that a must). If bikes aren't your thing, it's also right next to a tram stop (less than 10 minute walk). Harry was very nice and accommodating (and funny, not surprisingly) - he took the time to walk us through everything, and provided quite a bit in the way of recommendations for restaurants, things to check out, etc. Overall great experience, would highly recommend.

We stayed for one night at this gorgeous location. It is easy to find by car and bus- and tram-station aren't far away. Nevertheless it is located in a very calm area. The houseboat looks brandnew and was very clean. Very friendly hosts!
We hope, we will be able to return to this nice place and have a longer stay!

Me and two friends stayed for four nights in this amazing houseboat, which is easily big enough for four. It's very modern with some quaint (Website hidden by Airbnb) in a quiet, relaxing area which is still close enough to central Amsterdam. The area is near other sites you might otherwise miss. We took the bikes that come with the property to Amsterdam Forest, which is only about 10 minutes away.

The nearest shops aren't too far away, around a 15 minute walk. But there is a petrol station near the stadium for basics and snacks. There are good transport connections in the area, the tram, buses, and Amsterdam Zuid station is about a ten minute walk.

Harry was very friendly and welcoming, and I'd stay here again!

Harry and Anna were lovely. Harry picked us up when we came in ( we became a little lost from the airport). The houseboat is beautiful and clean. Everything we needed. Short walk to tram or bus. We actually rode the bikes downtown one day.
There were four adults and two small children in the boat and we were quite comfortable.
Great hosts... thank you Harry and Anna for a wonderful stay!

We really enjoyed the houseboat and Amsterdam is an amazing city! We'll come back for sure and will recommend it to friends.
Thanks to Harry & Anna for their kindness and hospitality.

We were with my wife to Amsterdam like a first step of a long anniversary journey. Harry and Anna were are wonderful persons.
The value proposal of the place is exactly as the airbnb web page appears. The interior is impeccable and looks (Website hidden by Airbnb) very close to Amsterdam Downtown. You have several transportation alternatives. Bike, Tram, Bus, or even Taxi (is not necessary).
For example the bike route thru the neighborhood is amazing. Thanks Harry and Anna
It was a very nice stay. Harry was always helpful and the house boat is the perfect stay for Amsterdam!

Harry and Anna were super helpful, giving us tips on how to get to their lovely house boat and were flexible with meeting us with the keys.  The house boat is BEAUTIFUL! Definitely added to the Amsterdam expeience!
it vas very different for us. thank you for everything

Fabulous stay in this spacious immaculate houseboat. Anna was a super host and very accommadating. I have already referred many people and would love to stay here again. Great people - great place. Thanks Anna

A beautiful houseboat, exactly as the photos show. The 16 & 24 trams go right into the centre of Amsterdam or you can cycle for 15 minutes on the bikes provided. Have recommended it to my parents who are going to visit in autumn and would also recommend it to anyone else.

Harry & Anna weren't there when we stayed but Harry's parents were and they were very helpful and accommodating.

We loved Harry and Anna's houseboat! It was very beautiful and such a different experience. So much better than staying at a hotel. It was very close to town, only a 10 minute bike ride. The bikes were an added bonus. Would recommend this place to everyone!

The first thing you need to know is that the first photo you see of the home is NOT the one you will be renting. That one is the owners. You will not be sitting out on that lovely deck overlooking the canal. You will be in the unit behind that with a view of the home next door. There is a deck on top, but it is not a charming deck like the one pictured. Otherwise, the place was clean and attractive and no other complaints. The owner's dad checked us in, helped us find the cheap parking, and was very nice. We appreciated the bikes.

A very nice place to stay! We spent 10 days in Amsterdam with the houseboat as our platform and we enjoyed the quietness of the neighborhood along with the very spacious and comfortable houseboat. So nice to wake up and see the water everyday, and so nice to sit on the roof terrace at night. Anna and Harry are such kind people who make sure that everything concerning your stay in the houseboat is as it should be. The bicycles included made it so easy to explore the city and therefore we enjoyed it even more! Dank u woll!

Our stay in Harry & Anna's houseboat was very nice. It was very quiet at night so made for easy sleeping. We enjoyed riding the bicycles that they included with the rental. It was a nice way to see the city, though it took a little bit of learning to figure out how to maneuver all of the other bicycle, scooter, tram, and car traffic. The houseboat was very clean and spacious. We enjoyed relaxing on the rooftop deck and watching boats pass by in the channel near where the houseboat is located. It was also nice to be able to cook our own breakfast in the houseboat's kitchen so we didn't need to find a restaurant in the mornings. Anna also did us a favor by arranging for a taxi to pick us up to take us to the airport when we needed to leave Amsterdam since our phones were not always working properly while we were in Europe. She even sent her parents with a note to inform us she had made the arrangements since we were not likely to see her that evening. She also assisted in our comfort by providing a fan to use while we slept since we are used to using one. Riding bicycles or taking the tram to the city center or other Amsterdam neighborhoods was easy to figure out. We would definitely recommend staying at their houseboat to others.
mooie accommodatie, prima sanitair en degelijke fietsen.

The house is really nice and confortable, the area is super quiet and relaxing, neighbours are so lovely and friendly you can't believe it. Harry and Anna are great hosts, very nice, polite and helpful. We had a great time in Amsterdam, thanks to all the beautiful people we met.

Unfortunately for us, our taxi driver dropped us at the wrong end of Jachtshavenweg, despite me giving him a piece of paper with Harry's directions on it. Anyway after an hour of dragging suitcases along the streets and bike paths we found the Houseboat. Harry & Anna welcomed us with a cold drink and snack. The houseboat is quite spacious and was very comfortable for the three of us. We enjoyed bike riding in the Forest but preferred to use trams to get into the city. Harry was very helpful with directions for the local grocery store, Albert Heijn and where to catch public transport.
We really enjoyed the novelty of staying on a houseboat.
Thank you Harry & Anna.
Although the house was a little difficult to find, it was absolutely beautiful and we wish we had stayed there longer!  The use of complementary bikes was also very nice.
Thank you for the great stay at your wonderful houseboat

My boyfriend, two friends of us and I, spent 4 nights at Annas and Harrys gorgeous houseboat.
Even it rains a lot during our stay in Amsterdam our holiday was not a flop, because of our great accommodation. The houseboat was clean and cozy and we used the kitchen to cook a lot of delicious meals. Also we had so much fun cruising around in Amsterdam with the bikes. Therefore we used the bus to get to the Jachtshavenweg and had no problems to find the pier. The area was really nice and quiet and Anna gave us a warm welcome.

We can recommend Annas and Harrys place to everyone who likes to have a memorable time in Amsterdam and we would always stay again at the houseboat!

This was an amazing base for our short stay in Amsterdam. Very relaxed atmosphere, lovely house and so convenient having the bikes. Harry gave us a great welcome. Can't recommend staying here highly enough.
All you can say when you arrive is Wow!  Really cool houseboat.  Extremely good value for Amsterdam.  I would very highly recommend it.  Great neighborhood and easy access to public transportation.

We loved the houseboat, and Harry was very helpful. We wish we could of stayed longer. We really enjoyed using the bikes to go explore the beautiful city, it is very generous of Harry to include them. Beware, however, I did have a peeping Tom! Turned out it was a gorgeous white swan that floats around with his duck buddies shaking the neighborhood down for goodies! He floated right up to the bedroom window. How cool is that? Thanks for everything, Harry!
Prima verblijf, schoon,netjes, alles naar wens, zeer geschikt voor een weekendje Amsterdam.Helaas waren wij er maar kort maar we zullen zeker terugkomen.
Great place in a nice neighborhood!  The bike were awesome to discover the city ans the parks. The houseboat is clean and confortable.  Harry and Anna are really welcoming. Great place for a family.

Mooie nieuwe woonark, gezellig ingericht,gedeeld met eigenaar maar volledig privacy, eigen ingang, niet gehorig.
Met de bijbehorende fietsen fiets je in 5 minuten het Vondelpark in, vandaar fiets je door het langgerekte park heel leuk naar het centrum. Uitchecken is officieel al om 10.00 uur maar dat konden we i.v.m. bruiloftsfeest op de avond ervoor in overleg aanpassen naar 11.00 uur waarvoor dank!
Beddengoed, handdoeken, theedoek, zeep op wastafels, koffiepads, theezakjes, afwasmiddel: alles was er.
We had an amazing Time. Very clean, gorgeous place!

Une excellente faÃ§on de dÃ©couvrir Amsterdam !

Nous sommes venus chez Harry et Anna pendant 4 jours dÃ©but octobre ( 2 couples sans enfants) et sommes ravis du sÃ©jour que nous avons passÃ©.

La "maison" est neuve, propre, au calme et trÃ¨s bien Ã©quipÃ©e : un beau sÃ©jour avec cuisine Ã©quipÃ©e (four, plaques de cuisson , lave vaisselles et rÃ©frigÃ©rateur), des toilettes au niveau du hall d'entrÃ©e, 2 chambres avec des rangements au niveau infÃ©rieur et une belle salle de bains avec douche Ã  l'italienne et grande baignoire et un autre toilette.

The accommodation was really nice, all well equipped and in a really good location close to the city centre. We also liked the possibility of using Harry&Anna's Bikes.
They made us feel very welcome and made the stay even more enjoyable.
Perfect Location!!Great host!Boat was beautiful!Hopefully we will come again next time without rain so we can enjoy the rooftop!Thank you

It's a nice experience to stay in the cozy boat house, the location is every good just behind the sport part, you can enjoy the greens and fresh air, with a very quiet neighborhood. The room is very cozy and clean, the everything we may need has been carefully prepared. Nice experience to stay there. Harry is also quite a nice and kind guy, just like the pic it looks.

We only stayed for one night, but it was great. The boat is very comfortable, the bikes for the ride into the city a great help and Harry & Anna were very relaying. Perfect for families.
We come back someday - if that weather is a little warmer.
Lars

This is an amazing place. The location is perfect. There is a great little neighborhood grocery store, great neighborhood restaurants, bikes to make getting around quick and easy and the space is wonderful. It is spotless and efficient. And an easy bike ride or bus ride to the heart of the city.

Harry and Anna'a Houseboat is magnificent. While it's not in a central Amsterdam location, it's so easy to get to from Schiphol and having the bikes makes it easy to get anywhere.

I can't recommend the houseboat or the setting enough. Excellent value for money and did absolutely everything it said on the tin.
Gorgeous houseboat in a great area. Friendly and uncomplicated owner. Don't miss the opportunity to explore the city with the bikes you rent with the house. Amsterdam at its best!

the houseboat is magnificent, in a quit and relaxing city area. it isn't far from city centre. i reccomend to use the bike (that are rent whit the house). the hause really has everything tou need!
the owner is so nice and friendly...
i can't reccomend to spend some days in Amsterdam, in houseboat Nova.
Arianna

Een zeer fijne locatie met vele mogelijkheden.
Rustige omgeving vlakbij een bos en sportaccomodaties. En met de fiets ben je op een kwartiertje in het historische centrum. Er zijn in de buurt verschillende goede alternatieven voor veilig parkeren tegen een lage prijs.
Alle voorzieningen voor een comfortabel verblijf zijn in de woonboot aanwezig. En het verblijf begon met een vriendelijke ontvangst en heldere afspraken met de verhuurders, die ook in de voorafgaande afspraken heel correct en accuraat waren.
Warm aanbevolen.

We ordered Ekaterina's apartment because it was simply the cheapest offer at the airbnb. We were prepared for worst, but nope. Apartments was very ok, very clean, big balcony, totally same as at photos. Neighborhood was super, 15 min by bike to the central station, tram/bus stop within 2 min walking distance, few supermarkets in 5 min.
Few words about the householder: We arrived late at the night, but it was not a big problem for Ekaterina, we managed to get to the home after 00:00 (thank you Ekaterina!). She was always online, so we could simply ask any questions and Ekaterina was happy to help us.
The apartment is cosy and clean. Just like on the pictures. We had a nice stay in Amsterdam and our hosts were very friendly to us. The neighbourhood is quiet, and very close to the bus stop. Thanks!

Super week end en amoureux dans ce chaleureux appartement a 15 minutes du centre a vÃ©lo! ReÃ§u par les voisins trÃ¨s charmant. TRES PROPRE, agrÃ©able, Terrasse, Youtube sur la TV, lit confortable, comme a la maison!

A good week end in Amsterdam, The appartement is very cosy, very clean and look like the pictures.
The tram station is about 3 minutes and some shop too.
No problem to park the car, it's a big plus.
We enjoy our night, Ekaternina was very nice and give us good advise about the city.
Thanks again, i hope see you later for an other trip in Amsterdam
Super appartement! Aanrader!

Thomas is a great host !
It responds quickly and more super nice , he gave me several ideas for outings and museums of Amsterdam to discover the city .

We got a welcome drink and a very clean and friendly apartment !
An equipped kitchen, a practice room, a comfortable bed, a lounge with two sofas and a TV with over youtube ...

The cat is adorable too! And the location is really close to small commercial district and the bus takes you to the center in 10 minutes!

I highly recommend it and if you want to spend on Thomas Lille , you're welcome!

Nice apartment in a good location coffee shop around the corner and a store with a better supermarket about 3 min walk away. Team stop right at Javaplein that will take you to Dam square or #22 bus to take you to station centraal.


The hosts and their cat are very friendly and easy to get on with for the price this was a very good option to rent in Amsterdam.

Nice apartment, very clean, looks just like the pictures. Everything you need in the kitchen (even a dishwasher!). Comfy bed, nice living room.
Very convenient location, close to the center, easy to reach by bus, tram or bike within 15mn.
Ekaterina is very friendly, a very nice host. Her cat is really nice, clean and quiet.
I would definitely recommend this apartment and will rent it again on my next Amsterdam trip!

Ekaterina's place was perfect. As described, it is very convenient to reach the center (15min). The location is great ! the flat is surrounded with cute coffee places. The flat is clean and cute ! highly recommend it!

Le logement qu'Ekaterina nous Ã  proposÃ© Ã©tait identique aux photos, trÃ¨s propre. On est Ã  10 minutes du centre ville en bus.
Tout Ã©tait bien expliquÃ©, elle nous a accueilli avec 2 bouteilles de vin.
Le chat Missy est adorable.
Nous recommandons Ã©videmment ce logement.

PS : Cet appartement est Ã  2 minutes Ã  pied d'un supermarchÃ© ce qui facilite beaucoup la vie.

Ekaterina's apartment matches perfectly all the pictures and descriptions. The apartment is very well located, close to the center and well served by all sorts of services but at the same time very pleasant and quiet place to stay. Me and my boyfriend felt like being locals and that was wonderful for us.
Even though we didn't have the chance to meet Ekaterina personaly due to the fact that she was abroad, she was very nice with us and was able to arrange our coming perfectly.
Missy is a very quiet cat and easy to take care of.
We certainly recomend Ekaterina's place to a great vacation in Amsterdam.

We had a fantastic experience staying at Ekaterina's and Thomas' apartment. We found it exactly as described, with pretty much everything we could wish for - even a furry flatmate (their cat is super cute). Supermarkets and cafÃ©s are nearby, and you can get to the city center in less than 20 minutes. Furthermore, our hosts were very quick in responding to our messages and Thomas provided us with a whole lot of tips for our stay. Highly recommended!
TrÃ¨s bon sÃ©jour !!

We stayed at Ekaterina's place for 4 nights and it was really perfect. At first I was a bit worried about the cat being in the apartment but after the first night we realized that this is such adorable cat. You really don't need to worry for it. It even slept by our feet on the bed ;)

I would recommend this place for sure in Amsterdam and I know we will be back in the near future.
Just go for it, hosts are so nice and made every thing easy, appartement is clean and the area is no nice. Everything was perfect !

Everything was perfect! Ekaterina is a really nice person and did everything to make our stay relaxing. The apartment is clean and cozy and the cat Missy is super cute. Thank you very much for everything :) I would definitly recommend your apartment and come back some day!
Lovely apartment in great location. Excellent communication and very lovely cat

The location of the apartment is great. It seems to be a young and vibrant area. There are a lot of cafes and it is rather close to the city center. The building is rather old but the apartment was perfectly clean. You have to be aware that there is a cat in the apartment of which you have to take care but that is okay if you don't mind cats. For our weekend stay the apartment was appropriate and Amsterdam is always worth a visit!

Ci siamo trovati molto bene nella casa di Ekaterina. Appartamento molto pulito e luminoso. Ekaterina ha sempre risposto prontamente alle nostre domande ed Ã¨ stata molto gentile e disponibile. La casa non Ã¨ in pieno centro ma facilmente raggiungibile con i mezzi pubblici. LâÄôunico âÄúneoâÄù riguarda il bagno della casa che Ã¨ un poâÄô scomodo.
Sehr schÃ¶ne Unterkunft mit guter Anbindung zur Bahn. Problemloser Check In. Sehr saubere Wohnung mit gemÃ?tlichem Balkon.
Cute place, nice location, great hosts!

Great & clean location and in house space with fast connect thru bus and tram to downtown , Central , and to Zuid station. has everything for your stay ( even towels) and around the area of east amsterdam.
