Nice apartment. Clean, comfortable. By tram or bike 15-20 minutes to the center.

We had a fantastic time at this lovely apartment in the Jordan. It had everything we needed and was clean, bright and spacious.

Really handy having the bicycles, it was about a 15-20 minute cycle into town.

We had a delicious Turkish breakfast at Mamoud round the corner, and there is also a supermarket nearby - the kitchen had everything we needed and it was nice to stay in with a home cooked meal and play scrabble. Some choice DVDs in the flat meant we spent a lovely evening watching Peep Show the day after a night out on the town!

Would recommend this apartment for anyone wanting a comfortable, easy and relaxing break in Amsterdam.

Jason & Lotte's apartment is great, we really enjoy our 4-night stay there. Grocery store is very close, and it is well connected with the center and the Central Station (one bus line, 2 trams).
Jason & Lotte were really nice and responsive. We didn't have the chance to meet them but they left a lot of useful information (+ beer and wine!) for us.
I definitely recommend a stay at their place!

Jason and lotties apartment was great!! They were great hosts and quick to reply to queries. Easy transport links close by. Harry the cat was an extra bonus (and the balcony)!! Thanks so much for our stay guys, we loved it!
wouter is very welcoming ! he had always answer quickly. his appartement's so clean , great and not far at the centrum , see u soon by by

I apologize for having taken so long to write this evaluation.

Wouter is an excellent host. He keeps the house extremely clean. Furthermore, even though he didn't need to do that, he left me food and beverages.

I had a minor problema during the first evening. When I called him for help, he solved the problema immediately by resorting to ione of his neighbors (which shows that he gets along well with people).

It's not a luxury apartment, but it's well located for people who like museums and concerts.

Wouter was a great host, he takes care of us with wine, food, breakfast and many explanation. The location is great, close to the tram, museum, shops, restaurants and pubs in the main street. The apartment was more than expected. I would highly recommend this place for a nice weekend in Amsterdam
Wouter welcomed me very kindly and showed me his cosy apartment.   I had a wonderful stay in the middle of Amsterdam!
Nice appartement: its very clean and near by town. Its situated in de Pijp and that a realy nice area.

We had a very nice stay in Wouters Apartment! He welcomed us very friendly and it was very clean. The Apartment is well located in de pijp, i think there is no better Place to be. You have everything around but the Apartment is in a street, which is more quiet.
Thank you Wouter and i hopefully we see us soon!
It was a good stay ! Wouter is a very good host.
We had a great weekend. Communication in booking with Wouter was very easy. It's a very cosy place in a very nice part of town. I'd be happy to come again any time.

We had such a fantastic weekend at Wouter's apartment, and Wouter made us feel very welcome from the moment we arrived, showing us around, taking the time to give us tips and ideas of great places to visit and eat during our stay as well as providing breakfast items so we wouldn't have to go out and buy things after our evening arrival - very thoughtful. He had been easy to get hold of and quick to respond in arranging the stay and had even given us detailed instructions and timings on getting to the apartment from the airport.

The apartment itself is in a great location on a lovely quiet street with a balcony that overlooks gardens, but just a short walk from great places to eat and go out in de Pijp. Getting into town was a lovely and easy 20 minute walk or 5 minutes on the tram. It was spotlessly clean and had everything we could need for our stay.

Thanks so much Wouter, hope we can come back soon!
Wouter is so helpful and easy-going, his place is perfect for a short trip to Amsterdam - right in the thick pf De Pijp with restaurants and bars in walking distance. We had a great time!

We had a wonderful time staying at this place! This apartment is very clean, cozy and has a soul of its own.
I'd be happy to have such a beautiful home myself.
We had a great time at Wouter's place - the apartment is comfortable and clean and in an excellent location.  And Wouter is incredibly helpful and nice, making our stay that much better!

Wouter was very kind and helpful. He gave some notes with good bars and restaurants. The apartment is not in the real center, but the neighborhood is very good with smart places for breakfast just around the corner. The main museums are about 10 minutes walk. The apartment was very clean and well equipped.  And it  gave exactly the same comfort as it was described on the website.

We had a great stay in Wouter's apartment - it seems big, even though it isn't, with big windows and a really nice and sunny terrace.
Wouter welcomed us and was really pleasant and helpful. Also he had left some food for us to take, which was really great after a day of traveling.
All in all - we would love to stay at this place again, if we return to Amsterdam!

We had a wonderful time at Wouter's appartment ! It is cozy, clean and well equipped, in a very quiet environnement but not far away from lively places with shops, restaurants and bars. The tram station is very close too. Wouter was very kind and gave us recommandations on good places to eat in the neighboorhood.

Note that a bearded dragon lives in the appartement ! A perfect roommate : both funny and quiet.

Wouter answered to my request very quick and was in touch in any questions. He is very nice and frendly - helped us with luggage (no lift there!), told about area, gave some advices about nearest cafe, shops, bike rentals etc. and also presented one bottle of wine, as "welcome", thanks!

The flat is not in center, but quite near: to Central Station is about 40 minutes by foot, to main places it takes from 10 till 20 minutes. We prefer walking, but you can use tram, the station is near.
Very quiet neighborhood and nice market 5 minutes away from flat with fresh fruits, vegetables and flowers!

This flat is better for short stay, cos there are not enough place for your things and clothes (Wouter usually lives here, so there are many his things, of course). But all was really clean and kitchen is well equipment, if you like cooking.

Two notes - there is a small dragon, he is really quiet, but I felt some specific smell from it (not bad, just specific). And it was a little cold for me, I think because of windows (big and quite old), but this is usual problem for Europe in spring.

So, it was nice time in Amsterdam, thanks!

We had an enjoying weekend at Wouter's appartment. The place is very convenient, clean and cozy well located in a quiet street with a balcony overlooking a nice garden.
Wouter gave us some tips such a very good bakery nearby (yummy appleflap!). He provided us delicious cooked pasta so we wouldn't have to go out the evening we arrived.
Thank you so much again !

I booked Wouter' apartment for my mother and sister when they visited Amsterdam. They said the location was superb. It was super close to bus and train stations and a short walk would take you to where all the things were happening. Water's apartment was very nice and clean and really made their stay. I would recommend it to others

Wouter was an amazing host. He was very flexible with a change I had to do to the trip last minute. We had the opportunity to share dinner (he is a great cook) and he gave us good advice on how to explore Amsterdam. The apartment is neat and very well located.
The apartments is just like in the pictures. The location is great, full of shops and restaurantds around and walking distance from the museums.
My partner and I stayed at Wouters place for 7 nights, we did not meet him, but we met his friend who was very nice and helpful and was easy to reach and contact before arriving.

Great Great Great!
In one word - RECOMMENDED

We had a great stay in Wouter's apartment - it's bright and airy and had everything we needed. We had a warm welcome from Wouter and all our communication was straightforward. The location was great for us - there's lots of bars, restaurants & cafÃ©s nearby, plus it's easy to get elsewhere in the city. The nearby brewery was a particularly good recommendation! We would definitely stay again.
Wouter is a greatest host. We have followed his recommendations and where not disappointed! The apartment is super cozy. Perfect experience. Would definitely stay there again. Recommended 100%.

Wir hatten tolle Tage in Amsterdam. Wouter ist ein sehr netter, offener Gastgeber. Kommunikation davor und wÃ?hrend unseres Aufenthaltes war perfekt. Die Wohnung liegt super zentral in De Pijp, ist gut ausgestattet und geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Empfehlen wir gerne weiter.

Everything was near perfect with Wouter and his place: fluid communication, great place, good location (de pijp is really a great district), Wouter even offered us a bottle of wine to start the journey!
So yes everything was perfect except for the presence of a mouse in the apartment... Wouter warned us not to leave food outside and we didn't. So we were fine even though it is questionable in terms of hygiene, but if you are freaked by them I would suggest to choose another place.
Otherwise, and again, everything else was great - thanks Wouter!

This place is perfect ! Very well located in a very Nice area With a lot of Nice places to eat and have a drink. After 4 days in Amsterdam, we say that it's the Best place in Amsterdam. Really Nicer than the center full of tourists. It's Very Quick to go to the center, walking or With the tramway.
The appartment has everything you need, the bed is comfy and it's reaaaally silent in the flat. There's a little terrace Where you can enjoy the sun.
Wouter is a perfect host, and gave us a bottle of wine for our arrival and a bowl full of fruits. I recommend this place ++++.

Wouter possÃ¨de un tres bel appartement dans un quartier trÃ©s agrÃ©able.
Je recommande !
Very friendly, generous, and accommodating people! The apartment is comfortable and in a great location.

L'appartement est parfait, trÃ¨s silencieux, on a tout ce qu'il faut Ã  disposition pas trop loin du centre ville. Wouter nous a laissÃ© une petite liste de magasins, restaurants et boulangerie ainsi qu'une bouteille de vin.
En rÃ©sumÃ©, nous avons passÃ© un excellent week-end Ã  Amsterdam, merci Wouter.
Great experience. Thanks for being flexible Wouter.

Wouter's apartment is great and located in hip district. You can reach the city center and the central station in 15 to 20 minutes. The communication and the check-in worked perfectly. So i would recommend you to stay in this apartment.

I stayed in Wouter's place for 2 nights. His place is 1) very central 2) very good nebiourhood 3) very comfortable. Started with excellent communication with Wouter. He answered all my questions and scheduled time to collect keys. Even tho we are bit late he was very accommodative. Everything about the experience was 1st class. Thanks for that Wouter.
chiarire meglio che la casa si trova al terzo piano senza ascensore
Good place to visit Amsterdam. Nice neighborhood and helpful host.
Great place, great location and clean. Had a fantastic time and would come back again, thanks!

Cozy appartment close to the city center, clean, all the stuff you need, Wouter is a really nice guy. On the last day we could stay as long as we wanted, no stress to leave at a certain time. Thanks for the great stay, top recommendation.

I had a week long comfortable stay at Wouter's place. It's in a great location, was clean, and it offered many amenities. Wouter was able to meet me personally to describe his apartment and he was very communicative before and during my stay. I recommend his place.
Great host and a really cozy and nice appartment a 10 out of 10!
Lovely flat in a great location. Fantastic hosts.
Wonderful stay. Wouter is a gracious host. Offered us excellent local tips. Apartment is centrally located and close to wonderful bars, restaurants and the bus/trains.

Rob's house is lovely located inmids museums and the Concertgebouw, close to bus, tram and supermarket. Being allowed to use his bike was most joyful.
I didn't meet rob personally, instead I was picked up and shown around by his girlfriend;
Thousands of books in the flat, a wonderful BÃ¶sendorfer grand, which I used intensively and a comfortable bed gave me the peaceful surroundings that I wished. The kitchen equipment rather on the rudimentary side, no problem however for me.
Any time again!
Amazing home and perfect location. Rob was very friendly and welcoming. Highly recommend this apartment!

I stayed at Rob's house over the weekend with a friend, and we had a great time. The house is spacious and cosy. It's in a quiet neighborhood but still close enough to the center. Rob was very nice and accommodating, and even let us use his bikes. I would gladly stay there again.
the location was amazing, the flat is little old and there are lot of steps, but nice place. however there was one bedroom and 2 singles bed in the room.

Le logement est typique d'Amsterdam, trÃ¨s propre. Rob est une personne gentille et prÃ©venante. Je le conseille vivement
Merci pour ce sÃ©jour Rob ;)

It was a great home base while staying in Amsterdam. There are lots of stairs, but this is to be expected in Amsterdam. The apartment was exactly as advertised. Rob was an easy going host. Rob was there at our scheduled check in time. Comfy bed, and warm shower. We had a great time.

Rob nous a mis Ã  l'aise tout de suite. Visite du lieu et explication fonctionnelle du logement nous ont convenu. Le quartier est tranquille et proche des principaux musÃ©es ainsi que du tram (ligne 5)...

Ich hatte einen sehr schÃ¶nen Aufenthalt in Amsterdam. Es ist eine nette Wohnung in einem ruhigen Viertel und die Verkehrsanbindung ist auch sehr gut. Die SchlÃ?sselÃ?bergabe hat gut funktioniert und ich fÃ?hlte mich gleich wie zu Hause. Alles hat super gepasst und ich kann diese Wohnung nur weiter empfehlen, man darf nur keine Angst vor zu vielen Stufen haben :D

This is a well located apartment at the very top of the building with many stairs on which you have to take care. they are dramatic and steep.
It was good exercise however if you didn't have to go in and out several times. The large bed was excellent and I slept very well. Layout is open plan with a lovely dining table - and toilets on each floor. Rob was away and his neighbour kindly let me in so to have it to myself was a bonus.
Shower room was surprisingly basic but overall it was good value .
I liked the area and I walked everywhere in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) was quiet and light being so high up.
Such a welcoming and friendly host! Great room, great view, great accommodations! So glad we found this place!!!!

We had a great stay at Ricks -the room and the whole apartment were very tidy, provided with clean towels and bed sheets -and good coffee :)! Rick was very nice and easy going and made us feel very comfortable!

Rick is a very nice person who radiates bliss and calm.
The apt is located in a peaceful and very green neighborhood. It was interesting to stay there to see the real life of Amsterdamers, not the touristy side of the city. It is 15 minutes from Schiphol by car/ 20 mins by train and it's 20 minutes from the city center by foot. The main attraction for me was the park that begins right behind the apartment block. Awesome place!
I can also say that the pictures don't give the credit to the room. It is better in reality: it is full of light and it overlooks the park. The only thing is the room is not spacious, the better part of it is taken by the bed.
The bathroom is rather big and very clean.
I enjoyed my stay immensely and can highly recommend the place.

Dear Rick, I am very gratefull to find such a beatifull human been and a wonderfull host.
It feels like home and it was nice to always have a host / friend to share my adventures / discoveries in the magnificent Amsterdam.
I found a wonderful host and left a friend.
Gratefull to you.

Two words: Highly recommended. Thank you Rick, what a good start on my stay in the Netherlands :-) The apartment and the room is very nice, comfortable and clean.

Rick is uniquely interested in making your stay as good as possible.

Rick was very sympathic and helpfull. He made everything possible for a perfect Amsterdam's trip. His appartement is very confortable and the Rembrant Park (where the building is) is very beautifull. The room was clean and the view very beautifull. Perfect B&B for me! Thanks Rick!
Rick was very nice and helpful. The flat is clean and comfortable. I definitely would stay at this place again. There is also a Park around. You can easily take the tram to the City Center.

I stayed at Rick's for two nights this week, having been to Amsterdam once before. It's definitely a very good option - excellent value for the price, for the following reasons:

1 The rooms is clean, spacious, nicely furnished, bathroom and kitchen are modern and well equipped.

2 The kitchen and living room areas are comfortable and the balcony is a good asset. Breakfast was good - lots of choice of fresh fruit, cereals, yogurt and decent tea.

3 Rick's place is very well placed for exploring the city and the green areas on inline skates or bike: The apartment is located in Rembrandtpark and just a few 10mins cycling from Vondelpark. It is also well connected with the city center by tram, bus and metro.

4 Rick is a wonderful host and I would gladly return to his B&B: I loved the yogurt with fresh strawberries and kiwis. I brought my inline skates and easily skated across the parks and to many wonderful places in the city.

I had a wonderful stay in Rick's apartment. The room was very nice with lots of natural light and a great view. The apartment was clean and comfortable. The apartment was in a great location, next to the park.

Rick is a welcoming host and is very accommodating. There were maps and guidebooks upon entering. He offered fresh fruit and yogurt and opened up his kitchen to the guests, which is rare on airbnb.

Overall, I would definitely stay there again.

First time with Airbnb and I guess there's nothing better I could have asked for. Rick is an excellent host. His place had the all the arrangements - maps, bike info, museum info, etc and located in a very peaceful and beautiful surrounding with park.

The apartment was very clean and tidy, open kitchen with great breakfast options and spacious enough room with comfortable bed. The airport pickup by Paul, a helpful guy, was an excellent arrangement too.

Rick is a smart and intelligent person to converse with, we talked a lot into the midnight and had interesting conversations.

I will surely stay here whenever I plan to come back to Amsterdam!

I had an awesome stay at Rick's. He is a highly engaged host and did everything possible to make my stay as comftable as possible. Thank you very much! I will probably come back soon as I have to travel to Amsterdam more regulary from now on.
Rick was very accomodating. Our flight was delayed and he was more than happy to meet us at a different time. He is of couse very friendly and polite.

Rick's apartment is an excellent place to stay in Amsterdam. It's not central but is only a short walk from a good tram connection, or a pleasant walk into the city. From the 12th floor you get great views, including over the adjacent park. The furnishings and fittings are of a high standard and Rick is a very neat and tidy person.

He's also an excellent airbnb host, easy and interesting to talk to and helpful with tips about his city. The museum card is a wonderful bonus for guests! Good wifi. Nice breakfast provisions. A real 'make yourself at home' attitude.

I'd very happily stay here again, and highly recommend Rick's place.
Rick is a very nice and polite gentleman. He ensures that you are given the utmost comfort while you are staying at his apartment. I felt really nice to meet Rick

Rick is the perfect host - extremely personable and friendly, and went beyond my expectations to ensure my visit was comfortable and pleasurable. The room was superb - excellent views of Amsterdam throughout the flat. His decorating tastes are impeccable - the nice art, decorations and furniture provide a sophisticated yet very personable atmosphere. The location was perfect for me, for it's just a short bike ride (or tram ride) to all the action in the center of Leidseplein square (and then onwards to Amsterdam central). I'd recommend a stay with Rick 10 times over - you will not be dissappointed!
I had an awesome stay at Rick's in Amsterdam. The apartment on the whole is very nice and efficiently operated. Breakfast was a great touch.

Rick was the consummate host. He was warm and friendly and gave me good recommendations for places to visit. He even took me out to dinner for my birthday!

His place is beautiful and is exactly as described in the listing. I found it very easy to get to the tram and to buses to get around the city.

Rick is wonderful and very nice host. If you plan to visit Amsterdam, I highly recommend you to be a guest there. The view from your room and balcony are spacious and very good. I made a salad to get smoked salmon at a supermarket near there and ate it in the balcony. It was amazing. Try it! Also dining and kitchen are also very comfortable and high sense as you see in his pictures. There is a Rembrant park that is quiet and peaceful near the place. That park is my favorite in Amsterdam. You'd like if you can see. Additionally I liked to eat fruits and drink some tea and juice in the kitchen he kindly offers.

Me and my boyfriend stayed at Rick's gorgeous apartment for 4 days. Everything about our stay was perfect! Rick offered to pick us up at the airport, so finding the place was super easy :) the breakfast was great! And what a great idea to make it self service! The bed was nice, the view was AMAZING, and the location was perfect. This has honestly been the best place I've stayed with airbnb ever. Beside how great the place was, Rick and his friend were extremely nice and friendly, and we're a big part of making our vacation perfect :)

Ric's place was great place to stay after i had a long and tired journey. It was Great to talk to Emilia who made sure I had everything i needed at the house. A little far from the city center but a perfect place for those who want to relax and enjoy the park. Laundry is available for 20 euros which I think is high!
Beautiful apartment, extremely hospitable, very clean and I had a wonderful stay.  Thank you so much for offering your home through airbnb!

Very nice experience! Ricks roommate welcomed us warmly and showed us around. We found the place to be a stylish and outstandingly clean apartment and felt very comfortable from the beginning. The kitchen was more than fully equipped and we could choose out of a big variety of food and drinks. Rick showed up only a little later. He was a very gentle and caring host. We really enjoyed our stay and can highly recommend this comfy place.

Rick provided friendly, comfortable, and convenient accommodation in Amsterdam. The apartment, although a 15min tram ride and 10min walk from the middle of the city, is on the edge of beautiful Rembrandt park, and is peaceful and quiet with astonishing views. I appreciated Rick and his housemate's attentiveness and help. I would not hesitate to recommend Rick to my friends and family, and would happily stay with him again on subsequent trips to Amsterdam.

Rick was an excellent host, very welcoming and always asking if there was any way he make our stay more comfortable. The location was fantastic, a quick bike ride into the city centre. He was fantastic by supplying breakfast and recommending other great places in the city to visit. The apartment itself was extremely clean and well taken care of, we were extremely happy with the reservation, and will defiantly recommend it to any staying in the city!

Rick is an excellent host who takes care of visitors. Cleanness is everywhere which is so important when different people come for  some days. I am glad to have been his guest and would like to visit him again. Besides, the location of the appartment is right next to the wonderful park. No words to express its beauty!

Pour notre premier sÃ©jour Ã  Amsterdam nous avons choisis airbnb pour notre hÃ©bergement, ce fÃ»t aussi notre premiÃ¨re expÃ©rience de ce type. Notre rencontre avec notre hÃ´te Rick, a Ã©tÃ© des plus agrÃ©ables, Rick est un homme formidable, et Ã©galement un hÃ´te excellent, il est d'un gentillesse, et d'un attention que j'ai rarement vu nous le recommandons Ã  tous, d'ailleurs nous avons tellement aimÃ© qu'on envisage dÃ©jÃ  un prochain sÃ©jour, Ã  Amsterdam est deviner chez qui ???, chez Rick bien sÃ»r .
And one lil message for you Rick, you Ã  great person we are honnored to meet, we wish see you quickly.
Bye and see you soon

Rick and Emilia are very nice person. the place is very clean and wonderful.
I really like Rick's painting on the wall. it looks very cool :)
and I can prepare my own breakfast, it was very nice to me :D
but it was a little bit sad, I could not say goodbye when I left. because my flight was very early morning, and I tried to knock Emilia's door, but seems like Emilia was still sleeping. but anyway, it was very nice place!!!!!!!!!!!

Wow! Where do I begin. Rick was immensely accommodating. He let me use, unexpectedly, his bike, a museum pass. He had lots of food in the fridge even though I didn't partake that much . the room and house was very clean, well ordered, with great art and appointments. The view from the large bedroom window has a magnificent vista of Rembrandt park. while not in the city center, it is an easy,d delightful bike ride to the center.

Rick and Emilia are wonderful and extremely friendly people who made our staying literally great. Neighborhood is just perfect and really easy to get to the city center. Flat is clean and design is superb. :) Highly recommend! :)
I had a great time at Rick's. Very spacious living room with a beautiful view. Very shanti : a buddha statue, statues of Christ... Very pleasant stay with beautiful people. I felt home.

My girlfriend and I spent 3 days in Amsterdam and enjoyed staying at ricks place. His flat is clean, very tasteful furnished and decorated and has a great view. Rick is a very nice and hospitable person as well as Emilia.
We would stay there any time again.
I enjoyed staying with Rick very much.  His residence is very neat and it is no problem at all getting to the heart of the city.

Rick and his house mate Emilia are amazing people. Ä° realy love them. House at great locaition and so easy to go somewhere and came back. My room and bad was so confortable. Rick and Emilia  are give me museum card and the broshures abouth city and tips offcourse and they realy be helpfull. Ä° wanna thank you people for everythinks. Especialy bycicle lessons Emilia :)))))

Rick is very friendly and hospitable, he let me use his bike and museum card to get around this city which made the stay in Amsterdam very enjoyable. The place is very clean and beautifully decorated. It  had plenty of breakfast in stock, the room overlooks the park and you can get to the city center with a 15-20 min bike ride. Overall it was a great stay!

Rick was a great host. I never actually met him but he arranged for his friend to be there to give me keys and show me around. The apartment and room were spotless and have a nice high view including a balcony. The location is quiet and pleasant in a tree-filled park, and it's an easy direct bike ride of only 10-15 minutes into the city center area.

Rick also provided complimentary breakfast, a bike for me to rent, and laundry machines in the apartment I could use for a fee. He even had a museum card I borrowed to go to museums for free, which more than offset the cost of the bike and laundry! I was very happy with the stay and couldn't have asked for anything more.

Rick was a very friendly host who made our staying just perfect.
We only could stay for a very short time but i will definitely go back shortly. It was really easy to get to the city center. Beautifull design in the flat and everything was clean. A must if you want to visit Amsterdam!!!
Beautiful  and immaculate place! The location is perfect, right between the airport and the city center. Would highly recommend to anyone vising Amsterdam.

Het was wederom een zeer prettig verblijf in Amsterdam. Een prachtige locatie om een goede nachtrust te genieten om zo de stad te bekijken, een congres te bezoeken of andere activiteiten te doen. Rick is de ideale gastheer voor een top verblijf!

I had a most pleasant stay in RickÂ´s apartment. The room was bright and cheerful, with a view of the park. The bath and WC were also sparkling clean. The area is quiet and the park couldnÂ´t be handier for a stroll.

I had a lovely stay at Rick's beautiful place - he is a very kind and friendly person and his apartment is spotless. The bed was full-size and comfortable. The breakfast was generous and self-serve. I would definitely stay there again. The use of the museum card was a great perk.

I'd highly recommend staying with Rick!!
I was picked up from the airport by Rick's friend Paul which was great and cheaper than a taxi :) and as soon as I stepped through the front door I was made to feel at home. I didn't see much of Rick but Emilia (rick's room mate) was there if I needed her for any help or advice.
Thank you :) for a great time

I had a great experience in Amsterdam, and much of it is due to Rick's hospitality.  The room was clean and comfortable, and living space/breakfast all enjoyable.  Rick was very flexible and allowed me to check in much earlier than normal due to an early 8 AM arrival.  The free museum pass to all museums in the area was extremely helpful and well used.  However, it was the bike rental that truly *made* Amsterdam a unique experience for me!  I highly recommend renting the bike for trips all over town, be sure to get a quick briefing on biking etiquette and how to lock the bike securely.  The ease of being able to leave the biked locked literally anywhere in town was very convenient.  Thanks, Rick and Emilia!

The room and the apartment is very cool and comfortable. You have two tram lines and a bus line near the apartment of Rick and you are actually in a few minutes in the best parts of Amsterdam. Night bus lines are the same lines as during the day.
We felt very good. Rick and his friend Emilia were very friendly and pollite. You can ask them for whatever you want about the city. After we woke up next day, we had breakfast and it we felt so free - like being home.
Simply: recommandable

Nice apartment, beautifully done up and great views from the big windows.  Near to the city and it's sights - it took me less than 10 minutes to reach Jordaan and the downtown by bike. I much preferred to live away not in the downtown but a bit away nearer to the Rembrandt park, better for jogging in the morning and maybe not feeling like being in a tourist trap all the time. Rick was a great host and very kind.

We have been to Amsterdam for 1 week. We really liked our stay at Rick's place. Good situated to public transport and a very nice view from the flat. We also had some nice talks with them and enjoyed every second of our stay

Rick war ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber - vor allem aber auch seine Mitbewohnerin Emilia, welche mich empfangen hat. Das Zimmer war sehr schÃ¶n und sauber, ebenfalls das gesamte Apartment. Es ist nahe der Innenstadt gelegen, welche mit einem kurzen Spaziergang oder mit dem Tram erreichbar ist.
Herzlichen Dank fÃ?r den angenehmen Aufenthalt!

Nice stay in Rick's appartment, everything is done to make you feel comfortable . very quiet and restful place .
Beautiful and very clean appartment , kind attentions from the host , the appartment is very easy to localize and not far from common transportation and from the central station .
I had a great experience in Amsterdam. I was not expecting an excellent home-cooked meal, which was perfect after my long trip. Thank you very much, Rick.

It was an amazing weekend in Amsterdam.
Rick is friendly and always helpful, he gave great tips to us to enjoy Amsterdam!
His apartment is very clean and it is absolutely perfect for bed n breakfast.
Thanks for making this great trip even better!

Spiffy, clean, clean, clean. Comfortable bed. Rick and Emelia made us most welcome at their flat just off Rembrandt Park. They gave us a good verbal orientation to Amsterdam and offered their bikes for a reasonable rate each day. For breakfast they provided fresh fruit, cereal, yogurt, coffee...very nice. Initially, we thought we were off the beaten track, but grew to enjoy our walk home through the park from the trams, which take you everywhere. Our hosts made us feel comfortable and gave us privacy. We all shared one bath and a separate bathroom, but it caused no problems. We definitely recommend this apartment.

My friend and I had a wonderful stay at Mel's apartment. The apartment was very pretty and nicely decorated. Comfortable bed, nice bathroom, and a washer. The location was excellent. A quiet neighborhood, but still within walking distance of some nice restaurants/bars. A couple minutes walk from a tram stop, which gets you into the city center in about 10 minutes. If you want to walk, it takes 30 minutes to get to the city center.

Mel was an amazing host. She was so friendly and very easy to contact if we had any questions. When we first arrived, she took the time to sit down with us and showed us maps she had and asked us if we had any questions about the city. She was even kind enough to provide us with a little breakfast food for our stay!

I would definitely recommend this AirBnB to anyone!
Excellent hospitailty! Very clean, tidy, friendly and welcomming environment. We loved the stay and highly recommend to anyone travelling to this destinataion!
The reservation was canceled 8 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Mel is extremely considerate and helpful. She sent website info to help plan my travels within Amsterdam along with detailed info to her place. There were even snacks in the fridge!
Pros: the space was bright and clean. Close to the tram and in a nice neighborhood with places to eat and drink nearby. Supermarkets were close too.
Cons: nothing I can think of. Mel is very accommodating so if you need anything at all just ask!

Mel is a lovely host. Due to a mixup in our planning, we arrived a week early, but our host was kind and understanding. She made things very easy for us and we really enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam. As for the apartment, it is in great condition with plenty of space and natural light. The bed comfortable - we slept like stones. The area around the apartment is great. Not vey touristy, but there are good restaurants and pubs a few minutes away and the hustle of central A'dam is a quick 15 minutes by foot or less by tram. Lastly, Mel made us feel welcome at her home by offering some breakfast foods and coffee for the mornings. Highly recommended!!

Mel hat uns in ihrem zu Hause herzlich empfangen. Wir haben uns von Beginn weg sehr wohl gefÃ?hlt. Als Willkommensgeste hat uns Mel das FrÃ?hstÃ?ck fÃ?r den ersten Morgen in Amsterdam bereit gestellt. Die Wohnung ist super schÃ¶n und gemÃ?tlich, in ruhiger Umgebung. Und dennoch zentral gelegen.
The host canceled this reservation 18 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I stayed at MelâÄôs apartment a bit less than a week. The apartment is very cute, clean and full of light. It is located in a quiet neighborhood and has good public transportation connection. Mel herself is friendly, cheerful and very helpful. Some breakfast food in the fridge and a package of stroopwafels for the guest was a very sweet touch to the whole experience. Perfect place to stay!

Mel was very kind host!
She kindly greet me even though I arrived late!
The location was very good to go many spots, such as Amsterdam central and many museums.
The room was very comfortable as well.
I strongly recommend to stay Mel's house!

Mel was a good host. She was informative and gave good directions to her flat. Her flat was close enough to public transportation and sites to walk to or ride a bike. I would recommend her place fellow travelers.

Mel is a wonderful host. She made us feel welcome and show us how to get around. We allowed to use her fridge and kitchen. She provide linen and nice big bed. The apartment location is perfect. Nice garden view from balcony. I found it as a nice and neat place ,the problem is we are from USA and we use to A/C at all season(lol), she doesn't have any Air Conditioner or fan and also her neighbor allowed to party till around 12am on weekend. So that noise travel inside the house pretty clear without a white noise from ac. But if you like to party, I supposed it's not going to bother you at all.
Mel is a very kind and helpful host. Her apartment was clean and sweet. If you are searching a comfortable house in a good location with nice host, you can stay at Mel's house.

Polite and respectable host, I was welcomed to feel almost as at home: clean, calm, clear instructions. Could walk to the center all time as I was on holidays. This place made my time relaxing, exactly what I expected!
Situado cerca del centro pero en un barrio tranquilo. Apartamento con bonitas vistas y una anfitriona muy amable y silenciosa.

Mel is a great host with a very nice apartment that is within walking distance from the main areas of Amsterdam. The guest bedroom and bathroom were clean and comfortable with no issues. Mel went out of her way to make us feel at home, staying up to welcome our late arrival, laying out snacks in the kitchen, and providing sight-seeing advice for the city. Would definitely recommend!
Fleur went out of her way to make me comfortable when I arrived, and during my stay. Quite area, with easy trams to the centre town.

Very nice apartment with a good balcony! Really easy to find and very good neighbor hood. Fleur was a really good host and very relaxed and easy to communicate with. We don't have anything negative to say.
Mel's apartment is very nice. It's really confortable and Mel is helpful and polite..the zone is good and near to the metro. I suggest this apartment! :)

Mel's place is the perfect size for 1-2 travellers looking to be central to public transit but in a quiet neighborhood. There are plenty of things close by, grocery store, foodhallen, shops and parks as well as the canal out the window. Mel helped with planning transit, offered ideas and maps of things to do, and even had stuff for us for breakfast the first night. We were so grateful to stay here in this beautiful place.
I really enjoyed staying at this place in Amsterdam,  it is clean and charming and near the tram. The bedroom is a bit small but overall it was a very pleasant stay.

I booked a very last minute stay at Mel's place and she was very helpful and accommodating. Her place is spotless and beautifully decorated, the photos don't do it justice!
She provided some breakfast things which was lovely and replaced my towels half way through my stay, which was unexpected and a thoughtful touch. Her place is in a great location, with lots of cafes, restaurants and bars around but her apartment is still very quiet. It is no more than a half hour walk to most things if you like walking or there's a tram and bike hire place nearby. She respected my privacy but was also always happy to have a chat. I would definitely stay at Mel's again!
Fleur was great, very personable and helpful! I would give my highest recommendation to anyone looking to stay. Thanks again for everything and for stroopwafels when we arrived!

Mels place was exactly as described. To quote "Friends", it was "not only clean, it was Monica clean". The apartment is beautiful and very functional, one gets to experience the essence of Amsterdam immediately by stepping out to the balcony. Mel made us feel very welcome with breakfast supplies and Dutch treats left on the table. She was not in Amsterdam herself at the time, but communication and getting the keys was a breeze anyway. The location is excellent if one wants to see how the locals live. Tourists stay a bit further and the location is lively but quiet. I would stay at Mels again and recommend it to everyone who enjoys things mentioned above.

Our stay at Mel's apartment was all in all quite nice. The communication with Mel was great, the pictures accurate and the apartment clean. The downsides of our stay were the price and the location. Over 120âÇ¬ per night for a private room in that location is kind of ridiculous. Don't get me wrong the location is not bad. The city centre is about a 20 min walk or 5-7 min ride with the bike away. But we would probably not book it again.

Mel's place is nice and clean, just like the pictures shown.  Except those stairs lead to her unit were steep and small, there would be no problem unless you are bringing large and heavy luggage.  Mel made us feel welcomed, she got us some tangerines and a bag of stroopwafel.  Thanks Mel, we enjoyed our stay in your home in Amsterdam!

Stylish space, kind host, great location. Bed is comfortable and very large though the bedroom is a bit small. Not in downtown Amsterdam but very close to multiple tram stops. Quiet neighborhood with lots to walk to.
Loved Mel's apartment and it was a great base for exploring Amsterdam. The apartment was pretty and clean and Mel was a thoughtful and considerate host. Would happily stay there again!
Great apartment in a nice neighbourhood, not too far from the centre

The place description and pictures are accurate. It very neat and two tram stations away from Anne frank museum. All the key attraction are within 15 mins by Public transport. A tram station is within a couple of minutes walk. The location is really good and so is Fleur. She is very considerate and kind.
Fleur is an absolutly amazing host. We enjoyed our stay at her lovely apartement a lot and would definitely come back any time.

Clean, handy apartment. Mel was a lovely host. Provided us with tea and coffee. Gave us helpful tips and also gave us space in her apparent.
Easy to reach centre of Amsterdam by foot, 20mins. By tram or even better by bike. We hired bikes close by and kept them for our three day trip. It really is the best way to see Amsterdam.

Mel's place is in a great location, easily accessible by tram and close to all major attractions. The neighborhood is very calm and serene. It was our first visit to Amsterdam and we absolutely loved her place. Room is on the smaller side, but very comfortable. Especially good neighborhood for Indian tourists craving some home food as there is a grocery shop nearby which stocks all items like Maggi, Kurkure etc :p
Good communication, kind, and an easy commute into the city via bike or tram! Cant wait to get back

Stay here! The location is perfect -- far enough away from the toursity central Amsterdam area to feel like you're really staying with locals, but close enough by bike, foot, or tram to get to any of the main attractions you'd want to see quite quickly. The apartment itself is so cute and comfortable, and the hospitality is unparalleled. Would absolutely stay again!
Great place, great host. I would definitely recommend it!

MelâÄôs place is just a walk away from the centre of Amsterdam and a tram ride away from most of the attractions!

You can look forward to a warm and lovely place with a very hospitable host that you can come back to and relax after a days worth of walking around the city.

Thank you so much for making me and my cousinâÄôs New Year a very memorable one!

Mel was very lovely and helpful. Her apartment was clean and cosy. The heating was great, the kitchen and bathroom were modern and the bed comfy. We could use her coffee and tea, and she made space for us in the fridge. We had a very relaxing stay. ItâÄôs walking distance to a couple of different tram lines so that made it easy to get every where.

My 6 night stay at MelâÄôs was very enjoyable. Mel was a gracious host whose apartment I had full access to. It was a nicely appointed and comfortable apartment in a quiet neighborhood away from the hectic bustle of the city. Mel let me use her refrigerator and terrace and living room, the wifi was strong, everything very clean. The bedroom was comfortable and private. Whenever I had a question about a location or how to get there, Mel was very helpful, even obtaining a ticket to the Anne Frank House for me before I arrived. This was very good service.

A tram stop is only a few minutes walk and the tram gets you into the old center in 10 mins. the Centraal station in 15 mins. To walk to the Anne Frank House is about 20 mins and a nice easy walk.

MelâÄôs hospitality enhanced my visit to Amsterdam and I highly recommend her place.

I stayes at Mel's place for 3 nights and felt really comfortable there. The room and the overall flat are clean, bright and located in an extremely quite street. The flat is few steps from a tram stop to Amsterdam Central train station, so perfect to come and go to the airport, and walking distance to the centre.
Mel was communicative and helpful, with a plus for being flexible for the check-out.
I woul definitely recommend to stay there and hope to come back next time in Amsterdam.

Great place in a good location, very good team connections right to the center of Amsterdam. The place was clean and had everything we need to spend the night. The host is wonderful and accommodating, trying to help us what all we need :) Thanks for hosting us
Wonderful host in a great area. Very walkable with good bars and restaurants nearby. Not an overly touristy location but still close to everything. Would stay here again, thanks!

We stayed at this houseboat this weekend and was very happy with it!the beds were very comfortable and even with 6 of us on there it never felt too cramped.we seen the host a few times during our stay and every time she was very helpful and always made sure we had everything we needed. Breakfast was supplied for us and tea/coffee facilities with a very reasonably priced mini. Also on southern comfort you gave use of kayaks which were great. At the end of the road there is a very relaxing bar/restaurant where you can have a chilled drink and watch the waterways of Amsterdam. I would recommend this place if you would like a chilled place away from the busy streets of Amsterdam but still within 15-20 minutes walking distance to everything. Thanks for a nice stay and would return again. Many thanks Andy.

Jona Ã¨ una persona simpatica ed alla mano, tempestiva nelle comunicazioni e flessibile nell'organizzazione generale.
L'annuncio Ã¨ molto preciso, anzi forse rende meno di quanto dovrebbe nel senso che sia il bagno che la cucina sono comodi e non c'Ã¨ stato nessun problema nell'usufruirne, mentre all'inizio eravamo perplessi (gruppo di 5 persone). I letti morbidissimi, unica pecca chi dorme sul letto a castello potrebbe stare un po "stretto". In linea generale comunque era tutto pulito ed in buono stato. Il terrazzo sul tetto della barca davvero fiabesco di sera.
Il quartiere Ã¨ caratteristico, una passeggiata nel verde costeggiando il canale, con le caratteristiche house boat, mentre si osserva il panorama della cittÃ .
A piedi dalla stazione centrale dista poco meno di 10 minuti.
Ci siamo trovati veramente bene, piÃ? che consigliato come annuncio!

A real Amsterdam esperienze! BohÃ©mien, like Jona, the owner, she's a school teacher and she really takes care of you. I was there with my two boys (14 and 17) we really enjoyed! Rent bykes, in 4 minutes ride you'll be in the heart of the beatiful city

Jona was very nice and helpfull!
The boat is ideally located : close to the centruum and in a quiet area.
Highly recommanded

Great location, quiet and out the way but easy to get anywhere in the city. Jona was a great host! Everything was taken care of and we had everything we needed. The boat is a great place to come and rest after a day exploring the city. We are looking forward to our next trip!

Jona was the perfect host. She was very organised and made sure we were comfortable. We loved her gorgeous houseboat, very cool way to experience Amsterdam and see another way of life. The boat was located only 10 minute walk from centraal station, which was perfect for getting to the main attractions of Amsterdam and still having a nice quiet place to come back to in the evening.

Jona was a very helpful and friendly host, who welcomed us aboard her houseboat. All utilities were as described- the overall impression was actually even better than anticipated due to the amount of style this boat has got. The roof works great as a terrace, sunbathing there is the real deal. I need to come back here soon.

Jona was a great hostess, she was very welcoming and took care of us. My friends and I wouldn't hesitate to return to the houseboat in our next visit to Amsterdam. It had surprisingly good facilities, and sitting on the roof of the boat was very pleasant. The location was perfect with a short walk to the centre and a supermarket, I would recommend this facility to anyone. I cannot stress enough how welcoming Jona was!
Jona was amazing. The boat was a ton of fun to stay on and in a great location. Great communication and overall stay. I highly recommend it.

We spend two days I this amazing houseboat. The pictures are not overstating how awesome and special it is. The sundeck was really nice as well, and we enjoyed kayaking on the canal. Moreover, it is litteraly 5 minutes by foot from central stations and the very center of Amsterdam.

The host was very welcoming and the houseboat was perfect in terms of comfort and as a place to live in.  The location was ideal for its proximity to old Amsterdam and the fun to be had while still being in a quiet and welcoming neighborhood.

Location was excellent for SAIL 2015, car parking nearby, only a short walk away. Amsterdam centre and Dam square a  comfortable walk away. Everything that was needed was available, very clean, neat and tidy. Only had two nights but really enjoyed our stay on the houseboat.
ZuverlÃ?ssige Gastgeberin, Unterkunft war wie beschrieben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefÃ?hlt, zum Weiterempfehlen.

AÃºn cuando Jona nos avisÃ? que no podrÃ?a estar, la recepciÃ?n de su vecina Silvia fue perfecta. Nos puso al dÃ?a de las peculiaridades de la casa, del barrio y nos recomendÃ? montones de lugares que visitar. MÃ¡s adelante conocimos a Jona y a Daan que completaros esa informaciÃ?n con sus preferencias personales.
Un experiencia curiosa con todas las comodidades de cualquier apartamento y muy cerca de la estaciÃ?n central, eje de la ciudad, en una calle con un encanto especial.

The boat is situated so well and so accessible.  It is incredibly  quiet.  The rooms are clean and well maintained.  The kitchen area is modern and the self prepared breakfast is exactly what you need.  We spent a night there with three kids and it was Great!
The houseboat Southern Comfort was very well appointed, clean and comfortable. Both Jona and Siet were very welcoming and provided information which helped us to make the most of our trip.

The houseboat was very clean and neat - a pleasure to stay aboard!  Jona was very helpful and pleasant.  Everything we needed was there - even had breakfast supplies available for us.  The location was convenient for walking or catching the tram.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam - just wish the weather had been better!

Great Houseboot, good breakfast and very helpfully and nice owner and neighbours.
Thanks Jona :)
Great location, nice and clean accommodation. Nice breakfast And the kids loved the top deck.

Jona was zelf niet aanwezig. Maar Sietske wel. Alles volgens afspraak en keurig op tijd. Voordeel is dat de locatie vlak bij de gopedkoopste parkeergarage van Amsterdam is gelegen. Je betaald maar 15 euro per dag. Sietske had nog een sloepje geregeld (âÇ¬ 80,- extra) om vanaf de boot naar Amsterdam te varen. Het is een zeer rustige omgeving. je hebt echt geen last van de treinen.

I loved the pared-down elegance of Jona's beautifully renovated vintage houseboat.  This is very clean and comfortable accommodation in a great location.  My children rated it as one of the highlights of their visit to Amsterdam.  Jona was friendly, efficient and helpful.
We really enjoyed our vacation in the houseboat. Top location (5 min by bike to the city). The boat was perfect: clean, comfortable and stylish. We will come back asap. Thank you so much
Perfect location, Nice boat.. Definitely a good rent to who wants to discover Amsterdam
Exclusive accommodation on a very well maintained boat, ideally located just minutes from the train station. Very friendly welcome and very well organized, for a too short stay. We will come back !

The boat was an awesome experience! It is a bit more expensive than other options, but stayin on a boat right close to everything, walking distance to so many great attractions, it was well worth it.
The 4 of us plus our small 3 year old son stayed on the boat. Jona's friend came by and showed us everything, she was super nice and went far and beyond our expecations to make sure we had a great time.
We were only there for a day and a half, but we took her advice to see various spots. Would definitely recommend to stay here.
Has a full kitchen and a bathroom with shower, and has internet as well. It was an awesome experience.

Tidy boat with two large airy bedrooms with large windows, each easily take 3 (double + top bunk), both have TV. Kitchen area as you walk in with seating space for 4, although no view when seated, well-equipped including combined microwave/mini-oven. Combined shower/toilet at the rear (off kitchen) relatively roomy for a boat, decent temperature and flow to shower. 'Lounge' at the front of boat permanently locked, used by owner. Roof accessible to sit out and watch life on the canal. Heating was effective.

Feels quiet and detached from city despite 3 minutes from tram or 15 minutes from central station by foot, although some noise when trains go past. Friendly bohemian feel to the area, no generators or dogs.

Delightful support from host, who couldn't have been more friendly and helpful.

The boat was every bit as comfortable and inviting as the pictures make out. Fully equipped kitchen with breakfast supplies, lovely rooms and a really cosy feel. Only 15 mins walk from the station in a quiet, quirky part of town away from the crowds. Jona was a fantastically helpful host from start to finish.

Overall, ideal stay here, and lovely ducks to greet you in the morning, too!
First time living on a boat! Clever designed houseboat, basically equipped with anything we need! Sietske is so nice and warm! Hope to see you soon!

Staying with Jona and Daan was an absolute delight. The boat is situated about 15 minutes walking distance from the central train station, about half an hours walk to Dam square. Hosts are really good people and go the distance in making you feel like a welcome houseguest instead of a paying customer.  I can't find words strong enough to recommend staying with them.  I'm hoping I can visit again soon.

Acceuil aussi agreable que le sejour dans logement atypique.
Merci pour tout.

I stayed with a friend of mine and it was an amazing experience - beds were great shower and toilet were fine and although the heater stopped working one night the duvets kept us warm!
Took out the canoes in the morning and jobs and sietske were both very helpful hosts and have recommendations for things worth doing in Amsterdam
the welcome was great , kindness and attention they granted us very pleased . we found what we expected

Sietske and Jona worked with us on checking in a lot earlier than normal. I had never used Airbnb before and they gave me all the info I needed and answered all the questions I had.
Sietska checked in with us and messaged us on the App when we were out in the city. The drink's in the fridge were a nice touch and not any more expensive than going down to the store.
We are already talking about going back as soon as possible.
It was such a pleasant stay. Where else can you make a bonfire right in center of one of the most lovely capitals in Europe. Thank you so much for your hospitality Jona

We were met by Sietske who was welcoming and most helpful. Neighbourhood was great. Listing accurate. Boat clean with all amenities. Walk to station and city was doable just pity that the chilly wind kept us company on the walk. Directions and communication excellent.

I stayed three nights on the houseboat, together with my boyfriend and two friends of us. The experience was great and I would recommend this special place to everyone! Sietske, a friend of Jona, took care about us on our arrival. She was very friendly, explained us everything and gave us great advises about what to do in Amsterdam. The boat is very clean and very quiet. Just great!! :)

This was my first time with airbnb and Jona was very helpful with guiding me through the booking process. We got a very warm welcome by Jona, and stayed for 2 nights. The boat was very charmful, easy accessible and in a very nice and calm neighbourhood, about 10 minutes walk from the Central Station. Jona advised us with some things to see/do and kept us informed in between. Everything to have an easy stay was provided and the boat was very clean. Definitely one of the best experiences we had in Amsterdam!

A very lovely place and good advices about visiting Amsterdam. An original place to stay, in a quiet area, only 10 mn from Amsterdam Centraal by walk. Thanks to Jona for this place, thanks to Sietske for welcome.

Un accueil trÃ¨s agrÃ©able et de bons conseils de visites de la ville d'Amsterdam. Un lieu de villÃ©giature original, dans un quartier calme, Ã  seulement 10 mn de marche de Amsterdam Centraal. Merci Jona pour cet endroit, merci Sietske pour l'accueil.

Herve

Besser kann man in Amsterdam nicht wohnen! Es ist ruhig und trotzdem nah zu allen wichtigen Punkten in Amsterdam. Man ist unabhÃ?ngig und kann sich wie zu Hause fÃ?hlen. Bleibt lieber ein paar NÃ?chte mehr, als in ein Luxus-Hotel zu investieren!
Danke Jona!

Jona was a great host and the houseboat southern comfort is a very comfortable boat.  Jona was kind and helpful, so was Sietske, her neighbour. We felt at home. The boat was well maintaned, clean and spacious. It was located in a quiet gracht so we could chill out just next to the canal on the deck on top of the boat and had a wonderful time. Many thanks:)))

We had such a wonderful time on this beautiful, charming houseboat with many nice small details and we will definitively come back. It is located in a side gracht 10 minutes from the station and very near the centre and public transport in a beautiful, colourful post-industrial area. There was even a duckfamily living next to the boat. The boat was well maintained, clean and felt very spacious for a boat. Breakfast was just perfect. We were very warmly welcomed by Sietske, a neighbour, who explained all important details concerning the boat very well. Jona, also very nice, came by later. We were provided with very suitable ideas where to go and what to do. We still spent much time on the boat and on the rooftop when the weather was dry enough. Thank you so much!

Jona was busy so her friend received and settled us in. She was very professional and polite. It was abundantly clear that Jona put a veritable effort into making the stay as comfortable as possible. Jona stands out as an host by having a binder full of local tourism information. The information focused on authentic amsterdam experiences and strayed away from the tourist traps. All the amenities were clearly labeled and instructions provided for all facilities. The houseboat was a delight to stay in, close to the city center, but also in an authentic part of town away from the hustle and bustle. We also took full use of the kayaks provided and toured the canals nearby; it was amazing. Staying here was truly a unique and comfortable experience and a great story to tell your friends about.

Thanks from both of us to both you and Sietske for the warm welcome and for the suggestions as to where to. We loved the market and have been eating the lovely bread we bought there for breakfast this morning back in Manchester.
What a great way to enjoy Amsterdam!  Great location. Great accommodation. Jona was superb!

Terrific experience!!! The houseboat is located a bit away from the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam, but within easy walking distance...perfect for us! Very clean. Jona was very helpful and we enjoyed talking with her. Sietske, who helps to manage the property, was very helpful in providing information about the area, and was welcoming. They both us feel at home, and it was like being a local for a few days.
A kitchen stocked with breakfast food and a washer and dryer were a plus. We didn't use the kayaks but if we had more time it would have been fun!
Staying on this houseboat was a highlight of our stay. It was so relaxing to return from a day of sightseeing to this serene area. We stopped at a market so we could enjoy cheese, meats, olives, fruit and wine at the table on the top deck of the boat at sunset each evening. Those moments were among the most memorable of our trip. If this boat is available you should request it quickly!

Everything was great!
Like home...

I had a great time in Madelijn appartment. It`s quite spacious and very nice. Everything was well prepared and I felt myself welcomed. There was even a bottle of wine waiting for us. The host was very flexible with both checkin and checkout times. The communication was very smooth.

I also appreciated that the appartment is right on a tram, that will take you directly to the center under 10min. The kitchen is really well equipped. Best thing of all is without a doubt the view from the roof top terrace. It is magical. I will be definitely coming back.

The apartment had a lot of light, very clean, instructions on the table about supermarket nearby, wifi instructions and how to turn on the stove. Bus from the airport 23 min and 1 min nearby bus stop. Very convenient. Great and healthy place for breakfast down the street, Bagel and Beans. Lot of stairs to get to the apartment, but once in a paradise. Tram very close to go to downtown. Very silent to sleep. I recommend it!

This apartment is a very cool place, especially if you like being near the Vondelpark. The area is full of restaurants and services (there's even lots of organic stores nearby), and right on a tram line. There's a bistro on the ground floor of the building, so there was some noise on Saturday nights, but it didn't go late. The top-floor flat has a roomy layout and a pleasant setting, and the rooftop deck is fantastic - we went up every chance we could. The place feels very hip and has everything you'd need. It's not central to the city, but we wouldn't want to stay in central Amsterdam anyway.

The stay at Madelijns apartment was great. As she was on holiday her boyfriends brother brought us the keys on time, showed us the apartment and introduced us to the neighborhood- he was really lovely and helpful during our whole stay.
There were "Welcome"-chocolate and instructions on the table about the apartment and everything nearby. The supermarket and the public-transport-stations are very close and it didn't took us long to get to everything.
The apartment itself is so cozy, beautiful and clean as seen in the pictures- we felt very comfortable. Even if we were a bit unlucky with the weather, when we had a chance to use the terrace it was wonderful. The view from the roof top terrace is just great.
They were also very flexible with both checkin and checkout times and we were allowed to leave our luggage until the evening, which was a great help. We also had a chance to meet the host when we left, and they were really lovely. The whole time the communication was very smooth and fast. On top of that they helped us to find our way to the airport. Looking forward to the next stay there!
The place looks even better than the pictures! Great place, large, comfortable and clean. I would stay here again.

Lisa's sister was there to welcome us. She explained everything and left her number should we have any questions. The apartment is nice and well equipped as shown in the pictures. We enjoyed our stay in Lisa's apartment and would recommend it to everyone.

El piso era justo como decia el anuncio muy acogedor y calido. TenÃ?a todas las cosas necesarias para hacer nuestra estancia perfecta despues de un largo dÃ?a de vueltas por la ciudad. No conocimos a Lisa personalmente pero su herama nos estaba esperando para darnos las llaves. Incluso nos dejÃ? entrar antes de la hora. El barrio era muy tranquilo, cerca de un supermercado y al lado de dos lineas de tranvia. El piso esta a solo unos 10 o 15 minutos hasta el Centraal Station. Definitivamente si vuelvo a Amsterdam volverÃ?a a ponerme en contacto con Lisa otravez. Gracias por todo!

The apartment is very pleasant, equipped well. Located outside of the city center but the tram nÂ°17 just pass at the bottom of the apartment to take you to the central station. Completed for a stay between friends!

Nice and cosy appartment, good location, easy communication with airport and center, friendly and helpful hosts.

Zygimantas

The description of flat and surranding are 100% legit. It is very easy and fast to travel from Lisa's place to city center. No problem with getting in touch with Lisa and getting more details regarding the stay.

The apartment looks just like the photos. It was very cute and we felt right at home. Lisa was always quick to respond to any questions we had. Her sister greeted us when we arrived and gave us a detailed explanation of how everything worked. We were extremely pleased with the experience.

Lisa's appartment is beautiful, clean and in a good location.  The place is a short walk from the park that takes you by beautiful walk to the Van Gogh Museum or you can take a tram that will take you to the city centre in a few minutes. We love her place and definitely recommended.

We were welcomed by Lisa's sister. She was very friendly and showed us around the apartment. Lisa's apartment is very nice and cozy, we felt like we were home. A supermarket and a tram station are just around the corner which is really great. All in all it was a great stay!

We had a great time in Lisa's apartment and in Amsterdam. Lisa had given us all the useful information before we arrived.
Lisa's sister, Rosa, greeted us with great kindness by giving us all the information needed for the apartment and gave us tourist information as well.
The apartment is really nice and the proximity to public transport and supermarket made it easy for us to stay. Everything was perfect!

Very nice and clean apartment. Everything was like on photos. The location is pretty good: direct tram to the center and supermarkets nearby. The first day,  Lisa's sister welcomed us and gave information about everything. I recommend this apartment, who want a pleasant journey to Amsterdam:)
Thank you very much Lisa, your home is very beautiful and clean, I recommend this apartment.

We had a great stay at Lisa's place. It was exactly what we needed for our stay in Amsterdam. Lisa is super easy to communicate with, and very friendly as well. Would definitely stay at Lisa's again! Thank you Lisa!

Wouter's apartment was a a great choice. Wouter is a very helpful host and showed us interesting things in the neighborhood. I've been at his place with my husband and a couple of friends. The apartment was perfect for us four, very clean and cozy. Plus, the place has an incredible rooftop, we were amazed to see the city from the top. It was awesome!

The apartment is located in a residential area, very near to the city center. Tram station is only 2 minutes walk from his apartment and we can also walk to the city center from his place (it took us from 15 to 20 minutes to go there by walking). I think it will be hard to find another place with better ratio quality X location in Amsterdam. We all enjoyed every second of our stay.

We spent a wonderful weekend. Karin and Wouter are lovely and helpfull. their House beautiful, clean and full of light, you truly feel at home.The location is perfect and Well connected.
Really reccomended

The property was as described and the pictures do the accomodation justice. We managed to use the roof terrace when the weather allowed and it is a great place to relax after a day of shopping and sightseeing.
Also as it is located in Oud West we found that it was a great place place to base ourselves. It is a 20-25 minute walk to Dam Square and the walk has like the rest of Amsterdam plenty of bars, restaurants and shops to visit if desired.
Vondelpark is nearby as well and was great when wanting to escape from sightseeing.
Wouter made us feel very welcome and ensured we had everything we required to enjoy our stay. Keeping in touch and giving us tips for local attractions (restaurants etc) gave us the option to stay local if desired. We eat out a few times locally at De Hallen and Spaghetteria where the food was excellent in both eateries.
If I came back to Amsterdam or knew anyone planning to travel to Amsterdam I would definitely recommend Wouter's property and Oud West as a base. Amsterdam is definitely a place where I'd love to visit more!

We stayed for a weekend at Wouter and Karin's place. It was a perfect match. It would've been hard to find a better location if you like us prefer to stay were the Dutch people live and get a little away from the touristy parts of Amsterdam and yet still only be a short walk away from the center. Wouter was very helpful host and made us feel welcome. He also did a very helpful guide with the best spots in the local area which we used a lot. The Food Hallen, breakfast and coffee recommendations were spot on!

Our stay in Amsterdam at Wouter and Karin's home was wonderful. They welcomed us very pleasantly and gave us a lot of useful information about the city and how to discover it.
We felt ourselves at home and went visiting the city on foot, as lot of interesting spots are easily reachable this way. Even the Schipol airport isn't far away, something like 20 minutes with tram and train.
The house is even better than the pictures are suggesting and the beds are very comfortable ! And we enjoyed the roof terrace, thanks to the weather !

We had a very good stay in Amsterdam in Wouter and Karins apartment. Wouter met us and showed us the local area before we went into the apartment. We got a lot of tips and follow-up during our stay as well which we appreciated. I can deeply recommend this apartment.

Excellent place to stay in Amsterdam! Wouter proved to be a great host that was there to greet us on arrival. He even went above and beyond and welcomed us with a few snacks and offered us a drink before showing us around the neighborhood.

The apartment was beautiful- very modern, very spacious and a great location. We were blown away by the nearby market which is a large hall filled with food vendors and a bar. On Saturday morning there is a farmers market half a block away.

Despite being in such a great location, the apartment was not too loud. While we didn't avail of the rooftop, it was astounding and has great potential. Highly recommend this property to groups of 3-5.

Beautiful apartment, exactly like the pictures. The house was very clean and spacious and it was great to have both the balcony and roof terrace (perfect for NYE as there is a great view for the fireworks). Great location, very close to tram stops. Wouter was very friendly on our arrival, he had brought us breakfast foods and showed us the city via a map. We also had strong communication before the trip. Unfortunately things turned sour at the end of the trip when Wouter arrived home earlier than planned and immediately evicted us out of his home due to miscommunication and misunderstandings. Still, this is an excellent location to stay in Amsterdam, perfect for 3-4 people.

Wouter was very welcoming and friendly. He was very available before and during our stay in Amsterdam.
His flat is very nice and clean, and there was the same as the pictures.
We spend a weekend in Amsterdam and the location of Wouter flat is perfect, very close to the city center and museum ( Van Gogh - Riskjmuseum...).
Thank you very much to Wouter and his family to let us spend a weekend is his very nice flat.

Muy recomendable!!

We had a lovely time staying in wouter's place. The location was great, and the apartment was beautifully designed. Wouter recommended us some good local spots too - will definitely stay again!

It was a great journey to Amsterdam. The appartment was beautiful as shown on the pictures.
The market nearby was great.
Wouter is a really good host.

We had a great stay at Wooter's place in Amsterdam. The flat is spacious and light. It was perfect for our family (2 adults, 2 kids age 5 and 8). The roof terrace meant we could stay up and relax together once the kids had gone to bed. Wooter's flat is located in the best part of Amsterdam right next to De Hallen with its delicious food hall and quirky shops. And also next to the market, with lovely fresh fruit veg and breads. While we were there our favourite visits were to the science museum, renting a boat to travel around the canals and playing in the giant treetop playground in the vondel park. We loved staying in Wooters flat and thoroughly recommend it. I also really appreciated the nespresso machine!

We had a great weekend at Wouter's place. The apartment was very clean and spacious and Wouter had left some useful information and a bottle of wine to help us enjoy our stay! If you're looking for a quiet place to stay to explore Amsterdam we can highly recommend Wouter's!

Tom

It's the second time I went to Wouter's appartement ! Very nice place and neighboorhood.
Wouters and his family gives us a lots of good advices in Amsterdam ! I will recommend this place !

Wouter's place is absolutely amazing and I loved every minute of my stay. The hosts are amazing and they looked after me and my friends very well.

Wouter's home is absolutely perfect.
A nice apartment, very clean and spacious with a nice decoration, a lovely place in a very cool neighborhood near cool places like "The foodhallen".

The roof terrace is perfect to relax and share moments with the sun in this lovely city.

Wouter is full of kindness, pleasant and friendly, his communication is perfect. He share the best places to feel like home with some nice little attentions.

Perfect host, perfect environment. Highly reccommended!

This is one of my best Amsterdam experience. The location is great. Trendy, lively and near to everything. Near to some locals hotspots too. We were usually one of the very few tourists in that area so you can imagine how much you could immerse in the dutch culture. Also if u are a fan of airbnb i guess you dont prefer anywhere too touristy and then this location works perfect for you. The hosts are incredibly friendly and you can get everything you need there! Very clean and bright! Love the rooftop too
Wouter was a great host and the location is amazing. Wouter provided excellent recommendations and we took advantage of all of them. We will definitely be back!

Wir verbrachten 5 Tage mit unseren zwei Kindern (12 und 14-jÃ?hrig) in Wouters und Karins Wohnung und hatten eine fantastische Zeit dort. Die Wohnung ist genau wie beschrieben und wir fÃ?hlten uns wie zu Hause. Die Kommunikation mit Wouter ist Ã?beraus freundlich und unkompliziert. Die Wohnung war tiptop fÃ?r uns bereit gestellt, alles sehr sauber und mit allen nÃ¶tigen Informationen fÃ?r unseren Aufenthalt. Die Lage ist zentral und gut mit den Ã¶ffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichbar, in einem lebhaften Quartier mit Markt gleich vor dem Haus. Die Wohnung selber ist jedoch extrem ruhig. Die Wohnung ist sehr grosszÃ?gig, luftig und hell. Sie ist modern und geschmackvoll eingerichtet mit liebevollen Details. Die absolut geniale und grosse Dachterrasse macht diese Wohnung zu einem wahren Bijoux. Wir kÃ¶nnen Wouter und Karin als Gastgeber und ihre tolle Wohnung in jedem Sinn weiterempfehlen.

You should stay here! Wouter and Karin's home is better than photographs and descriptions. The location is stellar: steps away from Foodhallen and many other restaurants, as well as the Ten Kate market, a grocery store, the tram stop, and the fabulous Spaghetteria. Our family loved the cozy atmosphere, comfortable furniture and beds, and general light and spaciousness. Our child adored all the toys, and we all favored the roof deck. It's an easy stroll to the Vondelpark (and many other parks and playgrounds). We also walked (with a 5yo) to the Rijksmuseum and Van Gogh Museum, and into the city center. We also cycled all over town (a great way to get around). I will note that the steps are typical-Amsterdam very steep. (Our kid has been navigating stairs from a very young age, so we weren't concerned, but I imagine other parents might be.) Overall, Wouter's place is stellar. Moreover, communication was also clear and prompt and helpful, and check in was super easy. Would stay here again, in a heartbeat.
Amazing place that really makes you feel like you're staying in real Amsterdam. Host was great and would highly recommend this place!
Everything was perfect, parks and food market nearby. House really comfortable and nice design. Great location to explore the city.

Even more beautiful than the pictures.
Wouter & Karin are perfect host and the apartment is just wonderful.
We will go back there for sure!

Wonderful place close to great neighborhood full of restaurants, bars, and steps from public transport. Only a 10 minute walk to Leidseplein square and about 15 to other popular Central Amsterdam attractions. The apartment was very trendy and incredibly clean. We stayed here with another couple and it was perfect.

The hosts are wonderful. Communication was extremely fast and thorough. They even had special treats waiting for us at checkin which were perfect after a long and arduous travel experience. The place looks exactly as pictured and is decorated with a lot of taste. It is very well located and easy to access from the airport and downtown. We strongly suggest to rent bicycles to move around. As a family, we appreciated Karine and Wouter's place: they also are a family and understand/anticipate children needs. Their activities suggestions were greatly appreciated and made our stay easier to organize.

Wouter und Karin sind einfach tolle Gastgeber!
