Alles in allem eine sehr angenehme AirBnB-Erfahrung!
Really nice clean and modern place, close to pretty much everything. Nice welcome.

Very well located apartment/house. Just need a bicycle and Amsterdam is yours to see. Good food everywhere around. We had a great time there. Wouter and Karin where very attentionnate to make us feel welcome.

Wouter is a greate owner with Many recommendations giving to you in advance. You will really feel Amsterdam in his house. Te apartament is Close to many interesting places and easy to move by bycicle or by team . If you like running voldenpark is just 5 minutes running from his house.

Wouter's home was the perfect accommodation for our weekend in Amsterdam. We walked everywhere, but there is a tram stop right outside their home. So many good breakfast places around, i recommend the breakfast club! The home itself was truly amazing. so clean and beautiful. the rooftop terrace was stunning! My friends and I sat outside and watched the sunrise every morning. I couldn't have asked for a better weekend in Amsterdam and it is all thanks to Wouter and his family.

Lovely apartment in a great location. Having De Hallen (vibey street food hall)  just a few steps away was such a treat. Also being able to walk (20-30 mins) into the centre of Amsterdam worked really well and saved having to navigate the trams. Karin and Wouter's apartment was perfect for our family, the toys/games not to mention the hanging chair provided hours of entertainment! The apartment has a lovely big open plan lounge/dining area so you're not on top of each other like you would be in a hotel room and the food items we were allowed to use was a really nice touch. I would highly recommend Karin and Wouter's home as a perfect getaway.

Fabulous light apartment in a great location with much appreciated personal touches and lovely, helpful hosts. Enjoy dinner and drinks at sunset on the terrace overlooking the roof tops of Amsterdam and quiet nights in a great suburb close to markets, shops, a food hall and an easy walk to top attractions. Highly recommended as a base to explore Amsterdam.

I stayed with three other people at Wouters and Karins flat. It was a great foundation for a beautiful weekend in Amsterdam. There are manny great things to do and see nearby. The centre of Amsterdam is about 4 tram-stations away and can be reached easily by foot or with a bike.

The flat is a stylish, big, bright and with the biggest highlight on its roof which is the roof itself. A great view on Amsterdam and a great place to enjoy yourself.

We wanna thank Wouter and Karin for their hospitality and recommend his place with 10 out of 10 stars.

Real nice flat to spend holidays in Amsterdam with young kids. Wouter and his family prepared everything for us to enjoy our stay. The area around has all commodities. Third and fourth floor with steep stairs are part of the typical Dutch houses from city centre. The reward is the terrace that can offer relaxing moments when the weather permits being outside.
Wonderful spot! Wouter and Karin were lovely hosts âÄî couldnâÄôt have asked for a better home base in Amsterdam.
Great accommodation and great location.  Linda a wonderful host and would love to stay again.

Linda provided a cozy apartment, just as promised. The bed was great, and she even left us with chocolate and beer, which was very thoughtful. A perfect place to stay for two quick nights in Amsterdam. Good location, we were able to walk everywhere, and take the tram when we didn't want to walk.

Linda's apartment is good and cosy as described.
We had a great time and Linda was very nice and helpful when we talked by emails.
The apartment is located just near the tramway and that's a great point if you need to use public transport to visit the city or if you want to go out.

Merci pour tout.

Linda's apartment was cosy and functional, perfect for a short stay in Amsterdam. It is very well located, in a lively but peaceful area of the city, full of cafes, bars, shops and markets. The tram stop just few meters away from the building allow you to reach the city center in few minutes if you don't feel like walking (about 2Km). Linda was a perfect host, helpful and generous, welcoming us with a bottle of wine and biscuits. It was Lovely!

Wir hatten eine super Zeit in Lindas Appartement,das Appartement ist in einer guten Location und auch unweit vom centrum.Nicht weit weg der Vondelpark der zum relaxen einlÃ?dt.Alles in allem eine gut gelungene Woche.Danke Linda

My boyfriend and I spent a week in LindaâÄôs apartment during our trip to Amsterdam. Between her and her brother, there was excellent communication and we felt right at home. Linda was even sweet enough to leave us a bottle of champagne and chocolates to welcome us! Perfect location next to tram stops, but still a quiet area. Linda was always there to respond to my questions during the stay quickly. 10/10 recommend!

The apartment felt like a home away from home. Really clean and spacious and situated within a nice area that was not too far from the centre of Amsterdam. Plus there was a free ferry a short walk from the apartment to take you across to Amsterdam Central. We could not have had any complaints.
Nice place and kind owners!

Elien is a perfect host. She gave us many good adressses, her home is in a quiet and residential neighbourhood, from where you can go to amsterdam city center by boat! The beds are really big and confortable. I will definitely recommend her place :)
Great service, Cleannnn

We had a lovely time in Amsterdam and Elien's apartment was perfect in many ways. It was very clean and modern but at the same time cozy and family friendly. It was easy to get to the apartment from the city centre and Elien was very helpful with everything. I can highly recommend their apartment!

We had a great time in Amt, the house was perfect, with large areas, a garden and beutiful decoration. It is located in a safe place and near the city center (just a 4 minute walk to the bus stop and a 15 minute bus ride to central station)! I absolutely  recommend this house! The house hosts were amazing too, super avalaible to help us! :) Everything went perfectly! :)

Fatastic place. Better than expected.
Great surroundings. NDSM is a very exciting place. You must visit the PLLEK with a great view to Amsterdam and IJ.

Excellent stay! We rented the whole house while Eilen and Franky were away and the house was exactly as described. It is really clean and you can see how much Eilen and Franky love their home; every little detail is thought of. There is a supermarket round the corner and a ferry port within a 15 minunte walk (to take the free boat to town) which is very convenient.

There is an excellent quirky beach restaurant called Pllek at the port that Eilen and Franky recommend. We would definitely recommend it, especially if you like vegetarian food! Once the sun went down, they even had a beach fire and you could sit around the fire with your drinks!

Elien was a wonderful host and the house is an amazing, calm and relaxing space in a quiet part of town. The house is relatively easy to find, and has the bonus of being a 2min walk from an excellent supermarket, as well as 10min walk from the (free!) ferry that takes you over to central Amsterdam - which takes about 15min and runs throughout the day. The house itself is beautiful, with a cosy living space and ample dining area, and Elien has taken great care to make sure that guests have all the info and supplies that you need (including a lovely welcome basket!). Check in was flexible, which was very convenient as we were cycling into Amsterdam from Hoek van Holland - a long ride and difficult to predict an arrival time. Elien checked in with us throughout our stay to make sure we had everything we needed, which was most appreciated. We had a great stay and would definitely stay again next time we're in town! :)
Very clean, comfortable house. Larger than expected.

We had a great time at Eliens house, everything was as described and the communication was easy and the responding really quick.
Many thanks again, Elien.

Really lovely and homie place (and very big!). Spotless clean and decorated in any details, you can feel it's a happy home! Located in a residential area, not that central but well connected and easy to reach. It was actually nice to be outside the crowd you get when you walk around the centre. One of the best airbnb homes I've been so far! Thanks Elien!
Very spacious and quiet place. With all the equipments you need for the weekend. We never met with Elien, but our exchanges have been awsome !
Expect great communication and hospitality from the host.  Location is great with easy access to Amsterdam (free ferry 15 min walk away).  Beautiful / modern.
very nice host with a very cosy home.

We enjoyed great holiday in Amsterdam with 3 little children. Elien's house is spacious, smart and trendy. She gave us a warm welcome, although she wasn't there. Well organized. She gave many useful tips and prompt answer on any question. Considering the hot weather the location near to a canal with swimming platform is perfect. The children enjoyed the playgrounds next to the door.  Recommendation, definitely!
A beautiful home in a great location of Amsterdam! Would highly recommend!!

One of my best airbnb experiences so far. Easy communication all the time, easy check-in (although we were much much later than expected), everything was well prepared for us, also the welcoming package :-)
This home is so cozy and clean and we loved to spent our time there.

You really deserve more than 5 stars.
Thank you so much for everything.

We really enjoyed our relaxing stay at Elien's. She was a great host before, during and after our stay with quick and friendly communication. Her home is spotless and stylish, with all the amenities and creature comforts you could ask for. The welcome goodies were an extra special and unexpected treat! The area is very family friendly and only a 15min walk from the hipster wharf area (you must try Pllek) and ferry to the city. Would highly recommend for anyone wanting/happy to stay out of the tourist chaos.

We had a fantastic stay at Elien. A stylish and cozy home perfect for 2 couples visiting the city - I have even been inspired for our own home decor. Elien was super friendly and easy to talk to. She went above and beyond to make us feel welcome.

Nice family home in a quiet family friendly neighborhood. It is easy to go to the city center with the free ferry-boat. You can go from the house to the ferry dock either by foot (itâÄôs a 15 minute walk) or by bike (we found that it was the best option for us, you can rent bikes at the ferry or in the city). Elien was very mindful to make sure our stay was comfortable and that we had everything we needed.

Das Haus was sehr angenehm. Man fÃ?hlt sich gleich wie zu Hause. Wir waren zu fÃ?nft und jeder hatte seinen Platz. Man kommt innerhalb 20-30 Minuten ins Zentrum. die Gegend ums Haus ist sehr ruhig. vielen Dank fÃ?r die Gastfreundschaft.

Lovely home with all the amenities you need. Very clean. Easy check in. The hosts are lovely and easy going. Would definitely stay here again if I get the chance!

Great large house, was perfect for our family of 5 with 4 bedrooms + 2 full baths, on 2 different floors. House is very tidy and well appointed. Casa confortevole e trendy, bel giardinetto, frigo fornito di bottigliette di acqua e birra. vicino ad un market.

We had a great time in the flat in Amsterdam. Everything was ecellent. If we had some questions Jurjen took care of it and made us suggestions. During our stay we could always reach him by phone. We really had a great time in Amterdam and we will gladly return sometime.

Jurjen was a great host. We had an incident with the keys (was our fault) and he helped us immediately. The welcome package with wine, beer and sweets was also nice. He helped us to find a location for NYE. Thanks again!! The appartement was clean and was also well equipped.
The location is also great. There are many restaurants and cafes etc. nearby. You can use the public transportation nearby e.g. to go further central.

Overall it was a great experience. Thanks Jurjen!

Truly a lovely experience. The apartment itself if beautiful, including the backyard. The neighborhood is quite nice and beautiful to walk around. With the instillation of a new metro line (#52) that lets off just a 5 minuet walk from the apartment, getting around the city is a breeze. While I never met Jurjen in person (a neighbor let us in as they were out of town) he was always very easy to communicate with and quick to respond. Staying here made our visit to Amsterdam that much more enjoyable.

This bright and spacious suite in Amsterdam is am excellent point from which to get to the city centre or anywhere else. We were pleased with Jurjen's prompt responses to any questions we had and thoughtful touches. The place was very clean with am excellent setup and beautiful back garden. We stayed for a week and couldn't have been happier with our choice!

The house is nice with a beautiful garden just in the heart of Amsterdam. It is easy to move around walking or by using public transportation (there is a tram stop around the corner and a metro station within 400 m of the apartment). There is a supermarket just around the corner (only that it is not accepting credit or debit cards, at least not from other countries, only cash!). There is also a park in walking distance. The host is very kind and nice, answering at no time all possible questions and providing information (even in writing) for all possible needs of his guests. In total, a good choice for staying in Amsterdam.

Jurjen is a great host. His response is very prompt. We didnâÄôt meet him on checkin but he left very detailed notes and tips for our stay.
The house is located in a very convenient location near tram and metro in the hip de pijp area with lots of cafes and parks. Central yet quiet. Amazing host and lovely home, would definitely come back!

This was a really great spot in a hip area of Amsterdam with easy access by tram to treat of the city, great market, restaurants and shopping near by. The home was clean and Jurjen was great to work with. We would definitely stay here again.
logement bien placÃ©, trÃ¨s agrÃ©able avec ce petit jardin. MalgrÃ© son absence, Jurjen nous a bien accueilli, facilement joignable.

Jurjen is a great host who provides a useful factsheet and responds very quickly to queries. The flat is beautiful and has a very relaxing feel. The children loved the hammock. It's in a cool area too.

This apartment was very nice!
We family spent really comfortable like our home.
Everything's perfect! It was beautiful, clean and quiet.
Moreover its location is very convenience because of very close from supermarket, station and popular sights.
Also guest cats. They came at the garden everyday was very cute. So we had nice memories and we miss them now.

We had a pleasant time at Jurjen's place, everything was smooth from check in to check out, the place has a plenty of space and a nice kitchen, we were able to enjoy couple of meals during our stay. The location is very convenient, located in nice and calm neighborhood, with restaurants and shops right around the corner. Will definitely come back.

We had a great time at ireens place...its very special, quite big and comfortable with a view to the water! its quiet and at the same time you are in the center of amsterdam within 10 min. she bought f.e. wine and fruits for us, very nice!

We stayed at Ireens place for 2 nights and we really liked her comfortable and nicely furnished apartment! It is clean and well located next to a river. It is also easy to go from her place to the city center.
Ireen is welcoming and makes you feel at home.
I would recommend this place to everyone who would like to experience the way how people live in Amsterdam.

Lovely quirky apartment in stunning location. Very comfortable and clean. Wine and snacks left for us which was very kind. Just a few tram stops away from central so very convenient. Would definitely stay again.

We had a really wonderful time visiting Amsterdam and staying at Ireens place. The apartment was nicely decorated, clean and well located.
Because the apartment is next to a river, we were even able to swim every morning after waking up! :)
It was easy to go from her place to the city center.
Ireen is very welcoming and we got some helpful tips from her (she even had a wine and snacks ready for us!). I would recommend this place to everyone who would like to visit Amsterdam.

We had a wonderful trip to Amsterdam and just to add to the holiday, Ireen and her home are just as interesting as seeing the city. Couldn't have asked for anything more, Ireen was very welcoming both to Amsterdam itself recommending lots of places, and her home. The perfect location between the busy city and the mesmerising countryside in the north of Holland!
Honestly Ireen has my dream flat. Excellent place in a quiet neighborhood! Quick tram ride or bicycle ride to the city center, clean, and Ireen is a very responsive and kind host :)
The apartment is well located. We really appreciated the bikes from Ireen, which was essential to move in the city. We had a greate stay and I can only but recommand this place.

Ireen's home feels warm and comfy. Everything is provided and clean. The highlights of her apartment are the view on her balcony: right to the river, in which you can take a swim or watch houseboats. And also to mention; the two bikes. We enjoyed the rides and saved time and money while exploring Amsterdam.
The neighborhood is quiet and charming.
In the morning you'll maybe have a little furry guest on the balcony.

We would love to come back anytime.

My brother and I went to visit Amsterdam and we found this Airbnb great! Its a very nice place and Jan is a very nice host too. The stop bus is very close to the place and it takes about 20/25 minutes to get to the center of Amsterdam. Its also very clean and nice :)

Jan's studio apartment is a fantastic space, and was perfect for my stay in Amsterdam. With a short 5-10 minute walk to the train, tram and bus, it's very easy to move around, and has a lovely quiet outlook onto a nice backyard.

Nice and clean, and great communication with Jan, I can highly recommend a stay here!

We had a great stay here! It is in a convenient location, very close to public transport making it very easy to get in to the centre of Amsterdam (in about 15/20minutes). It has everything you need and is comfortable and clean, and with your own private entrance. Would definitely recommend.

Jan Jaap is immensely helpful.
We had a very warm welcome. The appartment is equipped with everything you need. Bus, tram, train and metro are  within walking distance. A perfect starting point to discover Amsterdam.

Jan was a very kind host. We had no problems with the check-in, it was a nice place to stay (it looks just as the pictures) and it was easy to get to the city centre from there (by bike). We had a very nice time in Amsterdam thanks to Jan.

The place has everthing we needed-
we used the heater, washing machine, clothes hangers, the water boiler and some cups/bowls/cutlery. it was a comfortable stay. the space is larger than most hotel rooms, the sofa, tables and chairs are useful. Jan Jaap is nice and friendly. the place is around 30 minutes from central-getting there is easy by tram 24 near medical centre (buses run by rnet is closer but we bought the day passes so busses are excluded and only transports procided by gvb are allowed).

Nice private apartment with good connection to the public transport.

Jan's place is probably the best deal in Amsterdam!!! Most places for around $100/night are a bedroom in someone's house or apartment and you share a bath. Jan's BnB has a private entrance and is very large. It's a studio it but could easily be a good sized one bedroom apartment. It's a studio because there is just a piece of furniture separating the bed area which is super because it keeps the place feeling big and open. We were quite happy with our stay. The neighborhood is peaceful and lovely.
A few things that might be important to some of you. Jan has little kids that run around the house and you can hear their pounding feet quite well. It didn't bother us at all as they go to sleep early and are gone for school in the day. Because it's a basement the drains all have pumps to move the water out (we had this in one of our homes). Because of that the toilet can be a little clunky and require two flushes. The bed is about a "B minus" (a little springy). Not bad, but if you have back problems or are fussy about beds you might not be happy. It was fine for us and we would happily come again.
Jan is a friendly guy and it seems like he would be easy to get to know. He was very responsive to all requests. You won't get a better deal.

Good location, Aldi close for budget shopping. From airport 341 bus is 3 stops and to city with bike 30min and 20min to city centre with bus in front of house. Everything was super. We were very happy with the place, everything was good and Amsterdam is best place âù?ï¸è

Absolutely lovely apartment. On the ground-floor where the entrance is on to the street, very Amsterdam style. The 2 bedrooms are spacious in the basement but is very nice. The apartment and host are lovely and welcoming. Close to the tram which takes you to Rai and city centre easily. Lovely.

A very nicely furnished studio with equally nice host! Perfect place for a quick Amsterdam trip.

We had the best time thanks to Bas and his cozy apartment! The location was perfect, it couldn't be more central. The studio it's even better than in the pictures and very clean.

This apt was nice and clean as well as being in an excellent location.  There weren't any small extras I have experienced in other places like shampoo, hand towel, hair dryer, maps, recommendations, pen/paper and flexible checking/out time. Bas was friendly.

Bas is a great and friendly host. He met us just on time and gave us some nice advice of what to do and see in Amsterdam since it was our first visit. The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We are a young couple and we have been to Bas' place four days. The house is perfect: clean, warm, very very nice and absolutely great locationed, it could not be closer to the center! And Bas,the host, is amazing: nice and available for every advice about the city!
Lovely place. The best location you could ever ask. Great host and nice breakfast, definitely would stay there over and over.

Bas was a lovely host and was very welcoming. He offered us Breakfast in the morning, but we had already made plans. The room was as advertised and in the best location possible! Would gladly use again on my next visit.

We were a little skeptical about the location a first, but honestly we couldn't have been better located for our 3-day stay in Amsterdam. This is a quite studio, in the middle of all the action. You have cafes, bars, coffee shops, restaurants, supermarket and most other attractions close. Bas was very friendly and helpful. You have to climb a few stairs to get to the studio but it  is cozy, clean, interestingly decorated with all basic amenities and a comfortable bed. The shower had hot water running and coffee and breakfast was decent.

It has been a great experience staying at Bas's studio. The studio is perfect, clean, well located, spacious and it has every thing you need.  The location couldn't  be better,It is right in the centre of Amsterdam, there are lots of amenities around, cafes, coffee shops, lovely markets, restaurants, bike rental stores and you can go to most of the touristic places walking or by bike easily. Bas has been a great host, he's been very nice, helpful and flexible. The studio is located at the top floor of the building, therefore there are tricky stairs with lots of steps. So take this into account if you travel with a big luggage by yourself or you have mobility problems. I spent silly loft and the views of their typical roofs of Amsterdam. I will definitely repeat this experience in Bas studio

Bas, your apartment was wonderful and we enjoyed our stay! The apartment is in the heart of a great area in Amsterdam. The apartment building was quiet after fun full days out walking. The bed is probably the comfiest bed I've slept in the 3 weeks I stayed in Europe! The view from the window was beyond the most beautiful in all my travels in Europe! Bas, thank you again for letting us stay!

The apartment is really well located, about 200 mts from Dam square. It's a nice cosy apartment enough for only 2 people. Not difficult to find at all.
Bas is a really nice host and was very helpful in the lead up and also during our stay at his apartment.

nice appartment in amsterdam's center. Perfect to visit the city and come back for a lunch or a dinner before leaving again. From the central station are realy 10 minutes by walk. Small but cozy has, more or less, all you need to live the house trying to save some money avoiding to eat outside. The appartment is on the last floor and stairs are very steep and narrow, I travel always with a backpack and I didn't have big problems but I imagine someone with a big and heavy luggage could sweat a little.

Bas was a great friendly host who was always on hand to help us if we needed it. This was our first airbnb stay and it was a very positive experience.

The studio flat, up 3 flights of stairs, was spacious and very central to a variety of shops and restaurants as well as a good supermarket. It was also very quiet.

Thankyou again Bas for helping make our stay a very enjoyable one.

Bas was amazing! His place is perfect for a couple and walking distance to everything you want to see.in Amsterdam. He graciously answered all of.our questions and provided tea/coffee in the morning. As our flight was late on the day of checkout he also allowed us to leave our bags so.we could enjoy the day without bags.

In summation Bas is a warm friendly host with a lovely studio in the heart of it all. I highly recommend him and his place.
Bas was a great host and the neighborhood was close to everything that we wanted to visit.
Good location, nice quiet place, close to Central station. Would stay there again.

Naomi's flat apartment is great, comfortable with a ton of charm and very clean.
The zone is pretty cool and quite and the access to the center is fast and easy ,10min by tram.
Naomi was a helpful host, quick to respond to question.
I'd definitely recommend a stay here!!

Great apartment! Met up with Naomi after our flight was delayed and my luggage lost but she made me forget about that by showing us around the great apartment and giving us some suggestions. Great place to stay!

Naomi was really nice with us! she helped us with the night transports for the New Year Eve.
the house is nice, cleaned and tidy. it's fully furnished and 2 minutes far from the tram stop. it takes about 15 minutes to go to Central Station. So it's very easy. in 3 minutes walking you can go to two groceries, a bakery,a butcher, a chemist, a flower shop and lots more.
I will definetly recommend Naomi's apartments to live temporary in Amsterdam.
Very nice person and very warm welcome

This place is amazing! It is in a safe quite neighbourhood, where you can find some nice restaurants during 10-15 min walk. The big supermarket is just downstairs, and tram stop located 1-2 min from the building. The trams go to the city center every couple of minutes (3-10 min), and it is around 15 min trip. Night communication is also available.
The apartment was great, very clean, freshly made bed. Everything we needed was there, from the hair dryer to coffee press. I can recommend staying in this apartment to everybody!
Communication with the host was also excellent, quick responds and detailed instructions were given.
Thank you Naomi!

The apartment is very easy to get to from Centraal Station with supermarkets, pharmacy, bakery and more right around the corner. I really enjoyed leaving the city center after a full day of activities to go back to a quiet neighborhood. Highly recommend this place!
TrÃ©s bon logement spacieux et tout confort. AgrÃ©ablement situÃ© prÃ©s de l' arret de tram et des commerces. A 15 minutes en tram de la gare centrale.

The house was just superb , it is even nicer than the pictures .

The location is perfect , steps away from everything .

thumbs up Lynnette

Don't think that words can describe the experience of staying in this apartment. My partner and I had an absolute amazing time and fully enjoyed the city and the comforts of our temporary home from home. Lynette our host was absolutely amazing too. So helpful and accommodating.
This was our 3rd time in Amsterdam and 100 percent our best time yet with the help of our amazing accomadation.
Highly recommended. Thank you so lynette.

Lynette was an excellent host and made us feel at home in her wonderful apartment in the heart of Amsterdam. We were given a variety of things to do and places to explore. Lynette was very accommodating and helped us have a fantastic weekend away. I would stay again in a heartbeat.

Lynette made us feel at home and was available for any assistance that we needed.The loft was beautiful and very spacious. The location was great and right at the heart of Amsterdam, I would definitely come back here on my next trip to Amsterdam.

Firstly Lynette was excellent, very communicative and helpful in making sure we knew how to get there and then offering advice and tips on places we should visit.

We were met at the apartment and shown how to use all the necessary switches & locks etc, and then were left to our own devices with contact details should we need to contact Lynette for any reason.

The apartment itself is fantastic, at least as good as it looks on the pictures, itâÄôs very spacious and is ideally located for both arriving in from the train (5 min walk) and for touring the city centre.

Everything ran smoothly, I would definitely recommend staying here and would gladly stay again.

5 out of 5

The loft is in a great location, very spacious & stylish as described on the website. There's everything you need for your staying, kitchen utensils, towels, linens, etc...we just felt at home straight away!
Lynette was fantastic, she left everything ready for our arrival, all the instructions so we knew how to operate everything & some suggestions for restaurants, shops, etc.. the perfect host! If we ever come back to amsterdam definitely will try to stay there again. Many thanks !

We just stayed at Lynettes place and it was absolutely fantastic. The location was perfect and the apartment was just what was promised. definitely stay there again. Also Lynette was a great and very friendly host, made our arrival and stay very welcoming.

We had a lovely stay at Leonie's and Maartens appartement! The place was great with nice recommendations for the neighbourhood and coffee, tea and wine to complete our stay : ) Communication was also perfect, thank you!

It has been a very pleasant stay in Leonie's apartment.
A wonderful clean apartment with a beautiful spacious kitchen.
The hosts were very welcoming and will make you feel at home :-)
The location is very close to The Foodhallen and the Vondelpark.

We would definitely book this apartment again because of it's wonderful interior and location to many interesting places to visit ( and because there is an organic shop around the corner ;-)

Charlotte

We spent an incredible good time at LeonieâÄôs and MaartenâÄôs lovely apartment. It was exactly as described, cozy, superb clean and in a cool part of Amsterdam. There is so much to do there: bars, restaurants and all kind of shops. If you want it touristy you can easily catch a tram just a few meters from the building or rent a bike nearby. It takes less then 5 minutes. Both were super kind and uncomplicated. They gave us a lot of tips what to do. Thanks again and see you two next time.

Leonie`s apartment was gorgeous! Very clean and comfy we immediately felt at home. The neighborhood was perfect to discover Amsterdam. You can get to the center as well as to Jordaan by foot. But even better was the quarter out-west. Many shops, cafes, restaurants of all nationalities waiting for you.
Leonie left us a list of recommendations where to find good food, drinks or cultural stuff. We tried a lot of them and made all great kinds of experiences.
The apartment is well equipped so you can stay at home for cooking dinner and have a comfy evening at home after a busy day in Amsterdam.
We can only recommend this host ans stay!

Wonderful people and a wonderful apartment, the location is superb if like me you want to see central during the day but have somewhere more local to hang out after hours. Flat was exactly as advertised, beautiful and cosy. Could not give higher praise!

The balcony was awesome to have breakfast at and the apartment is situated in a really nice area not far from the center! The owner was really nice and helpful and overall our stay was perfect! A lovely flat in a great location. The flat is awesome, spacious and well decorated, with everything you could need. And on top of that Maarten and Leonie made us feel very welcome - would definitely recommend this place!

This apartment is beautiful and very neat. Maarten and Leonie were great hosts and gave us really cool recommandations. The apartment is close to Vondelpark (great for running and biking!) and not too far from the city center.

It was great, they were really nice and we had a very good time.
We had a great experience. The apartment is clean, tidy and booth, Leoni and her apartment looks better at natural than in the web pics ;-)

Leonie's place was absolutely lovely. It was very big and spacious which can be hard to come by in Amsterdam, and the location was amazing. Leonie was very flexible with check-in and check-out times and met us on arrival where she had all the house instructions and some tips about the area.
I would definitely recommend staying here.

We really loved Ibrahim's place. Its located in the very nice part of the center of Amsterdam. Waterlooplein was just 8 min walk away. Apartment was clean and as stated in the descriptions. He has given us some useful tips for the city and even went extra miles to help us rebook our flights as the call center agents were speaking only in Dutch. He has a very well decorated apartment with comfortable double bed. Living room and kitchen was well equipped and cozy. All the museums are on the same canal front starting with the Tropical Museum being next to the apartment, we walked towards Van Gogh museum in about 10-15 min from the apartment. I strongly recommend his apartment.

We really  enjoyed  staying  at the Ibrahim's apartment. We were  late  due to our flight  delay,  but there were  no problem  with  chek in. We really enjoyed our stay at Ibrahim's place. It's located in a beatiful area, 20-30min by feet from the center or 15min by transport. But a walk is much better. The flat is good for two persons. Unfortunately we did not meet with Ibrahim in person, but the communication prior and during my stay was incredible. The apartment was really amazing and the neighborhood is quiet and not that touristy, but very close to the city center. Thanks for an amazing stay, Ibrahim!

Out of the 3 times I've been to Amsterdam, this was the best!

Ibrahim was the most perfect host!

Just amazing apartment, just beautiful inside.
We come back in the future

Ibrahim's place was very clean and neat. We really enjoyed staying there, and it was easy to get into town with a tram line at the end of the road. We hired bikes which made it quick as well. The area is lovely and we enjoyed exploring slightly outside of the city centre as well. Ibrahim was a fantastic host and could not speak more highly of him, he was on hand throughout the trip and offered excellent advice and aid when necessary.

Perfectly located in Amsterdam's hip, booming Oost neighborhood, Ibrahim's comfy apartment is a perfect alternative to a hotel during your Amsterdam stay. It is close to public transportation, and a short walk to Centraal and all the sights. Amsterdam's famous Artis Park Zoo is just around the corner. A huge treat is the nearby Dappermarkt with over 250 stalls serving up culturally diverse food, clothes and gifts. Trendy bars and restaurants are right around the corner. The apartment is clean, comfy and we'll equipped. Large windows front and rear fill the rooms with soft light and fresh air. The bed is welcoming after a long day exploring Amsterdam. An inviting sofa and big screen TV are great for when you want to stay in and relax. I lived my stay and am certain you will too.

A really comfy stay. Living room with big white sofa to stretch out on or cosy up with your loved one on the snuggle couch.
Bedroom and bathroom in the basement, lovely and cool in the hot weather. Nice shower.
Everything you need in the kitchen but we went out to eat.
Nice outdoor area for relaxing but also very near to Vondelpark. The park is well worth a visit for those who picnic or like a stroll.
Very close to some museums and a few nice local restaurants/cafes in the streets around the accommodation.
Trams close by but we walked everywhere.
Inge is a very pleasant lady to deal with, great communication beforehand and did everything to ensure our stay was trouble free.
We would consider staying again when in Amsterdam.

We had a wonderful stay at Inge's place. And Inge is a wonderful person and assisted us on everything.

That place is located in a posh and quiet area near the Stedelijk museum (a must see), supermarket and restaurants. It is also near all the fancy shops (big brands) for those who like to shop. Not to forget that it's also close to the Vondelpark. Transportation is as well within a minute walk (tram to center).

The apartment is nice and comfortable. Inge has large couches. You only need to share the kitchen together which we didn't mind. Inge travels a lot for work, but even when she was present, she didn't bother us at all. We felt at home. There is also a nice terrace in back to relax on a sunny day.

We would definitely recommend it.

(Dear Ellen! Thank you for everything! I wrote a lot of good things about you, abaout the house, the little garden, the cats, the town ...etc. We enjoyed our excellent holiday, we felt us as a born Dutch with your bikes through and through the canals and streets.
Love, Eszter and the boys)

A clean and cozy apartment with everything we needed, in an older house with a typical steep staircase. Made us feel a bit like Amsterdamers for 1 week. Away from the crowded city in a calm residential quarter but with perfect access to the center by Metro, Tram, Bus, by a pleasant 30 min walk along the riverside of the Amstel - or by bike wich we rented nearby. Two shopping areas around the corner even with biological food. And it all started with a warm welcome in the midst of the night from our kind host Pauline, super-friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone.

Pauline was extremely welcoming and quick to respond to our messages. She was very helpful when we first arrived and offered directions from the metro, etc.

The flat is beautiful and cosy, not too far from the city centre. We found the location to be ideal as it wasn't as busy as the main city but also not too far from the metro or the zoo! The area also has some nice places to get coffee and food :)

Would highly recommend!
Very friendly host, lovely clean flat with good transport links to the city center. This  listing is exceptional value and has my highest recommendation.

Pauline is an amazing and accommodating host. She welcomed and helped us with our luggage upon arrival and then talked us through the facilities in the flat. The flat is clean and really cute. The little balcony is a bonus! Location is fab as only four stops away from Central station and bus/ tram stops also nearby. The area is up-and-coming and has a few cafes, bike shops and supermarket within walking distance.

Overall we had an amazing experience - thanks a lot, Pauline, would definitely love to come back :)

I stayed with my 12 year old son for 6 days at Pauline's apartment.
It is a small but very beautiful, modern, quiet and lightful apartment with a nice little balcony and a comfortable bed. It's perfect for 1 or 2 person. The apartment is close to the metro and you have only a few minutes to the city center. Stores and good restaurants are around the corner. Pauline was very nice and during our stay she asked us if everything is all right. We would everytime come back.

Ich war mit meinem Sohn (12) fÃ?r 6 Tage in der Wohnung von Pauline.
Es ist eine kleine, aber sehr schÃ¶ne, moderne, ruhig gelegene und lichtvolle Wohnung mit einem kleinen Balkon und einem bequemen Bett. Die Wohnung ist perfekt fÃ?r 1 oder 2 Person/en. Die Wohnung ist nur ein paar Schritte von der Metro entfernt und ganz in der NÃ?he liegen SupermÃ?rkte und leckere Restaurants. Mit der Metro hat man nur wenige Minuten bis ins Stadtzentrum. Pauline war sehr freundlich und hat sich wÃ?hrend unseres Aufenthalts immer wieder nach unserem Wohlbefinden erkundigt. Die SchlÃ?sselÃ?bergabe hat perfekt geklappt. Wir kommen jederzeit gerne wieder.

Very nice lady. Extremely clean and cosy appartment. Pauline gives you a lot of tips and tricks for things to do, places to go and where to eat. She also very flexible. My friend and I had a great time in Amsterdam, and that's definitely also thanks to Pauline! A+

Me and my husband have just came back from our honeymoon in Amsterdam. It was a fantastic time for us and one more reason for it is that we stayed at Pauline's apartment.
Pauline is a wonderful host, she was very polite and gave us all the necessary information in detail. She also congratulated us with our wedding and that was very sweet and pleasant for us.
The apartment is well-located close to the metro and tram station and there is a good supermarket just around the corner. The apartment is very clean and bright and though not too big, it is very stylish and have all the necessary. Another thing we love about it is a little balcony with table and chairs and lavender bushes.
Thank you for everything, Pauline!
Best host and best experience ever. Beautiful place and convenient location. Everything was just perfect!!!

Pauline is a gorgeous woman and a great host. She helps you with everything you need. We love her small but very cozy and stylish apartment. The balcony is also great and really make you feel like home. The apartment is located in a quiet and central area with good public transport connections. We had a great time there and of course we would come back sometime!

It was a very good time in paulines appartement. The appartement was very modern and has a friendly interior.    Nearby there are many cafÃ©s and restaurants. Also the Center is only a few minutes away with the metro. Paulines was a very friendly host.

Pauline's apartment was perfect for the two of us. It was also really clean and tidy which was nice. Her apartment is nearby an Albert-Heijn which made it super convenient for us to get groceries.

Pauline herself was super attentive to us and made sure we were well taken of. Really recommend a stay here if you really want to explore amsterdam from a local's point of view.

We had a wonderful stay at Pauline's apartment. It was well located for us in a quiet and lovely neighbourhood. The bed is very comfortable and the kitchen had everything we needed. I highly recommend this apartment.
Chic, clean and well appointed apartment close to essential transit and shops. Pauline was very nice and helpful and responded promptly to questions.
Vy nice staying

Lovely location and communication was great.  Pauline was nice enough to let us leave our luggage in her home even after checking out so we can pick it up later.
Pauline was a wonderful host and the apartment was a good location for our trip to Amsterdam
Appartamento ideale per visitare la cittÃ  5 min a piedi da metro e tram per raggiungere con poche fermate il centro. Pauline Ã¨ molto disponibile e molto gentile. Consigliato

The apartment was lovely. Very close to the metro and tram, making it easy to get around. The area was quiet and residential. Communication was great and there were no issues when we were a little late to check in. A wonderful stay in a fantastic city- can't wait to come back!
A hospitalidade Ã© maravilhosa. O apartamento tambÃ©m. Super bem localizado e as dicas foram incrÃ?veis. Fizemos tudo de bike. Passamos dias maravilhosos!! Voltaremos com certeza!!

Sooo much thanks to Pauline for the cozy and comfortable apartment. It is easy to find the location with the instruction from Pauline. The house is in a lovely neighbourhood with supermarket and restaurant close by. Metro and tram can be easily reached with around 5 minutes walk. The apartment is neat and tidy, I especially love the kitchen!!
Pauline and her friend are always assessable for enquiry or help. ItâÄôs also so kind that she left us with some tourist information even though we didnâÄôt meet her during the stay. We had a wonderful time in NL!

PaulineâÄôs apartment is the perfect launchpad for exploring Amsterdam. The location was close to public transit, felt very safe, and lots of fun shops and cafes within walking distance. We loved coming home to a quiet and convenient neighborhood and living like locals!
Pauline Ã¨ molto cordiale e disponibile, posizione comoda essendo vicino alla metro e con quella si va ovunque. Molto soddisfatto!

Lovely apartment, very clean and tidy. About a 30-40 minute walk into central Amsterdam. Supermarket almost directly opposite which was very handy. Aicha was very kind and waiting for us to check in as our flight was delayed. Everything we could of needed was there, would highly recommend!

PaulineâÄôs place was great! Very clean, the bathroom was much larger than I expected. She also accommodated my early check in request which was really convenient! IâÄôd highly recommend this place to anyone visiting Amsterdam.

PaulineâÄôs home is a perfect place to be if you are looking to be somewhere close to the Amsterdam central. ItâÄôs completely functional and super close to the nearest metro station. The little balcony and fully functional kitchen is a added advantage. We totally enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it to others too.

This is a great place. The bed and bedroom are great for sleeping--very comfortable bed and quiet area. We were able to eat most of our meals in the unit--the kitchen has everything you need. Nice to relax on the balcony at the end of the day. We loved the neighborhood, outside the tourist bubble, yet easy to get anywhere on public transit, with a Metro station about 5 minutes away. Great communication with host.

Pauline's apartment was perfect! A home away from home
Exactly what we needed.

PaulineâÄôs place was great. Bed was super comfortable and the location was right by Metro and Tram stops.
Stairs are quite steep.
Apartment does back on to a school so there is a bit of noise during the school day.
Lovely place overall and Pauline was extremely helpful and accommodating for check in/check out

good price,  close to a metro to center of town, and kitchen to cook for yourself.  as pauline notes,  you do need to be able to go up steps, quite steep.  we had a great adventure in amsterdam.  bon voyage!

Myrthe was a fantastic host even before the trip had started. Upon booking we received a very useful guide with tourist information and restaurant recommendations. Upon arriving we received a lovely hamper with a bottle of bubbly, juices, fresh fruit and a map. The studio flat was lovely for two people and was very clean. Before leaving us Myrthe told us we were more than welcome to use anything in the apartment and to help ourselves to anything in the fridge. I was very impressed that she also went above and beyond what is usually expected and had the bathroom fully stocked with toiletries. The apartment is in a nice quiet part of Amsterdam with everything in walking distance. I would definitely recommend staying here!!

What a wonderful weekend! The flat was lovely and airy, very clean and just what we needed.  The photos don't really do it justice. It is near to lots of stuff but far enough away to be quiet in the evenings and very close to buses and trams as well.  Myrthe was very helpful with lots of local info and left us with a nice welcome! Nice comfortable bed and a good shower.  This may have been a once in a life time trip for us, but if we ever get another chance to go back, I would definitely go back to Myrthe's lovely flat.
The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We enjoyed everything about our stay in Amsterdam at Myrthe's. Her apartment was lovely and conveniently located. She was so friendly, she made us feel very welcome. Her bed was very comfortable, we slept well every night. She gave great directions, and was extremely helpful offering suggestions for places to go and things to do every day of our stay.  We had such a great time, we hope to return to Amsterdam soon and stay at Myrthe's place again. We highly recommend booking with her.

My boyfriend and I were really happy and pleased with our stay at Myrthe 's. The house is cozy and clean and in a perfect position. Myrthe is super kind and willing to help for anything we needed. I will totally recommend to book with her :)
Nous avons passÃ© un super weekend chez Myrthe ! Une hÃ´te accueillante et chaleureuse ! Je la recommande vivement Ã  qui veut passer un weekend parfait en amoureux Ã  Amsterdam !!

What a fantastic host! We met the lovely Myrthe for a drink before we went to the apartment and we had a good old chat about each other and about Amsterdam itself.
We were then shown to the fabulous retro chic apartment. The photos do not do this place justice! Beautifully laid out with a fabulous wet room and cute little balcony.. And right across the road from a fantastic little bar!
We had everything we could possibly need including drinks and snacks and a bottle of prosecco to really get the weekend going! We were given a pack that told us all about the area and given the wifi password so we could upload our snaps and keep in touch with people from home.
I can't recommend this apartment more! If you're looking for somewhere away from noise of 24 hour Amsterdam but only 15 minutes from the centre (less than 5 minutes on the bus) then this is the place for you! You'll be looked after and your host is only a text message away!
Huge thanks to Myrthe for a fabulous weekend away! We will definitely be back!!
Big love from the "couple"
See you next year and you must come to the parade with us :-D

Even though Myrthe was not available to welcome us in person, her brother was there and helped us.
She was of but always reachable if required.

The neighbourhood is close to Jordaan but far enough to be calm and quiet at night.

Our stay at Myrthes was fantastic! From communicating the few weeks before to the day of our arrival, she was amazing! The apartment was exactly like the photos, clean and well decorated! Perfect for a few days in Amsterdam. The location was very convenient, lots of places to eat around and easy to get to! I would highly recommend this place to anyone!

The place was beautiful and much bigger than expected! In the perfect area far enough away from everything touristic but close enough to walk to everything. Myrthe left fantastic advice for places to eat and go so you truly did feel like a local. Will deffinatley stay again next time we come to Amsterdam in the future :)

Our stay in this appartment was perfect. The place was very clean, tidy and well decorated, we felt good there!
Myrthe was also very kind and friendly and she provide a good guide with a lot of restaurant / bar suggestions.
The Joordan neighborhood is wonderful, quiet and in the same time with a lot a good restaurants, Littles stores etc, very charming we definitely felt in love!

This was a great place to stay in Amsterdam! Myrthe was a great host and met us near the apartment on the first day. She gave us great info on what to do in the area and even had a guide put together for restaurants, bars, and things to do.

The apartment itself was great! Very nice, clean, and well decorated. It was located right next to the Joordan area and is extremely convenient to get around. We were able to walk everywhere during our stay. It's also a 5-minute walk to the bus/tram stop. We used this on our last day to quickly get a bus to Amsterdam Central Station where we could get a train to the airport. You could also use this bus/tram stop to get around the city if you were tired for walking.

The apartment was a quick walk to restaurants, bars, and cafes. There's a great restaurant/bar right down the street from the apartment which had wonderful local craft beer and great food!

It was really a great place to stay and was perfect for our trip!

Myrthe is an incredibly warm and caring host. She came and picked us up at the bus station, showed us the flat and also offered assistance with nightlife and sightseeing. the flat is as depicted and makes you feel welcome. there are a lot of kitchen appliances which you can use. and it is close to everything. we walked into the city center and it takes around half an hour which is fine.
very happy to have been here.

We had a great 3 night stay at Mrythe's apartment! She was easy to communicate with prior to our visit and even arranged for us to leave our luggage with a neighbor/friend so that we didn't have to carry it around all day. She met us promptly at check in time (5 minutes early). Welcomed us with a bottle of Sparkling wine and then took is out for drinks at an awesome cafe/pub right around the corner.
The apartment was really comfortable, huge sectional couch that was great to come back to and sink in after long days of walking the city. Mrythe provided us with a detailed guidebook so we could easily locate everything we were interested in doing.
The kitchen seemed very well equipped, and we had planned to cook, but ended up eating out as everything was so convenient.
The Jordaan area is great, I highly recommend staying here.

Myrthe was so friendly and her place was exactly as described in the post. The apartment was clean, centrally located, quiet and perfect for what we were looking for! I'd absolutely stay there again. :)
Absolutely loved staying here! The host came and met us when we arrived. Great location! We will be back :)

The apartment was wonderful! The pictures are accurate and the place is actually better then the pictures. Myrthe was very flexible with our arrival and departure which was great and very appreciated. The apartment is located in a quiet area however it is close to lots of restaurants, pubs, felt safe, good area. We would stay here again!

We came to Amsterdam for my husbands birthday and couldn't have asked for a better apartment to stay in. Myrthe was a fantastic host and came and met us from the bus stop and took us to the apartment pointing out places to eat/drink on the way. The apartment was beautiful and was a great location. We walked everywhere and easy to find our way around. We are already planning to come back next year for our 1st wedding anniversary! Thank you Myrthe :-)

Fantastic place! The apartment was really sweet, and had all we needed (and more!). Myrthe was also a great host, really helpful advice and let me leave my bags after check out time - life saver! Would definitely stay again :)

Myrthe was an awesome host! She met us at check-in for a drink, gave us a bunch of great recommendations of what to do during our stay, many of which we took her up on and regretted none. The apartment is great and almost felt like we were in a hotel. While not right in the central area, still very walkable to everything. We really enjoyed our stay and would highly recommend!

Myrthe's apartment is even nicer than the pictures, in an extremely cozy neighborhood conveniently located for cafes, restaurants and public transportation. Myrthe is also an incredibly considerate host. She was available to answer questions throughout my visit and she made sure I had everything I needed in the apartment. A wonderful experience!
We had a great stay at Myrthe's place! Lovely apartment with amazing location. Thank you Myrthe for an awesome place in Amsterdam :)

Myrthe was a gracious hostess who went out of her way to make us feel welcome, and to help us become acclimated to the area.  The location of the apartment is within easy walking distance to beautiful historic Amsterdam.  The apartment was spacious, comfortable and well appointed. I would recommend to friends without hesitation!

Unique, stylish, comfortable, well located area would be perfect for all types! Myrthe went above and beyond for us, regarding info a made us feel very at home. Even went and took us for coffee. Amazing host. Highest recommendation!

This home was perfect for us! The best place to come back to after a day of sightseeing and shopping. Myrthe is an amazing host, you could tell she really cares for her guests and she's very easy to communicate with. We will definitely recommend this place and hopefully we'll be back 1 day

MyrtheâÄôs apartment was absolutely perfect! My husband and I spent our first anniversary in Amsterdam and we could not have asked for better accommodations. Myrthe was very quick to respond to messages, her apartment is in a great location, and she even met us at the bus stop upon our arrival! Her apartment is in a quiet neighborhood thatâÄôs easily within walking distance to the city center, museums, and great restaurants. Myrthe created a listing of recommendations that we found to be very helpful. We ended up spending most of our time in the Jordaan neighborhood based on her suggestions. I would absolutely recommend her apartment!!

We canâÄôt say enough positive things about our stay at MyrtheâÄôs apartment! It is located on a quiet street just a short walk from the Jordaan are. ThereâÄôs a local bar across the street and a park around the corner. Bus and tram stations are close by. It was very easy to get to from the train station and MyrtheâÄôs directions were excellent.

Upon our arrival, Myrthe met us at Broer, the cafe/bar near the place, and welcomed us with some beers. Meeting her was one of the highlights of our trip! She was so fun to talk with and it was a great was to learn about the city from a local. Later, she emailed us a document with all of her recommendations for Amsterdam, and many suggestions based on what we talked about at the bar!

The apartment itself was perfect - quiet, clean, and comfortable. Very spacious, too. We loved having space to spread out. There is a washing machine, should you need it. And as if buying us drinks wasnâÄôt enough, Myrthe left us a bottle of sparkling wine to welcome us to Amsterdam and offered up all of the drinks in the fridge. Before she left, Myrthe made it clear that we were more than welcome to message her should we need anything else during our stay.

Absolutely unforgettable stay thanks for Myrthe. We hope to return to Amsterdam and stay again!
My Wife and I stayed in MyrtheâÄôs place for 4 days and we had such a great time! Myrthe is very kind and her place is in a great location.

Excellent apartment , clean , spacious with balcony , well equiped with everything we need . Myrthe was realy helpful and welcoming , She stay in contact with us and asking if we need anything . I recommend this apartment to any one who would like to enjoy his trip to Amsterdam
Myrthe was a great host with a lovely apartment! Would definitely recommend :)

Myrthe's place was just wonderful! The appartment was very homely, fully equipped and exceptional clean. We met Myrthe in person at check in for a coffee, which was such a pleasure in itself. gold star host.

My husband and I stayed at Myrthe's place for 7 days and enjoyed every expected and unexpected  amenity.  Myrthe was detailed and thorough with her accommodation description and directions to her place.  She was in contact with us to be sure our arrival went as planned, we were comfortable and all our needs were provided.  Myrthe's fully furnished apartment was clean and the balcony was a nice touch.  The bed and couches were very comfortable. The neighbors and surrounding neighborhoods were quiet and also welcoming in passing.  The location of Mrythe's place worked great for us. The bus and tram were within 2 blocks of her place, the markets were within walking distance and plenty of cafe's and restaurants nearby.  Mrythe went above and beyond to assist us with navigating our way around Amsterdam and the surrounding area, as well as assisting us in getting to Brugge by Train.  For our first trip to Amasterdam we found Mrythe to be an amazing host and guide.  I would recommend Myrthes place to any of my family or friends!  Thank you Myrthe!
Great place. Appreciated all of MyrtheâÄôs tips on the area!

A superb place to stay. super lovely location and the best host my wife and I have ever encountered.

Nothing lacking here.

My partner and I stayed at MyrtheâÄôs home for a duration of 3 days. The flat is beautifully decorated and was very warm and cosy. Myrthe is an exceptional host, catering to our needs with all the necessary amenities one needs for a comfortable stay. The location of the flat is excellent, with the loads of tourist attractions within walking distance. Myrthe greeted us when we arrived and even bought us a drink! We really appreciated Myrthe checking in with us via text every now and then. Thank you for your great hospitality, Myrthe!

MyrtheâÄôs place was wonderful! We loved meeting her for a drink during check-in and she gave us all kinds of great tips of things to check out. Her place is a short walk to the downtown Amsterdam waterfront so we didnâÄôt even end up using public transportation during our whole stay. Really nice apartment as well. Highly recommend!!

Myrthe was lovely and so was her place! She took us out for a drink upon our arrival and told us about all the spots! She made a guide for us with all the things to do and see. Her place was conveniently located, cute and clean. I would stay there again in a heartbeat.

The landlady makes every effort to make you feel comfortable in Amsterdam. She even wrote a little guide, which she hands out on request. The best tips are included to make city life as close as possible. In the apartment there is nothing missing. It's like in the description. Public transport is nearby. So you I can highly recommend this place to all travelers. Thank you for such beautiful days!

We had an amazing time at MyrtheâÄòs place. The apartment was clean and near to the city center. Myrthe was the best host we could imagine. Easy communication all over the time. We can highly recommend this Airbnb! Thanks for all, Myrthe! :-)

My partner and I arrived early and the SuperHost was able to accommodate us. We really appreciated the extra attention after a 9 hour flight with a total travel time of 14 hours that day.
The location of the apartment is fantastic. There is a very nice cafe around the corner and lots of other eating establishments within walking distance. It's a short walk to several public transportation options.
The host's suggestions for things to do and see was very helpful. I think we hit almost every item on the list.
When we were not out exploring, the apartment felt homey and very comfortable. We did not use the kitchen, but it appeared to be stocked with all the necessities. The bathroom was clean and spacious. The living room was comfortable. There is an amazing amount of natural light coming in through huge windows. It was cold during our visit, so we did not sit on the patio, but it has a nice view over the neighboring gardens.
We really enjoyed our first visit to Amsterdam and definitely recommend staying at this apartment.
It was a nice place to stay. They welcomed me warmly and even offered me bread and tea. Room and other places were nice and clean.

Great location close to de pijp, which has lots of little bars/restaurants/shops and feels much more authentic than the center. Super friendly welcome, the host is very accomodating and supportive regarding my schedule (checkin, etc.). The room was clean, everything was there, and I felt very comfortable. All in all a highly positive experience.

This is a great place to stay. As described it is a small cozy room, the key word being cozy. Nasrien made sure I really felt comfortable and at home. From the minute I walked in. It was clear to me that she just wanted to make sure I had a great, comfortable and restful time. The apartment was super clean and anything I required was available. As I had travelled for work purposes, she was happy to show me where I had to go. The apartment is conveniently located close to Amsterdam RAI and so is easily reachable from the city and the airport which was perfect for me.
Nasrien is a great host. as a single young traveller it can get slightly overwhelming and lonely but Nasrien was available for any questions and general chit chat.
I would recommend staying here and would be happy to stay again.

Nasrien is a great host, she will become your friend in Amsterdam for sure, Kind and sweet person, easy going with a busy life but still time to have a chat with you.
The area is great easy to get in to central Amsterdam and has restaurants, groceries stores, gym etc etc.... whatever you need is around there.
Very friendly and flexible host (very late arrival). I have really felt at home with her and her lovely daughters. I hope we'll see each other soon!
Very nice guest, again and agaiN!
Lovely, clean apartment. Nasrien is a generous host. Couldn't have felt more welcome.
The room is exactly as depicted in the ad. Comfortable bed and very nice hostess. Lovely family. Walking distance from public transport stations.
The host canceled this reservation 81 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Easy to get there, close, really clean and the Nasrien is very nice, look no further, this is your place of you want to stay in Amsterdam, thank you for everything.
Btw Nasrien makes the best coffee ever.
Nasrien was a very kind and thoughtful host, and makes an excellent coffee! It is a lovely, warm family home, providing a little taste of dutch life. I wish I stayed a little longer..!

She has really nice hospitality.
Very quiet place, 20min tram ride to city center.
It was nice stay.
Everything went very fine. Cozy small room. Thanks!

Nasrien was the warmest, most welcoming hostess who could be imagined, and her 9-year old daughter is lovely. Their home is comfortable and my room was spotless.
I just joined in the home life in the evenings, and was made to feel almost one of the family. If/when I go back to Amsterdam I hope to stay with them again.
Staying at Nasrien's place was great. She and her daughter made me feel welcomed, the room was delightful, and the neiborghood was very easy to access. I highly recommend it. Thank you Nasrien!
Nice, clean and very quiet room and apartment, close to public transportation. I enjoyed my stay.

Nasrien was very welcoming--offering tea and coffee and conversation right away. The room is as advertised, near both a tram and not far from a subway (took me about 20 minutes to get to the city center). It's very quiet at night--easy to sleep.
She was very kind and open--I had a nice stay here.
The room is exactly as described; it is cozy and comfortable to rest. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful. Nasrien is a very welcoming host.

Nasrien was very warm and welcoming, offering me tea, coffee, and water when I arrived. She also left a cute little souvenir on my bed to remind me of Amsterdam, which was sweet.

The room is as she advertises - cozy and small. Unfortunately, it was after I booked when the conditions for breakfast changed - available only upon request - and I didn't realize until the second day when I re-checked the ad. Because Nasrien was stressed about her new dog though, I didn't want to add extra pressure by asking for breakfast, but it would have been nice to have a banana or something small before I started my day.

Please note that the toilet is on one floor and the washroom sink is on another - a minor inconvenience, but luckily I carry around a bottle of sanitizer in my purse.

Also note that the flat is marked as "smoking not allowed", but I smelled cigarettes during both nights I was there. I was unsure whether the smoke was coming from within the flat, but perhaps confirm this with Nasrien if this would be an issue for you. I kept the bedroom door closed at all times so none of my belongings smelled like smoke after I left.

All in all, the room suited my purposes, which was to be a place to sleep at night. The room itself faces onto a back garden so there were no noises to intrude on a good sleep. Nasrien was nice and helped with directions on how to get to the city where I was meeting friends. If I timed it right, it took me just over half an hour to get to Centraal Station, door-to-door.

If you know what to expect from this place, this is a better option than staying in one of the city's numerous, over-priced hostels where you have to share a room with strangers.
Hi,Nasrien, thanks very much for the very warmly host!

Nasrien was a great host and I had a wonderful first-time experience in Amsterdam, as well as using Airbnb! Nasrien provided a very detailed information on how to get to her place before my travel. She immediately made me feel warm and welcomed when I arrived. Her place and the room listed were spotless! The location of her place is great too - with shops around and great transport links. It is also a very quiet area so you get nice sleeps!

Nasrien is a great host and a lovely lady, I would certainly recommend her to anyone (especially solo travellers!) who is traveling to Amsterdam.

She was really nice all the time and provided a nice and relaxed conversation. Because she had quite a lot of experiences in her life she doesn't run out of stories to share. She also respecto your privacy a lot. The listing was very accurate and the neighborhood was nice, didn't have any problem. If I go back to the city I'm sure I'll try to stay with her again.
It is a nice room with a perfect location, only several minutes by walk to RAI. Nasrien is really friendly and she can help you what you need. I do have a good time there, strongly recommended.
Nasrien's apartment was very clean and tidy. The bed is comfortable and you can sleep well throughout the night. I would say my home is not even as clean as hers! Highly recommended!
Nasrian was a great host. The room was clean and as described. Trams are within easy walking distance. Cheers

Nice place on the south of the city, very close to RAI. It will take about 20 minutes to get to the city center by tram, or about 50 minutes of walk. The room is small, clean and comfortable. Nasrien is friendly and helpful host. She will always answer to your questions.

The description is accurate, the apartment its very close to the tram stop and from there its like 10 minutes to get to the Flower market and 17 min to the Central Station.. Nasrien is friendly and bubbly, and makes you feel like home, I felt welcomed and she gave me lots of advices of what to do around during my stay.. While I was there, she was doing some improvements to her house so I guess next guests will have a even better stay than mine :)
Thanks for everything Nasrien!
Comfortable room, good service and very nice host. 30mins walk from city centre. I had a great time staying at this place.

Nasrien was incredibly kind with me even before I got to Amsterdam via (Hidden by Airbnb) . She always answered my messages even though she is a super busy woman. The apartment was nice and clean all the time.
I liked talking to her becaus she is really smart, outgoing, selfless, and independent. Thanks for everything, really.
Great host, good place ! Thank you very much, Nasrien

The host was quite open and frank. She explained everything to me and even showed me a part of the area where she lives. Her place is well located near most attractions that you would want to see in Amsterdam. The tram and bus stops are close and it is near the airport. Nasrien listens to your plans and offers good suggestions. The neighbourhood is residential and safe with nice cafes. I would recommend staying at Nasrien's place.

Nasrien was a wonderful host and made me feel extremely welcome in her home. The room was delightful as was the entire apartment. It is in a quiet, safe area of Amsterdam which meant walking around the neighbourhood in the evening was stress free.  There are many supermarkets and restaurants and bars within a short distance it is also close to a tramstop so the centre of the city is about twenty minutes away.  The apartment is lovely and decorated tastefully. I would not recommend it if you have mobility problems as there are many stairs.

Nasrien was very welcoming and helpful, and the room was adequate for my needs. The neighbourhood seems very nice (although I didn't spend all that much time there): quiet but close enough to the centre.

Nasriens was a nice host. Her place was super clean and she explained a lot to me about the area and how to get to some key locations, which I appreciated. There was only about a ten to 15 minute ride on the Tram to central station. It's a good location for people that don't want to be right in the center.

I had a good stay at Nasrien's place. It was easy to get to and in a nice quiet area. The whole place was spacious, bright, and clean.

Nasrien was a good host. We did not have the opportunity to chat too much during most of my stay, but I enjoyed talking with her on the first day as she gave me the tour of her apartment. She showed me everything I could need.

First of all, I haven't stayed at this place and can not say anything about the accommodation.

Nasrien was absolutely lovely, and her flat was also very nice and welcoming. It was the perfect place to come back to after a long day of exploring Amsterdam. Thank you so much!

A really nice location. Nasrien a very welcoming and friendly host with a lovely family. Comfy bed and great shower. Thanks for having me.

Nasrien is a wonderful host. Though the accessibility to the bathroom sink was a bit awkward her hospitality made up for it.
Thank you! Everything was clean and nice!

I had a very pleasant stay. Nasrien and her daughter were adorable. I went to Amsterdam for a conference in RAI, which is walking distance from the flat. I had everything that I needed and I felt very welcomed.

Nasrien is very nice and talkative, she was very helpful via (Hidden by Airbnb) and offered me coffee and tea. I felt that I can write her anytime and she will help me.
The room is small and cozy and also cheap, so I didn't expect anything special. Everything looks like on photos and it is absolutely OK if you travel alone and you just need to oversleep somewhere. To the centre
It is about 15 - 20 minut and connections are very good.
What I didn't like: the room was a bit cold for me, but I got really good blanket, also the Internet connection is not the best one, it was slow.

Nasrien was a great host, very friendly and easy going. The house was very clean with everything you need for a short stay. Close to the airport, public transport and easy to get to and from Amsterdam.
All was perfect!

Merel and Mart were great, they made us feel very welcomed and were very accomodating.
Their apartment is really nice. It's well located and transportation is easily accessible.
We did not stay very long but Merel and Mart helped us make the most of it
We really enjoyed our stay and wish we could've stayed longer !

Big thanks to Merel and Mart for hosting me. Merel approved my reservation in the last evening before my arrival and with no hesitation. The location is pretty central, for me it was perfect, as it was in 5min walking distance to RAI.
The apartament is as described. It had all necessities. The bed is very comfortable.
Did not personally meet Merel, but Mart was very friendly and helpful. Would stay at their place again and would recommend it to others.

Merel and her husband are a really nice and lovely couple. The apartment was really confortable and clean, and we loved the smalls details that they have all around the house describing their adventures. They helped us to get there and we had some small chats (they have a perfect english). The bathroom was really clean also. There are 2 supermarkets within a walking distance (10min) and a bar (5min), and you can get to Amsterdam centraal in 20 by tram.

We stayed just for one night with Merel and Mart to visit Amsterdam for a short citytrip. Their apartment is very beautiful and we loved the room. The bed was just great. We didn't meet Mart but Merel was a perfect host, she even offered their bikes to explore the city.
Also the location is very convenient, it is close enough to the highway but the neighbourhood is very quiet and peaceful, if you walk 5min you can take a tram straight to the centre.
We loved our short stay in Amsterdam!!

Merel's apartment is lovely. It's in a quiet residential area, but close to local commerce and just 15 minutes on a bike from central Amsterdam. The room is very comfortable and Merel is a good host, open to chat and respectful of the guests privacy. Our stay was great.

Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt bei Merel in Amsterdam. Das Zimmer ist gemÃ?tlich und perfekt fÃ?r ein Wochenende fÃ?r zwei Personen. Merel ist eine tolle Gastgeberin.
