Fantastic stay,nice local bars and restaurants close by. Merel and her husband are very friendly and helpful
PERFECT!

L'appartement est proche d'un arrÃªt de tram qui est Ã  4-5 stations du centre. Merel est trÃ¨s accueillante et la chambre correspond aux photos. Je recommande pour passer un week-end pour visiter la ville !

My son and I had a great time staying in this lovely apartment, which was also in a fantastic neighbourhood - particularly if you have children as the Vondelpark is so close by. The apartment is gorgeous, including a beautiful tranquil roof garden. There are three steep flights of steps up to the apartment so be aware of this if you are traveling with young children.

My family had a wonderful stay at MarleenâÄôs beautiful home. Although she was on vacation when we arrived, her very friendly neighbour, Francis, was there to greet us and to show us around the house. We were immediately impressed with the house: it is very spacious and bright, with lots of sunshine. In fact, it is the first Airbnb accommodation we have stayed at that actually looks exactly like the photos (most use a wide angle lens, which makes them look 30% larger than they actually are). The home was beautifully furnished, and the beds were comfortable. The kitchen was fully equipped for cooking, and I quite enjoyed the espresso machine to help me start the day. The highlight of the home for us was the rooftop garden, which was a nice place to relax in the evening weather permitting. We also had the pleasure of taking care of the family cat, Moskou, who was no trouble at all. Marleen generously made the familyâÄôs bicycles available for us to use, though we ended up renting, as we needed a bike with a child seat. She also prepared a (Hidden by Airbnb) map of the area with many of her favourite spots highlighted, which made life easier for us. The neighbourhood was quiet, and far enough away from the centre of town for us to experience a genuine Dutch living experience, but within easy cycling distance of the highlights of the city. We stayed for eight days, and would definitely stay at MarleenâÄôs home on our next visit to Amsterdam. I highly recommend staying at this home when visiting Amsterdam.

Worth the climb! If you don't know Amsterdam, the steep narrow stairs are typical, but unless you have physical issues with this, Marleen's place was simply wonderful--spacious, stylish, and clean, with a very cool rooftop terrace. The location could not have been better. Marleen sent her very nice niece to let us in and show us the place, then we had it to ourselves (except for the cat; yes, there's a sweet little cat--note this for those with allergies). Marleen left instructions for everything and made sure to communicate with us regularly. We had only a week there but we'd love to come back and stay longer.

we had a lovely time at this house.  perfect location, very enjoyable roof top terrace and the excellent coffee set up was a very nice surprise.  we also really loved the company of Moskou the house cat!

Although the stairs were quite steep, we enjoyed the apartment very much. The roof terrace has a wonderful view of the city and the kitchen is a real bonus. Even as a group of 4 people we didnâÄôt feel cramped at all.
I would recommend this flat to anyone looking for a central, cozy and quiet space in amsterdam.

Estelle was a great host.  Communicated well before we arrived and waited for us till 11pm to hand us the keys.  Apartment has amazing location and within walking distance to everything.  Apartment itself is well maintained with a large balcony that unfortunately we were not able to enjoy due to the rain.  The folder of notes from Estelle about the neighbourhood was very useful as well.

My wife and I spent 3 nights at Estelle's apartment.
The location is great, the apartment is wonderful and everything is in walking distance.
Estelle was there for any question and I'm sure that our next vacation in Amsterdam we'll check if this apartment is free.
If you're going to spend some nights in Amsterdam this is the place for you!
Thanks Estelle for everything (:
The host canceled this reservation 73 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Esetlle's place was very well equipped and maintained, cosy apartament, with the added feature of a balcony. Communication was easy and responses were always quick.
Location in Jordaan is excellent. We were very happy with our accommoodation.

Estelle's condo was amazing! She left us a nice welcome gift, several pages of places to check out around the area, and made sure we had everything we needed before she left. Lovely apartment in my favorite zone in Amsterdam, i absolutely spent great time here. Estelle was very kind, helpful and super professional!
At our arrival, a bottle a red wine was on a table to welcome us. Sofia is a tenant who make things easy. Flat is perfectly located in a quiet area and so close to the best museum and center.

Sofia did everything she could to make us feel welcomed.  The flat was very clean, light and airy.  The neighborhood  was good with easy access to the museums and the center of town. We enjoyed our visit very much and would stay here again.
Great base for exploring the city. Rob and Andrea are both super friendly!

Rob and Andrea are awesome hosts. Their flat is exactly as pictured on the images. Great style and super clean. They were also good advice on where to go. If you go to amsterdam, this is definately a good choice, close to public transport, very well connected to everything you may want to visit.

Andrea and Robs apartment was just perfect, very stylish and super clean. We felt at home straight away. Rob met us at the apartment and made sure we had everything we needed, really nice guy :)

We stayed in the flat for four nights with our two children (5 and 3). The flat is lovely and is as it is shown in the photos. It's very stylish but also a bit 'lived in' so you can relax in it. The flat is brilliantly placed for the Vondlepark (the entrance to the park is ten steps from the flat) and the fact that you can borrow Aafke's bikes is perfect - we cycled everywhere all week. The flat is great for little kids as there are lots of toys however, like in most apartment buildings in Amsterdam the stairs are very steep! The area is nice and up-and-coming (restaurants and cafes nearby) but it's the park that really makes it - it's huge, peaceful, has a cafe and restaurant in it plus playgrounds etc we cycled through it every day to get to wherever we were going in the city. We highly recommend this flat and hope to be back soon!
This place was really conveniently located. Extremely clean. Checkin and checkout went well. Would highly recommend.

We spent a lovely weekend in Amsterdam, Ingrid really spoilt us with wine, snacks and delicious breakfast (bread, eggs, juice, fruit - all that one can wish for)! Our room was meticulously clean, spacious and nicely decorated. The location is perfect, it's right at the waterside but not far from the city centre. We loved it, we'd come back any time!

Ingrid is the perfect host.
She is very relaxed and easy going.
Prior to our trip, she gave us lots of helpful information.
She even took care of our vegan needs.
She also provided us with rental bikes, so we did not have to do that ourselves.

The room is very nice, very clean and totally 'gemÃ?tlich' (cozy?).

All in all a very very very good AirBnB experience and highly recommendable.

Eine gute halbe Stunde FuÃüweg vom Bahnhof bis zu Ingrids Haus muss man schon rechnen, aber das macht Ã?berhaupt nichts, denn man lÃ?uft die ganze Zeit am Wasser entlang, am Kreuzfahrtschiff-hafen und einigen interessanten GebÃ?uden vorbei. Und FrÃ?hstÃ?ck bekamen wir auch noch sozusagen ans Bett gebracht. Der Raum ist wunderschÃ¶n und praktisch durchdacht eingerichtet, das neue Bad und die Dusche wunderbar. Nicht ganz so toll fanden wir eigentlich nur, dass man die Fenster nicht richtig Ã¶ffnen konnte und dass nach vorne raus ein Gitter ist. FÃ?r ihren guestroom hat Ingrid nÃ?mlich die ehemalige Garage umfunktioniert und umgebaut. Im Rahmen dessen, eine zu empfehlende, pieksaubere und schÃ¶ne Unterkunft.

Ingrid' place is lovely and very clean.  The bed is comfortable.  There is a little refrigerator in the room.  She provided some snacks and drinks there, which I appreciated.  The location is great.  You can even go for a swim in the canal.  It's a very short walk to the 10 Tram, which takes you to all the attractions.  I was only in town for 2 days, so I did not get a chance to take Ingrid up on her offer to show me around the area, but I do not doubt that it would've been a great tour.  Ingrid is a lovely host and was very welcoming from the moment we met!
IngridâÄôs place is a very good option when you want to see Amsterdam! It was super clean and stylish. And you get all the privacy you need! Thanks for having us

This place was perfect.   Ingrid went above and beyond with answering all my questions of places to go and see.  She had maps printed up for us on where to bike/run.   And her and Henk were the sweetest things ever.  We enjoyed this better then a hotel!
Emplacement calme et agrÃ©able, sans Ãªtre trop loin du centre. Logement trÃ¨s agrÃ©able, trÃ¨s bon accueil.

Outstanding hospitality! Probably we could not find better airbnb which is fittable for this word than IngridâÄôs
I could stay at her airbnb with very warm-hearted feeling thanks to favor of her
I definitely recommend her airbnb to someone thinking of trip to Amsterdam

Ingrid is hands down the sweetest host IâÄôve had through AirBnB. SheâÄôs incredibly attentive and goes above and beyond when preparing the room. I really felt like she enjoyed hosting and meeting travelers and that makes this place a definite recommend!

IngridâÄôs guest room was by far the best Airbnb we stayed in during our 3-week trip to Europe! Everything was beautiful, clean, and she even went the extra mile by providing fresh flowers and food! AMAZING!

This is such a fabulous place.. clean, modern and quiet. Ingrid is an amazing host.. she should win an award for her caring ability and beautiful kindness. We felt right at home!It was our first B&B experience... and we felt as if we had hit the jackpot!  Patricia

We had the most amazing stay thanks to Ingrid. A beautiful location and everything you could possible want in the room to make for a perfect holiday.
Thank you Ingrid, your hospitality was amazing

Lisa and Narelle

The room was clean and lovely, even though it was a little hard to get some fresh air in (there was a window in the bathroom though). Nevertheless, Ingrid welcomed us warmly, and she even left us delicious food (stroopwafels, greek yogurt, beers, wine, cherry tomatoes, tea and coffee, chocolate, cheese, etc.) and toiletries at our disposal inside the room, as well as fresh flowers, which we really appreciated. It's pretty easy to get to the center of Amsterdam by tram (10 and 26), and the neighborhood is pretty calm. We would definitely recommend her AirBnB, we spent a great time there!
Ingrid's place was clean, tidy and well maintained. The amenities provided were adequate, in our opinion. Access to transport and cafe, restaurant and supermarket was a few minutes away by foot.
Great spot and very welcoming host, lots of the extra touches that make it special. Neighbourhood is clean and we felt safe, about an 8 min walk to tram station to go downtown.
it was a wonderful stay very clen and orderly. She was ver accommodateing and helpful. I recommend staying with her I ha a much better stay than my colleagues which stayed at hotels

De locatie is nog mooier dan ik dacht: je stapt naar buiten en kijkt over het Amsterdam Rijnkanaal, met zoveel lucht en wolken dat je je buiten de stad waant. De kamer zelf heeft een mooi keukentje, de gastvrouw is zo attent als iedereen hier al heeft vermeld. Aanrader dus!
Wonderful, charming and stylish, great location with a truly wonderful and flexible host!

We stayed at IngridâÄôs place over NYE and it was amazing. The place is super cute, clean, quite, and right off the water. But the most amazing and special thing about the apt is Ingrid herself. She was amazing to us, well equipped room with high quality coffee, tea, and other breakfast goodies. She also left us good wine, chocolate, and a fruit basket welcoming us. On NYE she left us a Champaign and her homemade Dutch desert which was super delicious. While being super host, she was also very helpful with local tips and flexible of both our check in and out. Totally recommended :)

Great stay, there were a lot of little gifts when we arrived (a bottle of wine, things for breakfast, snacks...) And Ingrid was super nice to meet and reactive to find a setup for the check-in and check-out!
Recommended!
Really exeated my and my friends expectations! Nice location nlt to far from the city and really nice hospitality!

Absolutely lovely host who really made our stay that much better! Ingrid filled the fridge with the most delicious foods/drinks as well as making sure we found the local bike shop. The only thing to note was that the room did get quite cold and we visited during spring! The towel rack didnâÄôt work/couldnâÄôt feel the floor heating and the shower was tricky to work as it never was warm enough. Also make sure you get bikes if you want to explore the centre of Amsterdam or be prepared to use UberâÄôs or taxis. Hope to be back soon, thanks so much Ingrid!

IngridâÄôs place is amazingly pretty, has a really nice touch and she makes you feel at home with all the amenities in the room.

She is a great host, since the first moment you get in touch with her, until you check out. Ingrid is always there to answer any questions or to help with information.

The neighborhood is lovely and calm.

Ingrid is a superhost for a reason, her attention to detail and personal touches will make your stay as special as ours!
We couldnt have asked for a better airbnb, great value, close to the centre, in a great neighbourhood, clean, comfie bed and amazing shower and with many treats when you arrive. Ingrid also was there for any advice regarding our trip and even allowed for a late checkout so we could explore the city more without carrying our bags.

Something my partner and I didnt realise was that the airbnb is a separate space so youre not actually sharing a house with the host. It was a great and very nicely decorated.

Thank you so much we hope to come back to Amsterdam in future!

Aine and Conleth from Ireland
Lovely accommodation in a beautiful area. Ingrid is a wonderful host and is very helpfully at all times. Would happily recommend to others.

I would highly recommend staying at IngridâÄôs super cozy room! Warm welcome, easy and flexible check-in/check-out, quite neighbourhood. Outstanding cleanness, super shower! The room is provided with all the necessary (also some food that has been very much appreciated). Thank you Ingrid, see you soon!

It has been wonderfull to stay at Ingrid's  house and we have enjoyed the food and all the treats Ingrid has given us! Ingrid was genuinely interested in us and our needs. It was so nice of her to let us use the room untill we had to leave for the airport.
Ingrid was a wonderful host. She was friendly, welcoming and had many travel suggestions to offer. The treats she had were amazing as well. I would highly recommend!
Such a lovely place and perfect host Ingrid!

The place is very nice, and very clean. There were fresh flowers, wine, fruits and some other stuff when we arrived, that was perfect because we were very tired to go out. Henk was waiting for us. It is the perfect place if you want to relax and get away from the noise of the center, and if you want to go to the main streets is very well connected or aprox 20 minutes by bike.

Wow! My boyfriend and I stayed here for a weekend away. ItâÄôs safe to say that they have set the bar very high for our expectations at our next air b&b. Great location. Very close to tram stop which is 3 stops into town. Ingrid and her partner were so kind and friendly and available to answer all our questions. They offered us a late check out. But it was the little touches in the room. We wanted for nothing. A fridge full of breakfast foods, snacks, wine and beer. The bed and shower also amazing. We will definitely stay here on our next Amsterdam trip.
Excelente recibimiento. Lugar impecable. Vista despejada a los canales. Muy buena conversacion.

El lugar es bello, cerca del centro, limpio e independiente. Ingrid nos ayudo a gestionar el taxi para el aeropuerto con un costo bueno, nos dio recomendaciÃ?n y nos dejÃ? muchos presentes en la habitaciÃ?n (fruta, comida, chocolate, cervezas). Todo fue increÃ?ble!
Very nice welcoming! The apartment was very clean and recommended for short stays in Amsterdam! Thank you - Emisha & Nur

A completely independent room, cosy, clean, full of nice touches and small treats. An espresso machine, wine, beer, snacks, nothing was missing! Ingrid, a lovely host, offered me a warm welcome and made me feel at home.
Highly recommended!
Living with ingrid is a small piece of Dutch paradise and ingrid is a true angel.

Our stay at Janneke's apartment was perfect! the apartment is beautiful and full of light, was very clean and Janneke even left us some tasty snacks!
Even though she was half way around the world at the time of our stay, Janneke made sure we have all the information we needed and helped us with every question we had before and during our stay, not once making us feel uncomfortable about anything.
The place itself isn't at the center of the city, but only a short ride by tram or bus, which are available at any time and are very convenient.
The place exceeded our expectations and Janneke was the perfect host for our first time using airbnb! :)

Thank you Janneke for this trip in your beautiful apartment.
It is well-equipped and design, with a large balcony!
The + : the shower is wonderful
Public transport are very close to the appartment, but you need them (15-20min) or bike (25-30min) to go to the city center.
Moreover Janneke was really listening and free to answer to all our questions, she shares with us good informations to enjoy our trip: she is helpfull when you want discover the city.
The description is true.
I recommend

L'appartement de Janneke Ã©tait trÃ¨s propre et trÃ¨s confortable. Un grand merci Ã  Janneke pour son accueil et ses prÃ©cieuses explications (bons plans). L'appartement est un peu excentrÃ© (trÃ¨s calme) mais bien accessible en transport (bus, tram). Il etait simple de rejoindre le centre ville. Nous avons passÃ© un agrÃ©able sÃ©jour. Het appartement van Janneke is netjes, goed bereikbaar en gezellig. We hebben er voor 2 nachtjes gelogeerd. In de buurt zijn restaurantjes waar je kunt eten/drinken maar je bent ook met het openbaar vervoer vlot in de stad.

It's a great flat for two people and you really have everything you need. It had a really nice bathroom and a really comfortable livingroom arrangement. We had a great time and enjoyed living in the flat over a long weekend. I traveled with a good friend therefore it was no problem at all to charge a bed. The flat is in a quiet neighborhood and you only had to walk 5 min to the next tram station so really easy acces to public transport. There is a supermarket close by and a few little shops and restaurants. I think it's a great flat for a weekend trip to Amsterdam.
Very nice and clean apartments, quite house. Everything you need to have a good weekend)

Clean, airy, and bright apartment. Enough space to set up our babyâÄôs travel crib in the bedroom. Close enough to easy to navigate public transport. Host communicated promptly and easy check in/out. Yes the walls are quite thin as others have noted, but all we heard were a few voices from the hall and sometimes the muffled sound of a television from a neighbor. (Hopefully our baby didnâÄôt bother the neighbors with his morning babble and occasional cry).  Janneke kindly cleared some closet shelves for us and left a detailed note for apartment and neighborhood, along with resto recommendations. A great stay overall.

Thank you Janneke for letting me and my wife check in early and for the tasty snacks you left for us. The apartment has many amenities, is very clean, and the front side gets very sunny.  The apartment was far from the main city, but was very close to the trams which quickly and easily got you there.  The building doesnâÄôt have an elevator, so you do have to walk up 2 narrow and curvy flights of stairs which could be an issue if you have large or a lot of luggage.  Overall, my stay was very pleasant.

Janneke's apartment is extremely nice and is a home away from home. From the moment we enquired about her place she was very helpful and always more than happy to help. Whilst staying at the apartment every effort had been made for us to be comfortable and happy with our stay.

Janneke was kind enough to leave comprehensive instructions for our stay and went above and beyond what any hotel could ever offer.

We would highly recommend staying here to anyone and would stay again.

The location of the apartment is a short walk from the nearest tram stop and is very easy to navigate from the airport as well as Central station.

Overall a very pleasant experience and a big thank you to Janneke!

We had an amazing time! The apartment was super clean, very cozy and it's connected to the city centre by public transport. Perfect for a weekend in Amsterdam and Janneke even provided us with some local tips for bars & restaurants.

This, by far, has been my BEST experience with an AirBnb. Janneke is very kind and has a beautiful apartment, which we found clean and supplied with all we needed from coffee/tea to towels. I highly recommend this beautiful space located in a culturally rich neighborhood in Amsterdam and within walking distance from stations and ~30 min walk to city center.
The host canceled this reservation 45 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great place, very clean and well equipped with everything one might need. Janneke even left us beers in the fridge, along with very thorough instructions for the place, and the surroundings. She has been very helpful with directions and we found the place easy even with public transport. Overall geat experience. I would highly recommend it.
Clean, nice apartment with everything you could possible need. Close to trams and busses, and grocery stores and restaurants. Nice sunny balcony if you are lucky to be there on a sunny day.

The appartement is very nice, and well situated.
Janneke is also nice, sheâÄôs a good advisor, she listen to you attentivly.

Appartamento molto carino, spazioso, pulito e pieno di tutti i comfort (caffÃ¨, the e birra compresi). La posizione non Ã¨ centrale, ma Ã¨ molto vicina alla fermata del bus/tram e in 20-30 minuti si puÃ? raggiungere il centro di Amsterdam. Esperienza ottima con Janneke, che ci ha dato tutti i dettagli di cui avevamo bisogno e ci ha lasciato una guida sui luoghi principali da visitare nei dintorni. Decisamente consigliato!

We had a wonderful stay in Jannekes appartement. Everything was very clean and it had a great interior. It's a beautiful appartement and you have plenty of room and a nice balcony. The neighborhood is nice and quiet and not far away from the center. It's a 10-15 min ride with the tram. There are supermarkets and nice restaurants in walking distance.
The communication was very good. Janneke is very nice and gave us all the information we needed in advance and the best direction to her appartement. We were also very happy about the late Check-out and that we were able to leave our baggage in the appartement until our flight.
We felt very welcomed and would definitely stay here again :)

Janneke's place is the perfect place to stay for a weekend in Amsterdam. The little walk to reach the town center through the canals is lovely and the price is unbeatable compare to more central place. The place offers everything you need and Janneke was lovely providing us with tips and info to make your stay even more enjoyable!

We really enjoyed our stay here. The apartment is clean and really comfortable. It's super easy to get around with loads of tram and bus routes nearby. Definitely recommend this as a nice base from which to explore the city. Janneke was really easy to communicate with and gave helpful instructions for finding the apartment and things to do nearby.

Great place to stay and come home to after a day out. sparkling clean with all the amenities you need. Janneke went the extra mile by writing notes to help us find our way and other usefull info. Sad not to have met her, but happy we chose her home. Only dissapointment was how far out of the main tourist points it was located, but would stay there again.
We highly recommend Dorus appartment. The neighbour hood is lovely, and really close to the center. Dorus cared a lot about our stay!

The best thing about this place is that you get to experience how the locals live. It's in a typical Dutch building with steep narrow stairs :-) in a quiet residential area. Kitchen is very well equipped. The bedroom window view is towards inner courtyard and spruce tree. During the day the apartment gets a lot of sunlight. Communication was very smooth.
The apartment was spectacular, very comfortable and close to a wide range of things to do and see in Amsterdam.  Check-in and out was very easy and we loved staying there!
It is a good house for us to stay. there are many markets, which is convenient

This was such a cute place to stay right outside of the central downtown area. It was a really cool neighborhood that allowed us to experience Amsterdam like a local but was still within walking distance to many things, like all of the museums. It was perfect way to end our trip!

Nice, spacious one bed flat in De Pijp. All as advertised. WiFi, towels, hairdryer all present & correct. Smooth check-in. A few mins walk to Sarphartipark & the Albert Kuipstraat market. Bicycle rental shops just round the corner. Highly recommended. Book with confidence.
The Dorus place's is in good location with very good vibes and clean. Dorus nice and kind host

la mejor experiencia en airbnb! nos quedamos en el apartamento de Sandra con una amiga y no nos querÃ?amos ir. es todo muy lindo, limpio, moderno, la cama es muy cÃ?moda. tiene un living con un sillÃ?n donde tirarte a mirar la tele y descansar los pies y una cocina comodisima. el patio no lo usamos mucho porque hacÃ?a mucho frÃ?o pero con mejor clima puede ser muy disfrutable.
Sandra nos espero cuando llegamos y nos mostrÃ? la casa, nos brindÃ? mucha informaciÃ?n impresa y nos hizo recomendaciones de como movernos por la zona. siempre a las Ã?rdenes y super atenta.
el apartamento queda fuera del centro en un area muy tranquila pero si tenes ganas de caminar no es lejos y el camino es muy lindo. casi siempre nos trasladamos en metro que hay una parada a 3 cuadras y tarde en la noche para volver del centro el uber nos salia menos de 10 euros.
recomiendo 100% este alojamiento! esperamos poder volver algun dia.

Sandra's place was lovely. The bedroom looks onto a cute interior courtyard, and is very comfortable and quiet. The kitchen, living room, and bathroom are very modern and comfortable. The space gets a lot of light and is really cheerful feeling. It's about a 30 minute walk along a beautiful canal to city center. Sandra was a great host as well. I definitely recommend this place
The apartment was just like in the pictures! Clean, spacious and comfortable! Communication was also alright with Sandra!

Sandra est toujours disponible pour nous orienter et nous aider a prendre nos marques a Amsterdam.
Son appartement est parfaitement situe. Les transports en commun desservent trÃ¨s bien son quartier.
C'est calme, propre et trÃ¨s bien dÃ©corÃ©.
Bref tout Ã©tait parfait, allez y, sans hÃ©siter
Very clean place. Close to two metro stations.  Beautiful garden and really good value for the price!

The apartment is great, Kobe made quck and very helpful introduction to the place and neghbourhood to us and gave us all the information we needed. The site is quiet and peaceful just next to Amstel river and only 15min with bycicle to the crowded downtown area with all the tourists. We appreciate the location very much esepcially after long day spending with the crowd in city center, was good to come back to our quiet place and relax. Definitely we'll come back again in Samdras's apartment.

Nous avons passÃ© un sÃ©jour trÃ¨s agrÃ©able dans l'appartement de Sandra. Le quartier est trÃ¨s sympathique et trÃ¨s bien situÃ©. L'appartement est dÃ©corÃ© avec soin; rien ne manque, et le lit est particuliÃ¨rement confortable. Nous avons Ã©tÃ© chaleureusement accueillis par Eva et KobÃ© Ã  notre arrivÃ©e. C'est une adresse que nous recommandons sans hÃ©siter .

The best place we ever stayed in Amsterdam. Well-situated in a nice neighborhood close to De Pijp, the apartment is very clean and comfortable. Sandra and Kobe were also excellent hosts. We recommend.

SandraâÄôs place is lovely and spacious, very clean with all the amenities. Eva was a great host for check in and check out and was very responsive to all messages. She also had useful information about the city. We even had some goodies on arrival! We were able to check in early and leave our luggage later on the day we left - she was very accommodating. The apartment was a bit further than we expected from the city centre but definitely walking distance and very close if you hire a bike. We would not hesitate to stay again! A great place to stay in Amsterdam.

The flat is super clean and big.
Communication was also alright with her!
The best place I ever stayed in Amsterdam.

Sandra's place was my home away from home while I was in Amsterdam for a vacation and a work conference. I loved being in a regular Amsterdam neighborhood and also within walking distance of the sights. Sunsets over the Amstel are unreal. The apartment itself was perfect for my needs. The bed was cozy. The garden in back was a special touch, and Eva and Kobe did everything to make me comfortable. I really appreciated the thoughtfulness of the visit. Thanks, Sandra, Eva and Kobe! I would love to come back soon!
n

During our stay in Amsterdam, SandraâÄòs apartment really was the perfect homebase for us :)

ItâÄòs located in a quiet and relaxed neighborhood. The next metro is super close (like 5 minutes of walk). From there the metro takes you to central station in a few minutes, from where you can reach the whole city center easily by foot.

If there isnâÄòt any metro driving in the late evening, itâÄòs also possible to just walk back to the apartment (I even recommend to do this at least once, strolling along the amstel is just beautiful!)

The apartment itself is very clean and cozy, you will find absolutely everything you need (cooking, washing, etc.). There are also some good places to relax in the apartment, like a comfortable couch inside or a nice lounge outside.

The check-in and check-out procedures were really easy and managed by Eva & Kobe, the co-hosts of the apartment. The communication with them went very smooth and if necessary they were very good reachable.

So finally I would recommend this apartment to everyone for a nice trip to Amsterdam, itâÄòs just a great place to stay. I would definitely go there again!
Cool apartment, clean and stylish, great location. Quiet but with a lot of amenities nearby, and easy to get to the RAI on the bus.

Nassira was an amazing host, she was very helpful during our stay and gave us tips and places to eat and go out. Her apartment is beautiful, warm and cozy in a chilled area not too far by train from city center. We would definitely stay here again. Highly recommend.

Friendly and helpful host in a very convenient location. The apartment is in an ideal location if you're not looking to be right in the centre. I can suggest getting a tram/bus/metro pass for your stay as there are plenty of stops and stations very close by which can take you into town very cheaply and easily. Nassira is perfect! Very neat, clean and tidy; ideal if you are the same. Lovely underfloor heating makes it feel very cosy. Also did I mention that there is Netflix on the TV and fast wifi? 10/10!!!

AMAZING!!! This apartment is amazing! It is beautiful, modern and comfy. It's close to everything but not too close to the "madness" of Amsterdam. Very nice quiet neighborhood. Very good wifi/cable. The bed is super comfy and there's heated floors!! The host Nassira is simply amazing. We will deff be staying here again.

Nassira is an amazing host! She was waiting for us in the apartment in the morning to receive us as she managed to do our check in according to our time of arrival which was perfect for us! She explained how everything works in the apartment and also sent us a text later on with a lot of tips and hints, good places to go and visit in Amsterdam. The apartment is around 15/20 minutes walking distance to the city centre and its perfectly doable as Amsterdam is a plane city but you also have a lot of public transports just 5 min or less from the apartment. Specially, if you buy the I AMSTERDAM card you will actually be able to use the public transports for free, have free entrance to a lot of museums and a lot of discounts in restaurants :) Also, just a tip, there is a Portuguese restaurant, Girassol, right around the corner from the apartment and the food is superb!
We had a lovely stay and will definitely book Nassira's place again!
Thank you for everything Nassira :)
Nassira was a lovely host, very accommodating to our needs. She was only a phone call away if we ever needed her. Would defiantly recommend and stay in the spacious, very clean apartment again.
Nassira was a great host! We really enjoyed the visit. The apartment was lovely, cosy, and in a great location. So much more than we bargained for!

Wow! We really enjoyed our trip to Amsterdam and Nassira as a host made our stay really comfortable and homely, she gave us lots of tips, maps. Her apartment is perfectly located for an authentic stay and is near to all bars, restaurants, coffeeshops and is super convenient for all public transport. Also is in walking distance to a big Aldi supermarket. The apartments got everything what you need for short stay and got mega comfy big bed!!!! Really happy with our choice. Big thank you again Nassira ;)))
Really nice flat, quiet and you can go to the center by walking really easily (in 15mn). During the night the street is quiet and the bed was so comfortable. I can recommend this place.

Lovely, stylish & clean apartment within walking distance of all the main tourist attractions in Amsterdam. Looked exactly like the pictures & Nassira was a really helpful host, giving us recommendations for places to eat, drink & visit. Would definitely stay here again, 5 stars!

Beautiful and cozy place. We really liked this apartment and would recommend it at any time. Very close to the amstel river and near to the train station as well.
Thanks again for everything :)

Nassira's home is really lovely. It's light and open and close to the water which was nice for walks. Nassira was great when she greeted us and left us some drinks and snacks! The apartment was spotless and very stylish. Overall it was a great experience. Would definitely stay there again!

We had a wonderful stay at Nassira's apartment close to the city center but still quiet. It felt like a very save area and we had no problems. Nassira was a fantastic host! She was kind, friendly, helpful, reliable and unproblematic. We were very happy and had a blast.
Thank you Nassira!

Beautiful home, very comfortable filled with everything you need. Within walking distance of great attractions and easy access to train line and metro. Nassira was very helpful and welcoming, with great tips for sightseeing!
Nassira was extremely accommodating and the apartment was well worth the price. I would gladly stay at this apartment again in the future.
Nassira is such a nice person, always friendly and her answers to all my questions came without any delay. The flat is beautiful and I love the area of Amsterdam.
Fantastic location, with lots of pubs and restaurants nearby. Its a walking distance to the city along the pictures Amstel river. Very good connection to airport and rest of the city and country.

2minute walk to metro stop
Beautiful apartment exactly as pictured
Lovely area few close places with lovely food , quite coffee shops within walking distance too which was surprising , will stay again when returning to amsterdam, suited our needs perfectly , no real need to go to central city as everything u need is in the area once u look for it
Awesome apartment with a great garden in a good location. Highly recommended.

I would fully recommend booking a stay at this accommodation. Its in such a great place, right next to the tram or a about a 25 minute walk into the centre of amsterdam through de pijip which is very pleasant. The area of the apartment is stunning and peaceful, and the accommodation its self is so quaint and cosy, with a lovely new kitchen, tv, bedroom and very clean bathroom and a lovely cosy garden, perfect for a couples getaway. Amazing host and owner of accommodation and would 100% recommend you book this apartment.

Nassira's place was absolutely amazing! It was my first time in Amsterdam, so her speedy responsiveness and accommodation made my experience great from the start! The presentation of the space was very nice. It was clean and thoughtfully decorated with the cutest enclosed back patio. My partner and I stayed for a few days and found that the place was a short walk or a cheap Uber ride to just about everything we wanted to go to. There are several great restaurants nearby, (my favorite was Drovers Dog) and the neighborhood is trendy. The Canal is a very short walk and the view is breathtaking. I would absolutely recommend staying. I know that I will return one day soon if I am fortunate enough!

We spent a lovely weekend, the apartment is cozy, very clean and trendy and also very well located (15 min from the center by metro) , Nassira was an excellent host she was really gentle and hepful!! Gracias Nassira!!
This is a lovely place in a great location of Amsterdam. Nassira is extremely responsive and an attentive host!
Nice and beautiful place with a friendly garden . There is everything you need there !
Lovely house and great hospitality

Very cute and comfortable apartment. Nassira was a very easy host to coordinate with and was incredibly accommodating as we were delayed in arriving our first day. Lovely place, incredible location! Loved staying at NassiraâÄôs home, and she was very helpful and attentive.
Great home and great host.
Great place, awesome area and close to metro station.
We had a great Time in Amsterdam. We recommend it to everyone! Thank you Nassira for the Local Tips!

We stayed at Nassira's home for 2 days. It was a lovely place and our guest let us some pleasant attention. The appartment is 20 min walk from the city center but the way to go is along the Amstel River with nice views.

The appartment has a good size and a comfortable bed and is well equiped.
Don't hesitate to book!
Many thanks to Nassira for the welcome.

Nassira's apartment is perfect for a visit to Amsterdam! Her communication was great before and throughout my stay and she left thoughtful touches at the apartment as well a good advice about the area. The apartment is clean, warm and stylish. Everything you'd need for a few days is available in the apartment and the neighbourhood is friendly and quiet with convenient cafes, a supermarket and metro stop close by. Will definitely book again when I'm back!
beautiful, stylish apartment! had a great stay

Nassira was very friendly, helpful and quick to answer. Her place was very stylish, comfortable and an all around great place to stay! It was very clean and Fatima was friendly and helpful upon check-in. The apartment had everything you could possibly need.
The little garden area is very cute and nice to cozy up in especially as itâÄôs partly sheltered from the rain.
The location is great and just a short metro or tram ride away from the centre of Amsterdam.

Thank you Nassira :)

I had a short notice booking and Nassira was very accommodating. We never got to meet in person but she was always available via message. Love the apartment, made me want to spend more time their and at the shops near by than traveling to the city center hah

NassiraâÄôs place is a great little studio just along the Amstel river. She was always accessible for questions and really made us feel at home. ItâÄôs the perfect place for a couple or two friends who donâÄôt mind sharing a VERY COMFORTABLE bed! The little patio in the back was great as well (if weather allows). All in all I would definitely recommend NassiraâÄôs place to anyone!

This place is fantastic! ItâÄôs a lovely apartment on the ground floor with outdoor space. ItâÄôs just outside the city center in a quiet neighborhood with a few restaurants, bars and grocery stores.
ItâÄôs a 5-10 minute walk to catch the metro (subway), the tram or the larger trains. So easy to get anywhere you want to go.
Nassira responded quickly to any communication and graciously accommodated our early morning arrival. She even left us treats to enjoy when we arrived. Check in and out was very simple.
ItâÄôs a perfect space for two people with a king-sized bed, living space and small kitchen. IâÄôd recommend this space to anyone I knew.
DonâÄôt let the location outside the city center deter you. ItâÄôs so easy to travel anywhere with transit, and we felt perfectly safe walking home from the stations even very late at night.
Nassira was extremely friendly and helpful, all of my questions received quick responses. The apartment was very clean and in a great location.

We have had a wonderful few days here and it is very easy to go anywhere. The decoration of the house is very nice and ingenious .

âÄú Cozy âÄù apartment

Narissa was an amazing host. The location is great, away from all the hustle of the city but still central so itâÄôs easy to get to everything. Check in and check out was a breeze. She was so thoughtful and left little Heinekens and mini waffle cookies for us. It was a little difficult to find but once we had the address it was easier!

NassiraâÄòs place is very stylish, cozy, clean and located in a very nice area. She was anytime ready to help us (quick responses) and the check in went smooth. We enjoyed staying at her place and would definately recommand it ! Its a great place to stay when visiting Amsterdam !

Everything was great. The flat is super close to the city center and was very clean. Everything needed for cooking and hygiene was supplied. Would definitely recommend.
The stay was great! The apartment was larger than I expected and both the bed / sofa were super comfortable. Highly recommend!
NassiraâÄôs place is super cozy, youâÄôll find everything you need + she is a super nice person, always ready to help you for anything !
A  maravilhosa hospedagem  reposta  rapidas a anfritiao foi perfeita e nos deixou   vinhos com guloseimas para passar  a noite  e desfrutar de neve.

The apartment is great, super clean and very comfortable, very close to tram and bus stations, makes every great spots of Amsterdam reachable in 5 minutes! The neighborhood is authentic and not overcrowded by tourists, just perfect!  The host takes care of everything to make sure you have a great staying! I definitely recommend it!

I've been in Djoeke's cozy apartment with my boyfriend for a weekend. Djoeke did everything we need to make it comfortable. We recommend it if you want to stay close to the city centre, tram and bus (there is a bus station for Schipol just 5 mins from the apartment) and if you want to relax in a peaceful street.
Thank you for your flat it was verry plaisant !
The apartment is perfectly located. Quick and Accommodating responses. The bed is really high though so itâÄôs a jump to get into and IâÄôm 6 ft tall.
Prachtige locatie en een zeer net en leuk appartement.
A great flat in a lovely location and everything was thought of before you got there. A really great stay.
Great place, convenient and clean. Perfect location. Will definitely want to stay here again
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice place, cool location, great pup at the end of the block.

The airbnb property management servicer was HORRIBLE. The guy was rude and made a scandal because we hadnt left the flat at noon. We were just waiting for him to arrive before leaving and we litterally left the flat 5 min after his arrival. And finally, when we were supposed to shake hands to say goodbye, the guy shot my phone (unwillingly) which exploded on the floor (the phone is new btw). The servicer (or cleaner i dont know) didnt express a single odd of regret nord apologies and remain literraly despicable despite thame fact that he crashed my iphone. To be honest, on the other end, the place was clean and very well located. A bit expensive for the price but as always in amsterdam.

The apartment is in a great location that is within 1 mile walking distance from every main attraction in Amsterdam. The host are extremely responsive and even provide thoughtful tips and booklets for visitors.
The room is very lovely and a tram away from city centre. It had everything we needed. Also, having our favourite bar just around the corner was a big plus for us.

Awesome flat full of little details!! Just perfect for having a nice time in amsterdam, close to the biggest park of the city an just 10 minutes by bike or tram to central... Big thanks for a nice information letter full of great tips !! (market, neighbourhood)

Tom and Eva's home is just like in the pictures. Comfortable and located in a lovely area whit lots of restaurants, shops and bars plus only 15 min to city centre by tram.
Ideal combination for a stay in Amsterdam!
We will definetly come back!

Very helpful and friendly hosts!.. If I had a question, I got a quick answer and help.
The apartment was clean and tidy!
There is so much space !
The decoration was beautiful and the whole interior furnishing was made with love for the detail. Very relaxing atmosphere !
All in all a perfect stay !

Tom and Eva were very gracious hosts with a comfortable apartment. I consider having morning breakfast on the back patio here to be one the best experiences of going to Amsterdam. Beautiful place with a lovely view off the back balcony. Two bedrooms on opposite sides of apartment provided privacy for my wife and I and the couple we traveled with. Tom and Eva left a very helpful packet with museum discounts and information about the area. Location is not too far from touristy city center and has its own lovely charm. Easy 5 min walk to public train. Nice 15 min walk to the very large and beautiful Vondelpark which was a great place to have a picnic and chill. We would stay here again.

Tom and Eva were great hosts. Check in was easy. I would suggest they always make sure that the flat is always well cleaned before renting out. I had minor cleaning issues at first but the host was quick to fix them the same day.

An overall very homey and clean, cozy atmosphere. Gezellig. Communication was perfect, encountered no problems at all. Thanks so much for the hospitality we had an absolutely great time! We also largely appreciate the cooler bag you gave us at the end as we were leaving!!

Highly recommended. Friendly host, great place, cozy setting, convenient location. Would like to visit again!

The house is big and very cozy. It's really close to Vondelpark which is a must visit in Amsterdam. All the amenities are perfect and it's a lovely safe locality. I would definitely recommend this place.
Very nice appartment at an excellent location. The hosts are super friendly and always reachable if there is something you need. It's clean, cozy and perfect for four persons visiting Amsterdam.

The flat is amazing and very well located! Zorro the cat is really nice and suprisingly keen. My friends and I appreciated our stay, Tom and Eva were available. It was my first time in Amsterdam and I will definately come back!
This was a really great place. Location is also a great plus.
Great place to stay, not far away from the city centre and very comfortable!

Thank you Tom for allowing us to stay in your very clean and cozy apartment. There is plenty of room and we were pleasantly surprised. The photos do not do the apartment justice. Friendly cat too! Apartment is a bit further out from city center but lovely local cafes, bars and restaurants nearby. Would definitely recommend staying here. Delicious family Mediterranean mezze restaurant just a few minutes walk! Thanks again Tom for making sure we had a good time.

Nice flat close to shops. Would have been perfect apart from the cat peeing on one of the beds which was a little annoying as we had to change and wash the sheets but other then that it was great. The cuteness of the cat made up for her little accident!
Nice neighbourhood lots
Of cute shops. Would go again :)

Super place in a super cool part of town. City center is super close (by walk or by bus, tram, etc.). We had some minor troubles that will be fixed, guess it was bad luck.
If we come back to Amsterdam, we will stay there again for sure!

Great old style apartment near the Central Park. A pleasant walk through the park, you can get to the famous Seafood bar. Tom and Eva are so kind to provide any help you need. The guide they prepared contains all interesting places in Amsterdam. There is a little friend Zorro who will surprise you.

Tom and Eva were incredibly hospitable, giving us a detailed welcome pack with goodies and outstanding recommendations. Their flat is amazing and well decorated and in a great location. They were flexible with our stay and we highly recommend the experience!

TomâÄôs place is lovely. Myself and 3 friends had a great time here. ItâÄôs so bright and airy, the decor is very homely, the beds comfy and the place was clean throughout. I felt like I wasnâÄôt a tourist but a local! Also their cat, Zorro, is very friendly.
Just the most perfect apartment with the most perfect host. I highly recommend.

Spacious, comfortable, feel-like-at-home place, perfect for two couples spending few days in Amsterdam. We appreciated great communication with hosts (kudos for the orientation instruction!), and Zorro (the cat!) making sure that we enjoy our stay. The place is not extremely central for Amsterdam, but there are nice restaurants, cafes and pubs nearby, also the daily ride through beautiful Vondelpark is very enjoyable. TomâÄôs place is amazing. Not only itâÄôs located in one of the best areas of the city, itâÄôs very stylish and clean. The communication was great and our stay was wonderful! Thank you Tom!

Awesome apartment just a short walk from Vondelpark and all the local supermarkets. Both the hosts and the neighbours couldnâÄôt have been more welcoming and we couldnâÄôt be more appreciative. Has such a homely vibe with fully equipped kitchen and all the extra touches just to make u feel more welcome. One of the best places weâÄôve stayed!
Great and large place and very efficient check-in.
Lovely, cozy, clean apartment  super close to Vondelpark!

It has been special for us to be welcomed by Marte&Dirk at their very carefully furnished and decorated place. They have been extremely friendly hosts to us, and told us of many places to go which we would not have found otherwhise. Their apartment is uniquely located: close enough to the centre in a very nice area, yet outside of the main tourist routes. Many thanks!
Prachtig, schoon appartement, bij een heel vriendelijk, rustig, Ã©n interessant koppel. Ze doen hun uiterste best om het verblijf zo aangenaam mogelijk te maken. Voor mij ideaal als airbnb.

Dirk was a friendly host who gave us useful tips for great places in Amsterdam. The apartment is lovely and clean. It's located in a nice area with good restaurants and cafes. It's also close to the city center so we could walk from there.
Thanks again for the nice stay!
A wonderful stay!
It's a artistic place to resident in Amsterdam, everything we need is prepared for us, the apartment is near the tram station, the host couple are really nice and quiet to live with.
Leuke woning direct aan het vondelpark, hartelijke mensen waarbij je, je direct welkom voelt. Wij zouden zeker terug gaan als de gelegenheid zich voordoet!

Dirks place is located in a lovely neighbourhood. Close to the center, a stone's throw away from the Vondelpark, plenty of cool bars and restaurants in the vicinity. The apartment itself is charming - I had some serious interior design envy. The perfect place to come home to after a day of wandering around. Dirk is an excellent host. Communicative, warm, accomodating, full of interesting stories and insights. I can only recommend staying here.
Gorgeous apartment in a perfectly place.  All information about apartment are true.  I recommend it.  Thanks a lot, Dirk!
Beautiful environment and peaceful place to stay. Dirk was very friendly and responsive as well  :)
Super nice place!
Dirk is really friendly and helpful host, thank you for that. Also his home is utterly wonderful!

Dirk has a beautiful room, very cozy place, nice bed and a room full of books, music LPs, which gives a very home like feeling. Only worry we felt was a tall staircase, almost vertical, since we had one big bag.

The host is an amazing guy. He helped us haul the bag, offered us tea and coffee, gave very good suggestions on food and what to see. Overall, a wonderful, cozy place to stay in Amsterdam, far from madness of crowds in Dam Square. Excellent connectivity thru Tram and lots of food places around, with a big Vondelpark.

Dirk and Marte were wonderful. The apartment is from the early 20th century and filled with a variety of curious artifacts including a 17th century portrait to which Dirk is a direct descendent of. Its located in a quaint and charming neighborhood with delicious and inexpensive cafes which Dirk and Marte will be more than happy to provide recommendations. Be sure to also spend some time with Dirk and Marte as well as they are both interesting and highly hospitable people. I highly recommend this property.
P.S, check out Dirk's amazing book collection!
It's tucked away nicely between vondel park and busy street. So it was easy to get a good nights rest and quick access to food.
A truly amazing house, comfortable, clean and beatifuly designed. Communication with Marte was great, and she was very kind and helpful. A highly recommended place!

I fell in love with Dirk & Marte's apartment. So charming and delightful, every detail down to perfection, lots of fun and quirky things here and there around the house. Bedroom was comfortable and since the area is quiet, we had a great sleep. Dirk was kind enough to wait for us when we were late for check-in - thanks for that - and he recommended nice places we could visit in the neighborhood. If you've got an artistic streak, this is the place for you :)

Dirk's place is unreal so confortable, clean, close to the public transport also just a few steps from Voldenpark also she gave us all the support that we needed since before the check-in until we left her place. Thank you so much Dirk and see you next time for sure.

Great place to stay if you want to be near the tourist areas of Amsterdam without all the crowds. Transport is very easy between airport, apartment, and Central Amsterdam. My tip would be to get back a little before the trains stop so you can have a beer at Fijnkost.
its great!

Dirk's apartment is in a fine part of Amsterdam, close to Vondel Park. The apartment itself was 'quirky' with many interesting artefacts, reflecting Dirks interest in art. Dirk was very welcoming and interesting to talk to on many different subjects.
Dirk was an amazing guest! My colleague and I were arriving early in Amsterdam and he was so accommodating. Thanks for the great stay Dirk!
Great place, very comfortable, and helpful and welcoming host! Oh and Vondelpark is really beautiful and well worth a visit!

The place is in a nice neighborhood with plenty of shops and restaurants. Of course Vondelpark is right in the backyard and is a great place to hang out for a bit after spending time in the city. The tram stop is also close, so it is easy to get everywhere you need to go. Great host with a comfortable place to stay. Thank you.

Such a wonderful location and host! The whole apartment is exactly as pictured and the room is very comfortable. Dirk was incredibly kind and easy to be around and share space with. I would highly suggest this place to future travelers and will definitely try and come back. Thanks again Dirk!

Dirk and Martin's place is as lovely as them two. it is very near by Vendol park. There are so many books and a piano in the living room,never forget that Dirk played piano when my friend and me had to work late,you know ,everything is perfect .The days we spent there are so good memories I will always recall. If you wanna have a slow down ,quiet journey ,I recommend Dirk and Martin's :)

We enjoyed our stay in Amsterdam and the location of the apartment was perfect. We would have liked a little more storage space in the bedroom, especially if we were staying any longer. Dirk and Marte were chilled, welcoming and quick to reply to any messages. The beds were extremely comfortable!

Our hosts were incredibly friendly and communicative from the moment we booked and throughout our stay. The accommodations were clean and lovely, nice touches like water and tea. The location is great, close to the tram and Vondelpark. We would absolutely recommend staying here!

Dirk and Marte were fantastic hosts! They were super flexible and their apartment is so dreamy. The room was comfortable, and thoughtfully well-supplied, including a guide to Amsterdam and much more. The apartment is well-located. It's only a short tram ride away from the city center, and surrounding neighborhood is packed with restaurants and shops. Thanks for being great hosts, and giving me what felt like a really authentic Dutch stay!

It was such an amazing experience! We totally loved the place, especially the fact that it was near to vondelpark, which is near to everything. And Martha and Dirk were really kind and friendly to us. Best place to stay in the whole city <3
Great location, cozy house, extremely friendly place, I wanted to extend my stay just to be able to check all the books and vinyls available in the flat! :)

I and my niece stayed two nights at this lovely apartment with charming nerboughood and easy public communication with tram. Plenty of lights and space. Angela who met us was very friendly and helpful. The rum is perfect for one person or a couple. We recommend it very warmly.

This is a fun and extremely comfortable apartment in a wonderful location next to Vondelpark and convenient to the tram. I highly recommend staying here. Although I did not meet Dirk and Marte, staying in their home gives you a sure sense of their joy in life. Think long friendly dining table, eclectic art, and the vinyl already on the turntable. Their friend, A., took care of my booking, and I cannot say enough about how delightfully friendly and warm she was. A perfect visit!

Quiet spot with such great home decor and very light with a great window right next to the bed

We lived the airflow and the beds were comfortable as well

Good location for exploring!
Angela was a great host told us everywhere to go places to see and check in was very easy it backs up to Vondel park Like explain and was very easy to navigate to downtown

Great apartment with lots of character, very comfortable and clean (just be prepared for the staircase leading up to it, which is steep and long - even for Dutch standards! But the climb is totally worth it).
It is easy to get there from the station or the airport, it is next to a large park, and while it is centrally located, the area is not touristy at all. Angela also gave me some great tips about places to eat. I just wish I could have managed to open the bike lock - Angela told me it was a little tricky, but I should have asked her to show me the trick!
Recommended!

This is a great place with plenty of light and eclectic furnishings. Where we currently live we are starved for green spaces, and the nearby (5 min, max) Vondelpark was amazing.

We spent most of our waking hours outside of the home, but the time we spent in our room was very comfortable and quiet. There is a quiet little neighborhood bar near the place that has great outdoor seating - we stopped in for a drink and enjoyed ourselves.

As a FYI, the place is at the top of a fairly steep set of stairs; we're fine with steps and all, but if you have a lot of luggage or trouble navigating steps you'll find it a bit challenging.

The vegetarian options in Amsterdam are many and the recommendations provided were great. We'd totally stay at this place again for the location and amenities.

Very steep staircase and it smells a bit odd but is fine in the actual apartment which you share with the residents.  Vintage style decorations in an old building made quaint and livable by fascinating people
Pretty good area in vondelpark.  Area is a bit secluded from the main areas but within reasonable walking distances. Good place to stay for value.

Nice place in a nice area with tons to do. The extra bike was really helpful. Really nice couple, I would definitely stay here again.
Dirk's home is in a great location, has fun and funky decor and Dirk is a super accommodating host.
A very attractive place to stay with kind, friendly hosts who are helpful and fun/interesting to talk with.  Some tram riding to the center.  We recommend it well.
Great location.
Un poco alejado del centro de la ciudad pero cerca de la locomociÃ?n son buenos anfitriones y un departamento lindo un poco dificil de subir con los bolsos pero solo eso
nice stay. strategic location. friendly host.
Great place to stay near Vondelpark - a cozy and clean room with a host to match! The use of the bike is a definite perk.

Dirk's place was the perfect spot for my brief stay. The apartment is very cute and cozy and it is very well located next to the park. The hosts were very helpful with ideas and communication, but also let me do my own thing. I had a great experience staying here as a solo traveler.

Een aanrader! Dirk en Marte zijn heel verwelkomend en gastvrij en de woonst heeft een unieke gezellige sfeer en is goed gelegen. De eigenaars geven goede tips, stellen alles ter beschikking en tegelijkertijd geven ze veel vrijheid. De auto kan iets verderop geparkeerd worden aan dagtarief. Mijn zoon van 12jr heeft genoten van de uitstappen naar de verschillende buurten, de 'Amsterdam Dungeon', de Foodhall, Madame Tussaud's, Anne Frank huis (tickets online bestellen!).
The host canceled this reservation 433 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We stayed at this home for holidays and liked every aspect of our stay. The house was big enough for 5 adults and one child. By tram it is easy to reach the centrum and other tourist hotspots. Nixo the cat was really easy to take care of. We will gladly consider this home again for our next Amsterdam trip, if the hosts are comfortable with renting to us again.

We were a family of 7 staying for 5 days.  Townhome was a great place to stay to access downtown by tram.  Good restaurants and grocery stores within short walking distance.  Great park nearby for kids to run. Fantastic outdoor patio for morning coffee and quiet pleasant neighborhood. Marike and Joef were wonderful hosts. Thank you!
We enjoy our stay at this house, it was clean and private, quite area and host was really helpful.
The house si very beautiful, large and in a good position. We had a great staying

Leonie had a nice warm welcome to her amazing home. The location is great with all sorts of supermarkets, restaurants and public transport right under the house. Her home is fabulous: sunny, modern, comfortable so I would highly recommend a stay at Leonie's!

We stayed at Leonie's for three nights and had a fantastic time. The flat was bright, clean, stylish and peaceful. Fantastic location for exploring the city. Great restaurants and bars close by. Overall a winner!
awesome

Amazing home in a beautiful neighborhood. Cannot emphasize enough how central this location was, and how close it was to anywhere you want to go in the city. On all the major tram tracks and a fast train ride got us back and forth. If you have difficulty with stairs the walkway was just a little steep, but a fully pregnant wife did fine!  You'll enjoy this home immensely and the decor, spaciousness, cleanliness and amenities made this a highlight of Amsterdam!

Leonie's apartment is very stylish, bright and spacious! My daughter doesn't want to leave the apartment and glued on Netflix! :) It's away from the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam but the tram is right next. There are good breakfast spots around and Albert Heijn is a minute away. Thanks Leonie for accommodating our family!:)

Loenie's place was great. Big, clean, full of light, beautifully decorated, in a cool part of the Oud West. Walking distance to the touristy areas but you're in an actual neighborhood, which is ideal. Leonie was very friendly and easy to get in touch with. I'd recommend her place to anyone and would happily stay there again!

Unfortunately we had an apartment change. So I cannot write about this apartment. We were able to stay at the owners apartment and it turned out great. the apartment was cozy and was well organized. The communication was easy and fast. We loved the area.
definitely can recommend this host

Hi Willie, thank you for your hospitality and for your communication throughout our stay.! We had a really great time, discovering this new neighborhood in Amsterdam. Great food, and very easy transport options to other parts of the city. The apartment was very comfortable, and perfect for a couple. Many nearby conveniences like the local Lidl, nearby concept stores like Anna and Nina, and much more.

We spend 5 days in Amsterdam, in Willie's appartement.
A really nice stay, even if the weather was not with us.
A nice place to discover the city. Like 20min walking from the red light district, in a really nice district too, less touristic than the center. Not so far from the parc, the zoo...
The appartement is perfect for a couple, proper, and atypical, as the city where it is.
You are close to all the commodity and Liddl in front is perfect to not go to far to buy stuff.
We enjoyed ! Thx!
Super nice apartment and great location! Loved it!!!

Willie was very quick to respond to messages. Also, the apartment is in a great location. It's lovely area with nice bars and cafes around, and it's not far from the city centre. We had an excellent time.
Great location. WiFi is not the best. Clean.

The apartment was located in a lovely area close to the local supermarket ,cafes and shops. Was about a 25 minute walk to the Center. House was nice to stay in very simple but it has a lot of potential.
Lovely area, beautiful apartment! Would definitely come stay again
Nice cosy Appartement just as mentioned by Willie. Willie is a very nice and great host. Definately recommended!

Willie's apartment in Amsterdam - de Pijp is a great place to stay at and to enjoy this wonderful city and the people who live there. The Albert Cuyp market is really just across the road. There are plenty of restaurants (we ate out vegan on 5 days and didn't visit one place twice!) and pubs really close to the flat. The apartment itself is to reach via quite steep but classical Amsterdam staircases - do not bring too heavy luggage (or use the hook at he rooftop if you got a very long rope with you ;-). Willie was always there when we needed him and was a very good host! This place is absolutely recommendable for groups up to 4-5 people if you are eager to share beds. It also is good for families or couples. I want to end this rating with a quote of the staff of the coffeeshop Ibiza opposite of the flat: "Your last day in Amsterdam man? You either make it to count or to forget! If you make it to forget - you might have already made it to count! Love this city and will return soon for sure.
Good location, comfy beds, quick responses from Willie, would definitely stay again

Lovely light and airy apartment in a beautiful part of an Amsterdam. Lots of brunch and restaurant options around, and very close to a supermarket. Big Comfy beds, great for 4 people.

We stayed in Willie's apartment for three nights. We really appreciate the house style and its atmosphere. In our opinion there was enough room for four people.

The host canceled this reservation 20 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Quynh was an incredibly friendly and helpful host. She met us at the bus stop and helped carry our bags up.

Her place is a great value, especially for a large private room so close to downtown. The place wasn't the cleanest, but for the value was still ok.
Very lovely to stay a few days. It is a 20 minute ride to Amsterdam central with a bus which comes every 10 minutes. Quiet area. We really liked our stay here.
The surroundings are really quiet and calm. Enjoyed the stay.
A great place... Not far at all...for me best approachable by bike but bus Is an option well,peaceful neighborhood, and most importantly an awesome host! Two thumbs-up, highly recommend!

The house is nice and not so far from a metro station (5 minuts walking) but it has some issues: badly kept, lots of insects and leeking sink. The real problem is that the host wasn't avaible for almost one week when she said she would be, and answered our questions the day before our departure when it was useless.
A very nice place to stay! The house was wonderful and communication with Carolina was easy. I highly recommend this place to stay in Amsterdam
Great location, only 20 mins on the metro! Popeye the cat is so sweet and lovingly :) overall a great stay
Nice place
Central and nice location with a very communicative and friendly owner.

Ehab is gracious, accommodating host. I enjoyed my stay greatly. The little palace is clean, cozy and perfectly located just outside the Centrum to enjoy quiet alone time but just a quick 5-10 minute walk to restaurants, museums, redlight district and transit. The morning view out the windows is perfect view to start your day in Amsterdam. There is also a bike rental shop (Mike's bike rental) 2 blocks away, convenient for easy pick up/drop off, and they rent over night. The little palace is great for solo or couple travelers. I highly recommend choosing Ehab as your host, you won't be disappointed.

The apartment is really close to the center and the train station, it's very convenient ! You can find everything in this beautiful apartment. Besides Ehab is really kind and helpful !!
Thanks again !
Fantastic place. Startegically located right on the edge of town. Excellent view. Highly recommended. Quick note to technically minded guests: there's no HDMI on the TV. No big deal.
In the middle of everything! Everything is walkable so bring good walking shoes! Will stay here again in the future! Such a cute studio!
Amazing! Beautiful apartment in a great neighborhood. ItâÄôs quiet with a great view... very close to everything youâÄôll want to see and do. I would definitely stay here again!

Very nice and clean place. Small cozy and very modern apartment. Very close to the city center and railway station. Nice view of the canal from the window. Functional kitchen - coffee machine, fridge, even washer and dryer.
Very nice host.
It was a pleasant 5 days. Thanks Ehab.
Great location within an easy walk of Amsterdam Centraal.   Very clean, efficient and compact but has everything you need!  Loved our stay!
Ehab was a great host who allowed me to check in super early. The studio apartment was great with a real comfortable bed.

Great location, 10 minute walk to red light district and beautiful canal views. Lovely/trendy decor and Ehab is such good host
Really nice place and decoration. Would recommend

Ehab's apartment was fantastically located, well within walking distance to all city center hilights and the train station (which was a huge plus whilst lugging bags through the city). He was very accommodating about allowing us to check in rather early, due to a morning flight, and check out a bit late. Overall, excellent stay-- thank you!
Perfect! Thanx
Convenient flat for reasonable money

Ehab could not have been a better host. He answered messages quickly, worked with my crazy schedule, provided tips and even where he got this killer key holder (which i had to have).

The location was central to everything that i needed and once i got used to thr layout, the spot couldnt have been any easier.

Amzing place. I hope to stay here again when its a lot warmer
Nice modern Apartment, near the city center with view to the canal and the harbour. Great communication with the owner, who also showed great flexibility.

Perfect Service, perfect place, small but got everything you need!

Ehab was very communicative and worked with my schedule for check-in and check-out. The flat is beautifully decorated and the view can't be beat- you literally see a canal from the couch. It is a very comfortable flat with basic amenities. I enjoyed the Nespresso coffee maker. He also left a few snacks which came in handy when I needed a quick bite before the coffee places opened :) The flat is very easy to walk to anywhere you are going. Just a note- if you are using Uber- use the address for Oracle instead, putting this address puts the Uber behind the building instead of in front.

Thanks so much for card you gave us upon arrival. Very thoughful and meant alot to my wife and I. Outstanding hospitality and very friendly. Would reccomend this spot to anyone looking to be close to the heart of Amsterdam
Great place.  Just a little far from central Amsterdam.  Expect a 25 minute walk to Centraal.
