Thank you to Ehab for being a great host! Very helpful with local tips and any questions we had! Would definitely recommend
Sara & Sophie
Alles super

Ehab was always very quick to respond, friendly and easy going - a true five star host! The apartment is close to the train station and the center yet still in a quiet neighborhood. Everything was spotless and the apartment had all the amenities I required for my visit. I had a fantastic stay and can recommend EhabâÄôs apartment to anyone looking to stay at a central but quiet place.
We have a nice time in EhabâÄôs house that is good location and well equipped! Its value for money. Much appreciated that Ehab always responds quickly and provides immediate support

The host was perfect:) great communication. The flat had everything we needed (coffee machine NescafÃ© really important for my Italian boyfriend), washing machine, and dishwasher even if I did not use it I was happy. I recommend (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) âÄ? time
EhabâÄôs place is clean, super conveniently located, and has everything you need for a great stay in Amsterdam. Ehab is a great host: flexible, kind and very responsive.
Excellent host and place, what you see in the pictures is what you get. Communication with Ehab was quick and helpful.

Alice and Ro are the most kind and loving hosts we could have wished for our stay in Amsterdam. Together with their small dog Boef they made our trip even more special and pleasant. Their small apartment is super litty and chill and in a good location with a cozy bedroom for lovely dreams. A definite plus was the amazing welcome gift! We approve this accommodation and would always recommend
Definitely recommend it. Particularly very near to Science park. Alice, Ro, and Boueff are super fun and lovely :)

Alice and Ro's place is all my girlfriend and I needed for a couple nights in Amsterdam. The room was clean, cozy, and had a nice balcony. It is walking distance (2 miles to the major parts of Amsterdam) or there are plenty of public transportation options. The surrounding neighborhood was quite and low key.

These two are using Airbnb in the way it is meant to be: let other people have the chance to get an authentik insight about the lifestyle in their City.
They are completely trustworthy and very kind!
Sadly, we didn't got to see the dog =(
Alice and Roo are amazing hosts, very friendly and accommodating. We had a really great time and the area is great with lots of lovely bars and restaurants

I recommend this place to anyone searching for a good room to stay in while visiting Amsterdam! Alice and Ro are incredibly sweet and give great recommendations for cafes, clubs, bars, etc. around the city. They were also very flexible with our check-out and check-in time which was super helpful and kind. They are in a quiet area and right next to a tram that goes straight into downtown.

Alice and Ro are one of the best hosts that I have ever had. They were really friendly and communicative, making us feel like at home. I highly recommend the house for everybody who wants to spend a nice time in Amsterdam.

We loved our stay at Alice and Ro's! They are wonderful hosts and very friendly! They made sure one of them was home to greet us and even had a little welcoming gift on our bed! Their place has a great location and is really easy to get to from the city. Everything was clean and nice. I would definitely recommend staying with them!

Position of the apartment is perfect. With bike you can reach Amsterdam centraal in only 10-15 minutes. Alice and Ro are really friendly host.

The big minus in this apartment is bathroom - is so small and inside of the shower cabin is really dirty.
Alice and Ro are a very nice couple, the bedroom is nice and cozy, and it isnâÄôt to far from the center of Amsterdam. Overall we had a wonderful stay!

Our host is very friendly and he has been very flexible about our arrival time which was very convenient. Besides, the appartment is very close to Javastraat where you can find very nice bars. Thanks!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great Host! Nice flat! Nice Area!I had so much fun! Thx a lot!!!

This room is awesome. It was my first time to stay on the boat and it would be memorable for me. The furniture is cute and there is a big bed so I got a great time in there.
My friend also satisfied everything in this room.
Thank you so much.

This is a great choice of accommodation in Amsterdam. It's possible to walk to most attractions easily. Mark and Olaf are great hosts, they have really good local knowledge, excellent communication and made check in/out very easy. The boat makes a really nice cosy retreat when it's time to call it a night...

The spot is at 10 minutes from Red Lights & all the Amsterdam's attraction.
The boat is a really romantic place.
We really recommand this place :) !!!
Cheers

The boat is in an excellent location. Very easy to get to and from central either by foot or by metro. The boat is very spacious and lovely and warm. ItâÄôs in quiet area but only a ten minute walk from Rembrandt square. The bed was fabulous, the shower was also very good and all of the boat was spotless and the host was awesome.

Really special accommodation, although any more than two people and it will feel cramped. Also worth noting that there are no kitchen facilities. The novelty of being on a boat and the quality of the finish make it a great option though.

It was amazing place to have a spezial and authentic stay in this beautiful city. The host we met was mark he is very friandly and easy guy to talk with. he evan helped us wehn ouer flight was cencellt. Tha boat is just perfeckt located and very clean.
We would like to stay here again.
Thank you and jus the best
PremiÃ¨re expÃ©rience sur un bateau, atypique et trÃ¨s sympa. Ce logement manque cependant d'intimitÃ© pour 2 couples. PrÃ©fÃ©rer un couple avec 2 enfants max. PropretÃ© et Ã©quipements parfaits.
Our experience in the houseboat has been amazing (very clean, with nice details, comfortable...)!! Mark has been great! Thank you Mark for your help and kindness. I wil recommend for sure this place.
Fantastisches Boot, super Lage und exzellente Gastgeber!!! Sofort wieder
Olaf and Mark are lovely to be hosted by. The boat is near enough to town to easily walk, and still be tucked away, distant from the tourist noise.

A wonderful, cosy and speacial place to spend some days in Amsterdam! The house boat is nothing less than perfect for a couple or a small family. I have been on the boat with my son aged 11 and we loved this place from the first second. It is close to the spots in the centre, but nevertheless private and quiet. Very smart and appealing interior. Mark is a very reliable, friendly, relaxed and helpful person, definitely a great host! Thanks, Mark! We hope to come back soon.

We enjoyed our stay at the lovely houseboat Johanna! Mark greeted us upon arrival and showed us around. He gave us nice tips and also offered further help during our stay. The boat was very clean and we had everything we needed. Yes, the rooms and beds might be a bit small but not smaller than expected and just right for the "real houseboat experience". We loved it and do absolutely recommend to stay at Johanna! Thank you!

One of the best ways to experience Amsterdam! Living on a boat definitely takes some getting used to -- but for us it was well worth it! Houseboat Johanna played an important role in making our trip so memorable. Great location with bars, restaurants, shopping, cultural sites and grocery store a short walk away. Mark was very responsive and timely in his correspondences, and he provided an excellent overview of the houseboat itself and the surrounding area upon arrival. He also made himself accessible to us throughout our stay without being intrusive at all. Highly recommend this houseboat for anyone looking to experience a different side of Amsterdam!

The houseboat Johanna was a great adventure on a canal close to everything...well appointed, charming and extremely comfortable! Marc and Olaf were great hosts- easy to communicate with and very accommodating for our early morning arrival! Sitting out on the bench atop the boat and enjoying the evening air was a great way to relax!

Staying at Houseboat Johanna was truly amazing. First nothing screams a true Amsterdam experience quite like staying in a houseboat! But Mark and OlafâÄôs houseboat is BEAUTIFUL! The decor is stylish, warm and inviting.

They are located on a quiet canal but very very close to all the hustle of the Amstel River. They are a stones throw away from a tram and metro which makes for easy access in and out of the Amsterdam Centraal. Mark was amazing and so helpful from booking to checking out and even had local tips for us.

I was truly sad to leave and cannot wait to go back and stay at this beautiful houseboat again!

It is a really great little Airbnb.  A quick walk from most any of the amazing parts of Amsterdam.  Clean, Quiet and a great room to have a morning coffee right up in the Pilot house.  You can't go wrong here..   But do be aware that because its a boat, the ceilings can be low.  So if that is a concern, do consider that.  Otherwise we loved everything about our time in Amsterdam and aboard the Johanna.

Truly a lovely space and I appreciate the craftsmanship that went into creating this space. Communication was easy. One thing I would warn you of, is if you are traveling by your own car, make sure to take anything of value out of it. We got distracted taking our stuff out and someone left a backpack in the car and someone broke in to get it. But thatâÄôs on us, not the lovely neighborhood the houseboat is in and out hosts were most empathetic. Would come back and stay here again in a heartbeat!

What a truly wonderful space! Great location, unexpectedly spacious and beautifully finished. We were traveling with 2 young children and the cupboard bed was such a fantastic hideaway cubby for them, they will be talking about it for months! We loved relaxing with a coffee in the morning or a glass of wine in the wheelhouse, watching the girls play and watching Amsterdam wander by. Mark is very friendly and had lots of great suggestions for kid friendly outings but generally left us to do our own thing. A really great experience, thank you!
Such a wonderful experience. The boat was beautiful and we loved watching boats pass by from the head house. ItâÄôs beautifully kept and Mark was very nice! Highly recommend!
amazing space so close to the center.

The boat is amazing and beautifully equipped. There is a room up top which is the old wheel house and I could have sat there all day and watched the boats go by. Great location too. We fell in love with the Bakhaus at the top of the road and Bagels and Beans along the canal. You can walk to most things but also close to metro and tram stops.

This is a truly unique experience on one of the centrally located smaller canals. The space is clean, newly renovated and has just what you need. Our 2 young boys (7,9) slept in the cupboard bed for with no problems for 5 nights. They loved watching the boats go by and feeding the ducks off the side of the boat. Mark is a great host too. HeâÄôs responsive and helpful when you need him.
Fantastic location!
Gorgeous and convenient house boat! We had a wonderful and memorable stay! Thanks so much!

This cute houseboat exceeded all our expectations. Olaf and Mark take great pride in their property and it showed throughout. Additionally, they went out of their way to provide local tips and even arranged a cab for our return. They were always available but never in the way. The location works well. It is not in the middle of everything, lending to a quieter environment. Yet, we were not too far away. We would definitely stay here again and recommend it to our friends.

For an authentic Amsterdam experience, look no further than this Airbnb. Centrally located and surprisingly quiet. Drinking coffee in the morning and enjoying the view in the canal was fabulous. Mark and Olaf were very helpful and hospitable. I want to go back!!

Great location. Close to all of the great city sights.  We had a great time feeling the culture of the city by staying right on the canal. Mark and Olaf were great hosts.  The boat was clean, stylish and so fun to be a part of.

This is the perfect place to stay. Quiet and so very charming. Mark was a gracious, hospitable and importantly available host.

We didnâÄôt spend much time on the boat, but it was perfect.

Would definitely recommend!

This houseboat will give you an experience in Amsterdam like no other. You're right on the canal! Spend your evenings sitting outside watching the boats go by and the birds swimming. Easy walking to food and things to do. This houseboat worked well for us as a couple with our 14 year old son. Don't stay in a boring old hotel. Go for the houseboat!

We had a great time visiting Mark and OlafâÄôs place in Amsterdam. It is in a great location in the center of Amsterdam very close to Waterlooplein.

Olaf greeted us warmly when we arrived and oriented us around the boat and the area. The boat is very well layed-out, tidy and clean. The space is bigger than the pictures make it look. The little room was perfect for our son, he loved it!

On another note, our booking was suddenly cancelled when Airbnb did not accept the second payment. I was given the run around but Mark contacted them. After he called Airbnb were great and it was all sorted out. Mark went over and above. He truly is a super host!

This was a fantastic experience! The houseboat is beautiful, in a perfect location and Mark couldnâÄôt have been a more gracious host! We loved everything about it - itâÄôs incredibly clean, comfortable, but our favorite thing was sitting on the top having coffee or wine and watching the gorgeous view! The sunsets were spectacular! The location is great and we were able to walk almost everywhere. Definitely the best way to experience Amsterdam...we felt more like locals than visitors. Mark leaves a book with great suggestions for activities and restaurants...we did a few and all were excellent!

This is a great place to experience living like a local. Mark and Olaf met us early and gave great tips for finding things nearby. The houseboat is within walking distance of everything. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and highly recommend it.

We chose the houseboat to try a unique experience when visiting Amsterdam. It was a great decision to make and we plan in staying here again when we return.  The boat was incredibly clean and comfortable and had everything we could possibly need. Our host was friendly, helpful and accommodating. I loved the 'bunk' that I slept in and I had a better night sleep than I've had in a long time. I didn't want to leave!

We had a great stay, location is close to downtown metro etc. Food store and restaurants just around the corner. The boat is equipped with everything you need. Fancy furniture and modern bathroom. No closet for clothes, but this was not an issue for us. Same with the shared kitchen as we did not plan to cook.
One bedroom is a cabin for rather smaller people (kids). I would not recommend it for two couples anyway as you have to walk to the other bedroom to go to the bath. Marc is a friendly host and he was very supportive. As he lives on the boat as well you have immediate help if needed.

Staying in Johanna was a magical experience. We all fell in love with the canals of Amsterdam staying here. It's a very unique way to experience the city, as you're right on the street. One the most memorable things we did during our stay in the city was just hanging out on the boat with some beers while watching the sunset.

Those who are particularly concerned with privacy might want to think twice though, for two reasons. First, the person staying in the stern bed has to walk through the main bedroom to get to the bathroom/toilet. Second, people can see into the living areas from the street through the portholes in the side of the boat. Neither of these was a big deal for our group, but just something to consider for your own needs.
Had a lovely time on Johanna, Mark and Olaf were great hosts and very quick to reply to any messages. Thoroughly recommend. Thanks for lovely stay.

Staying on the houseboat was great. It was both cosy and spacious and felt very peaceful. The wheelhouse was a great space to enjoy a drink and a picnic meal. Great location, very close to metro just a few stops from Central Station.
We had a great stay in Amsterdam. The Houseboat is very clean , cozy and ideally situated to visit this amazing City. Thanks to the hosts who welcomed us very warmly .

We visited Amsterdam in the last 2 days of our Europe visit from Brooklyn/NY. We loved Johanna. The experience was great for both me and my husband as well as our kids... it was peaceful, cozy and quiet. Johanna had everything we needed for our short stay there. Since our stay was very short, we never ate in but if we needed, the full-shared kitchen had everything. Our kids collected more memories in 2 days then the rest of our Europe vacation in 2 weeks. The hosts Olaf and Mark were both great.
We had a great time at Johanna!
Close to metro, cafÃ©s and urban Amsterdam.
Great space with plenty of charm and thoughtful hosts! A very unique property in a perfect location to explore Amsterdam :)

This was my first stay at boathouse and it was beyond my expectation. Olaf And Mark's boathouse gave us wonderful time in Amsterdam and Mark treated us very kindly. When I have a chance to come back to Amsterdam, I would stay at this house again.

We really enjoyed our stay on Johanna! The boat was much more spacious than we expected & was very comfortable. The space was lovely & check in / out were  easy. Olaf was very welcoming & gave us some great suggestions for our stay. The only thing to be aware of before booking is that there is a ladder/steep steps to get from the living space to the exit. It wasn't an issue for us & we spent the mornings up top with coffee enjoying the view. Great location, too. Just a few minutes walk from the underground & tram stops. It was easy to make our way to  the museums or out for dinner. Highly recommend staying here if you're visiting Amsterdam!

We really enjoyed our stay and the location was perfect for our needs. The boat was clean and had almost all anemities we needed. I highly suggest Olaf and Mark's Johanna if you want to taste the living in a house boat. Thanks for the exellent service, too!

A truly wonderful and great experience. We visited the unique house boat during winter and it was warm, cosy and an amazing stay! We didn't get the opportunity to meet Olaf but we met Mark and he was extremely hospitable and friendly. He gave us local tips on where to eat nearby and was quick to respond to all my queries. It is a great location and really near to the city. The house boat was very clean, comfortable and really enjoyable. I would recommend it to anyone.
We had a really lovely time on Johanna - such a fab boat in a great spot, what more could we ask for! And Olaf and Mark are truly wonderful, caring hosts with superb attention to detail.
This is a wonderfully romantic place, right in the centre of Amsterdam with everything you need within walking distance. Highly recommended!
Beautiful place, super clean and well maintained. Looks a bit more spacious on the pictures.
Great houseboat in an ideal location. My travel partner and i enjoyed chatting with mark and Olaf and would definitely stay again!

A fantastic host and wonderful studio. Spotless, stylish and in a great location. Very steep stairs, but characteristic of Amsterdam apartments so part of the charm! We really loved De Pijp - so many fantastic bars, restaurants and coffee shops. Also walking distance to museums and the centre. The ideal choice for a few days away, couldnâÄôt recommend more.

Patrick and Ilin were great hosts and really deserve 5 stars. We arrived late and still had a nice check-in, with some birthday beers in the fridge (unfortunately didn't spend so much time in the lovely studio to actually enjoy these)
Tips for others staying with P&I or in De Pijp: Check out the Japanese bar/restaurant De Japanner - Albert Cuyptraat 228, just around the corner, Little Collins, and Bar Duvel. There is also a great Ethiopian restaurant called Azmarino.

Notre sÃ©jour chez Patrick sâÄôest dÃ©roulÃ© Ã  merveille ! Le studio est parfait pour un week-end, le quartier trÃ¨s sympa, avec de nombreux bars et restaurants dans les environs. Patrick est un super hÃ´te ! Je recommande pour un sÃ©jour Ã  Amsterdam.
Amazing studio, very trendy and minimal. Patrick was great and checked us in himself. Decent location, great value. Would definitely stay here again.

The studio is very comfortable, and perfectly located in a vibrant neighbourhood, with a lot of trendy bars, good restaurants and shops.
Patrick is a very kind and helpful host, always available to make our stay easy and enjoyable.
The perfect place for a cosy city break in Amsterdam.

Staying at Patrick's has been a perfect choice. Cozy studio fully renewed with style. The neighborhood is just 10min by tram to the hotspots. Lots of cafes, restaurants and cute shops around plus a handy supermarket. Patrick was a great host.

The studio is very comfortable for two people. It's in a great location, and the hosts are extremely helpful and kind.
The studio is one block away from the Albert Cuyp Market that is a fantastic place where you can found anything from delicious food to clothes and souvenirs.
I recommend staying here. Amazing place!

My stay at Patrick's place was amazing! The space is very stylish and clean. It's also located in an amazing area with plenty of places around to eat. One night I got takeout at The Butcher (a burger place) and also ate at Little Collins (a restaurant located right below the studio). The studio is very close to many tram lines, I'd advise to buy the tourist tickets for unlimited use of the tram and also the train between the city and the airport. One thing that I should mention is that the studio is on the second floor and the stairs are very steep. This wasn't a problem for me as an able-bodied 20 year old, but I could see this being a problem for some people with disabilities.
Absolutely beautiful studio flat. The area is fantastic with amazing eateries. Highly recommend!!!
The room was super clean, comfortable and Patrick very friendly and helpful. Location is perfect. Can only recommend to stay here!

Patrick and Illin were great hosts. They are very welcoming and friendly. When our travel adaptor wasnâÄôt working, they loaned us one. When the TV wasnâÄôt working, Illin quickly resolved it. We didnâÄôt expect the staircase in Amsterdam to be so steep and we turned up with heavy, huge luggages. Patrick and Illin very kindly helped us with them.

The place looked even better than the pictures. It was spotlessly clean and very comfortable. Patrick later told us we were one of the first few staying in this new studio, how lucky! It was better than many 4 star hotels we stayed in UK prior to arriving in Amsterdam.

The studio is located in the lovely De Pijp neighbourhood with the Albert Cuyp market just around the corner. The original stroopwaffles here are delicious! We tried the recommended Bazar (middle eastern cuisine) and Omlegg (omelette breakfast) which were good too. Many restaurants here open till late. Really appreciate the neighbourhood and region guides provided in the room. ItâÄôs about a 15mins walk to the museums, 10 mins walk to Heineken Experience and less than 5mins walk to the tram.

This was such an unexpected gem, I would definitely recommend PatrickâÄôs studio!

Patrick's apartment suited us very well indeed. He is an excellent host, responsive and helpful. The space is light, bright and welcoming with a comfortable bed. Everything worked!
We enjoyed the local area - Alberto Pozzoti's for good coffee and food and Manama in particular. A free walking tour with Sergio who runs FreeDam Tours was fun.

Patrick and Illan are really superhost, the studio is super clean with great design, the hosts even recommend places to eat, the location also very nice and easy to get around, definetely gonna stay here again if we visit netherland next time.

We had a wonderful stay at PatrickâÄôs apartment and would totally recommend it. The studio is in a great location. We loved the area - the restaurants, shops, market and park. ItâÄôs also easy and close to the center of the city - we walked everywhere.

The studio itself was lovely- really light with a very nice bathroom. (The bed is really big and super comfy.)

Patrick was a very welcoming host and really wanted to make our stay as great as possible. He helped us with our suitcases up the (steep) stairs. We had a problem one evening with the lock on the door (it was a one off and is fine now!) and to make up for it, he bought us a bottle of wine and some beers the next day.

In short a great place, location and host!

PatrickâÄôs apartment was extremely beautiful, clean and minimalist! The attention to detail made the stay very special , including the local restaurant recommendations and stroopwaffels. This was the first Air Bnb we have stayed in, and if all of them are as simple to arrange and luxurious as this, weâÄôll definitely use the service again. Patrick and his partner also helped us with our bags, and allowed us to pick up our luggage after check-out, allowing us to spend the final day around the local area. Thank you!

PatrickâÄôs apartment is really nice : clean, well located in the Pijp, walkable to the center (40 minutes) and to the Museum Plein (15 minutes). Nice coffees and restaurants around.
I recommend !

ÃÄ 2 pas du tramway et Ã  quelques lignes du centre ville, l appartement est dans un quartier calme. L hÃ´te est trÃ¨s chaleureux et l appartement est propre. Je recommanderais cet appartement Ã  un ami.

Wow! We stay at a lot of Airbnbs and this is one of the best-appointed and most thoughtfully-approached flats weâÄôve ever stayed at through the platform. Think of it like a stylish hotel room ++ since it also has a small kitchen and the location is so central to such a cool neighborhood. Highly recommended, thanks again!

PatrickâÄôs home is exactly like the picturesâÄîsuper stylish, super clean, and super comfortable. ItâÄôs located in de Pijp which is close to a bunch of trams and near a lot of great restaurants! The only fault was the TVâÄîit was a bit wonky to use, but we didnâÄôt use it much so it wasnâÄôt a big deal.

I would absolutely recommend this airbnb to anyone looking for a small studio in an upbeat young area. We travelled with a larger group who all had different accommodations some stayed at a hotel in a busier tourist area and they did not have as great of an experience as we did! PatrickâÄôs Airbnb was absolutely perfect for us. Great upbeat area, amazingly clean, super comfy bed and very quiet in the studio. Patrick was super responsive and very friendly.

The only thing that is a watch out would be the extremely narrow stairs, wasnâÄôt a concern for my husband and I but for someone who is older or has physical limitations this would not be the place for you. I would highly recommend this awesome studio in a lively fun area!!!
The apartment location was perfect for our trip requirements.  It is within walking distance of many attractions. Easy access to restaurants, grocery stores, and trams. Patrick was a great host!!

el estudio de Patrick es precioso... muy atento a los detalles y super confortable

el barrio es muy agradable con bares y locales muy bonitos
Nice place, great area, smooth communication and flexible. Perfect!
PatrickâÄôs place is very nice and cozy. We had an amazing time! :)
Spotless clean apartment! Cozy and spacey as for an apartment in Amsterdam :) Location is amazing, surrounded by cool restaurants and shops.

Perfect studio in the very hip area of De Pijb. Close to many great restaurants and bars. The studio was very clean and provided my boyfriend and I with everything we needed.

The communication was very easy and really appreciated the clear instructions on how to get to the studio and the helpful tips on restaurants, museums and fun things to do in the area.

Very much enjoyed our first time in Holland and thank Patrick and IIin for being so friendly and welcoming us with stroop waffles! Recommend highly and would visit again.

Excellent location, next to restaurants and shopping, and a park. Patrick's place was very clean and has everything you need for a night stay. It's very quiet. The communication was great and check in was clear. Thank you!

Beautiful apartment in a great location, everything you could possibly need on your doorstep.  Patrick and IlinâÄôs studio was spotlessly clean, spacious and just what we wanted for a short city break. Would definitely stay here again when we return to Amsterdam.
A modern, stylish and super clean studio in a brilliant location. Would definitely recommend.

Loved staying at PatrickâÄôs, super clean and stylish. What we loved the most was the location. Out of the main touristy hub with fantastic cafes and restaurants. Easy public transport but also central enough to walk most places.
Patricks place was the perfect spot to see Amsterdam, the real Amsterdam not just the touristy bits. Great vibe
This is a lovely little apartment, comfortable, clean and modern in a great location, close to super markets, cafes and shops.  we really enjoyed our stay there and would highly recommend to others.

Excellent hosts!! Patrick and Llin were so accommodating, they provided tons of local tips for sight seeing, tours, restos and bars, all of which pulled through as real treats. Communication was excellent, touching base everyday to see if there was anything we needed. The flat was gorgeous, spacious, shower is unbelievable, bed was very comfortable, everything was sparkling clean.

I canâÄôt say enough about this place. ItâÄôs located rite in De Pijp, so lots of restaurants, pubs, coffee shops and bike rentals (which you must do! Best and cheapest way to travel Amsterdam!) very close walk to the tram as well.

There is no place I will stay besides here if we ever return, the entire experience was fantastic! Highly Recommended!!

Had a fantastic stay! De Pijp is a wonderful area and the apartment is ideally located. Patrick's handbook came in useful when we were choosing places to go for dinner. He was friendly and very helpful!

Highly recommend! The studio is more beautiful than my expectations. Patrick is a great host and help us move our heavy luggage upstairs. In his studio,you donâÄôt need to share bathroom and toilet with others. The small kitchen with microwave and refrigerator are also available in private, not shared. ItâÄôs easy for us to have breakfast at home. The AH super market is nearby and itâÄôs very convenient to get the food , drinks,and fruits! Sometimes you can get special price! Patrick is helpful and reply our questions promptly. ItâÄôs more comfortable to stay in his studio than hotel!

Beautiful studio and friendly hosts!

I wish I could give six stars...this place was truly amazing. Clean and pristine, spacious single room with modern bathroom. And the location was incredible - just outside the canals in a quiet neighborhood near a daily market (Albert Cuyp) and a lovely park (Sarphatipark), but a 10 minute bike ride from city center and attractions. Perfect for couples who want to be near the action but also have a quiet private place to return to at night.

Our daily trip included a walk westward through Albert Cuyp market (operates every day except Sunday)...thereâÄôs a ton of little cafes and restaurants, or the food in the market stalls. One long block away is a row of restaurants - Helst is a must visit for those who love beer (over 30 on tap) - right next door is Katsu, a great âÄúcoffee shopâÄù if thatâÄôs your thing.

Highly recommended to rent bikes - we went with âÄúI Am BikeâÄù 2 blocks away on the market street. Best âÇ¬10 per day we spent. Museum square, canals and attractions are an easy bike ride away.

Just note there are 2 floors of steep stairs to get to the studio...but very manageable (even for my partner who broke his foot prior to arrival and was able to hobble up and down on a crutch)
Great host, very clean room, excellent bathroom. Lots of light, very well furnished and comfortable. And the location cannot be any better!

Amazing location, so easy to get anywhere you need. On the prettiest little street full of cute restaurants and cafe's, with a real local feel rather than anything touristy. The bed is HUGE! You won't be disappointed! The place is sparkling clean and has all the things you could need, such as an iron and hair dryer (essentials when going to a wedding as we were). Really great supermarket at the end of the street if you wanted to pick up snacks. The fastest Air B'n'B communication ever, and Patrick is full of tips and advice. Had a delicious breakfast at 'Bakers and Roasters' which is close by, you will have to wait a while but TOTALLY worth it. Little Collins (downstairs from apartment) is cute for brunch too. The room is a totally private studio you can lock, so it feels as if you are actually renting an apartment. Located at the back, the apartment is super quiet. We loved our stay!
We stayed at Patrick's while in town for a conference. Everything went smoothly and the place itself was spacious and comfortable. Thanks for being a great host!
Great host, very hospitable, perfect little set up if youâÄôre looking to travel to Amsterdam

A lovely good sized studio flat which is situated in a great area of the city, easy to get to on public transport, busy without being manic, and the flat itself is quiet, calm and clean.

The restaurants in the area are all superb too ! Enjoy.
This is a wonderful Airbnb. Patrick was considerate and very helpful. The space was stylish and in a fantastic location.

I would highly recommend staying here! The place is clean and comfortable and has a small kitchenette which is great for being able to prepare small meals. The location is perfect if you want to stay in a cool neighbourhood with lots of great bars, cafes and restaurants. It's an easy 5 minute tram to the centre or about a 15-20 minute walk. The hosts are really lovely and super helpful.
We had a very lovely stay at the studio of Patrick and Ilin. It is perfectly located in the center of de pijp, nicely decorated and very clean studio! Would definitely recommend staying here!
A great stay!
Lovely apartment, great host and brilliant location. Would recommend this studio for anyone wanting to stay in Amsterdam.

PatrickâÄôs place was above expectations and felt like a really nice hotel room - I would gladly stay here again! Extremely clean, fresh and quiet but in a hip and cozy neighborhood with bars and restaurants all around (which Patrick helps you find) , perfect for a local Amsterdam experience! Could not recommend this place more!

Perfect hosts who are super helpful and full of great tips. An immaculate room in a perfect location for exploring the city and surrounded by amazing restaurants bars and cafes, yet perfectly quiet at the same time. We highly reccomend staying here. R and E
Excellent location and spacious apartment.
Great place and great location! Would definitely stay here again if I return to Amsterdam.

Muy lindo apartamento, con mucho estilo. Tiene todo lo necesario. Las escaleras para el dormitorio son muy inclinadas, tomar nota por si alguien no es apto para subir. Esta como a 30 minutos del centro caminando, el tranvÃ?a 17 (principal para los distintos puntos turÃ?sticos) estaba 300 m de distancia.

Kathelijn was a great host, she met with us at our convenience by the apartment and she left everything ready for us to settle in as if it was our place (towels, bathroom products, etc.). Her detailed explanations of the apartment and utilities, made it super easy to get around the house.

The apartment itself is warm and cozy, with a stylish and modern design, in a great area 10min walking from the city center and surrounded by the two best parks in Amsterdam. If you are coming for a visit, this is the place to stay! We are most likely going to repeat when we come to Amsterdam.
Thanks again!

We had a lovely time staying in this apartment in Amsterdam. The location was perfect for what we wanted with some amazing restaurants and bars within walking distance. It was a great base for us exploring the city by bike, and convenient to get to the airport too. They were really helpful and friendly to deal with which made it even easier to have a good time! Thanks for the stay!
Appartement super bien placÃ©, contact excellent avec l hÃ´te !!!

Super nice Amsterdam apartment, with 4 guys it was perfect for our weekend stay.
For families, maybe a different apartment will fit your needs better. For young guys who want to see and experience amsterdam this is a highly recommendable choice!

Super appart bien situÃ© dans une zone plus frÃ©quentÃ© par les locaux que les touristes ainsi on Ã©vite les piÃ¨ges Ã  touristes. A brilliant apartment and great area to stay. Beers in the fridge and coffee provided! Would definitely stay here again when next visiting!

Thank you Adri! it was a great vacation.
The flat is in a GREAT neighbourhood and preaty good for 4 people.
Big flat, good location. We were 3 friends, and it was great fitted
The appartement was really nice for 3 people and the location was great.

Wonderful apartment in a cool area of Amsterdam, close to bars, food and public transport. Large supermarket and bike hire nearby. Walkable to Museumsplein.  Bathroom is small but fully functional. Dari very helpful and responsive. Beds (1 double, 1 sofa bed) comfortable and clean. Milk and coffee provided to start us off, and a few beers in the fridge as well. Lovely place to spend a long weekend exploring Amsterdam.
Nice communication before. A bit more complex later. Nice place and location.

La casa esta muy bien situada y comunicada,a una calle se encuentra la parada de tren la cual en 10 minutos te deja en el centro ademas de pasar con mucha frecuencia.
El barrio esta animado,con muchos sitios para comer o cenar,es un barrio joven pero nada ruidoso
Cerca de la casa hay un parque genial que adri nos indico para ir con los niÃ±os
La casa esta muy bien equipada y espaciosa,en mi opiniÃ?n es perfecta para parejas,familias,amigos.

Amazing location ,close to everything you might need and most important edry- took care of everything and more!
Only down side-toilet and shower a little small. âô¥

Location in a busy fun neighborhood, but over a (Website hidden by Airbnb) a bit noisy during the nightly clean-up. Pretty minimal furnishing and not enough linens. It would not be my first choice for the price.

Great apartment, best location. Adri is very nice and informative and the apartment was super clean! Only the toilets is a bit small.
Lovely Apartment, lovely host! Great place to stay in Amsterdam...

Voisins un peu bruyants mais pas dÃ©rangeant
Elina was very hospitable, extremely responsive, and the location of the apartment is perfect.
Great location, bars restaurants and markets very close. Awesome host, great hospitality
Great area to stay at, as you can get to most locations on foot easily. The communication was quick and friendly. Can recommend!

Great place and location, Elina was very helpful with all my requests.

Had a great time staying in this beautiful apartment. Thanks to Julia and Elina for providing a very clean space.(also thanks for great suggestions)Apartment is very conveniently located great restaurants,nice shopping tram also right around corner..
Everything you need for a trip to dam! Perfect apartment, great location, amazing hosts! What more could you want ?
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

My stay at Iris went very well! The apartment is 10 min from center , in a nice area . He was very comfortable  , practice and well agenced : ideal for 2 peoples . Iris has been listener and avaible for my questions . I recommend this accommodation !

Iris and Noor's apartment is simply a perfect place to stay in Amsterdam.  The modern furnishings and the loving and friendly manner of Iris and Noor make you definitely feel like home.  The two gave us useful tips and were (although they were on holiday) always available for us if we had questions.  The apartment is located in such a way that you can reach the city quickly and easily by tram.  If you are thinking about coming to Amsterdam, I can only recommend this AirBNB to you!
our stay was just great! communication was throughout perfectly fast and easy going. the apartment is lovely!
Cool and quiet place , close to city center. Perfect for a few days stay for 3 or 4 people.
Beautiful, modern and stylish apartment with great facilities near by and an excellent host! Definitely would like to stay there again
Julia's flat offered a convenient location within short walking distance of museums, restaurants and shops.  Easy access to central station.  Very comfortable accommodations.
Great location, spacious apartment and nice outdoor pation
Great space! The design and style were better than I expected. Julia was very accommodating and open to assisting us whenever we need it. I would love to stay there again!

Julia's place was great! The location was exactly where we were looking for, tons of access to great food and transportation throughout the city and Julia was fantastic! Super easy to communicate with and always available if we needed anything.

Great place (Everything in the apartment are neat and clean) Good location (Close to the tram station, only take 10-15 mins to the Central). Good size for four people:). And Julia is very friendly, quick response and helpful !!!

A very nice to stay in.

We stayed 4 nights at Julia's place. The apartment is well located, with many caff'es, bars, and supermarkets around. Public transportation is available and convenient but most attractions are in a walking distance.  The apparent is spacious, clean and well equipped. Our communication with Julia was perfect. Highly recommended!
Very nice trip in Amsterdam. Thank's to Janneke !
Lovely apartment and very helpful hosts! Would definitely stay again

Great time - the apartment is very comfortable and have a central location close to all !

Simply great value for the money !
a really nice place!! close to stores and the paradiso! A fairly quiet area with the luxury of Amsterdam Central being a quick drive away. Thank you so much!

Appartement trÃ¨s agrÃ©able, bien situÃ©, conforme aux photos, propre.
Echange avec Janneke facile.
Great host and great and beautiful apartament. Perfect location also ;)
The host canceled this reservation 60 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very charming and convenient place. Quiet canal at the edge of Jordaan, a short walk to many sites and amenities. Highly recommended!
Di is a great host with fantastic communication. There was a slight problem on the horizon which was swiftly sorted! No complaints at all. Fully recommended.
Quick walk into center city or into the rest of the Jordaan.  Every amenity you need is readily available and Di was extremely responsive throughout.
I would highly recommend DiâÄôs place, it was beautiful and was perfectly located. Everything is walking distant. Di was Very great at communicating and very helpful through out our stay.
awesome..... great location super host perfect house

We had a great stay here! The apartment is fantastic for a city break to Amsterdam: perfectly located, clean, comfortable and very spacious! Di was incredibly helpful before our stay as well. Definitely recommend staying here.
Value for money! Great location and Di was super responsive and helpful.
ok

Lovely staying at Laurens Bella appartment.
We were specially charmed by the balcony and the birds singing.
The appartement is clean, cosy and confortable.
Calm place, well located, near everything.
Dont hesitate!
Cozy place!

LaurensâÄôs flat is in super location for enjoying Amsterdam and hanging out in De Pijp neighbourhood at night. ItâÄôs also very easy to get there from Centraal Station (only 15 minutes by tramway, line 4).
We were welcomed by Steven, the LaurensâÄôs brother. The communication with him was very easy and he was helpful and thoughtful all our stay long.
The flat is plenty of natural light as it is on the top floor (you should have strong legs to climb the very vertical stair!). It is also a very comfortable place (note that kitchen is a bit simple to cook your own hot meal). By the way, the flat is perfectly in line with pictures and description.
I highly recommend !

We are enjoyed very well from your apartment, great place , beautiful view and lovely filling.
Thank you very much.
Dor.
This place was great! Everything was nearby and the host was phenomenal.
Nice place, perfect view from the terrace
Great place
We loved this cosy functional place. Would highly recommend.

What a perfect place to stay during a trip to Amsterdam! Laurens met us after our flight rather late and was so gracious in welcoming us. We loved all the suggestions he gave for good places to eat, drink, and shop in the area! The space itself was gorgeous, well decorated, and with very comfortable beds. Was great to wake up in the morning and have a coffee on the balcony before making the short walk into the central portion of Amsterdam. It was well located next to a lovely park and great public transport but we walked everywhere from this place and loved it. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to explore Amsterdam!

Super place in a great location. The apartment is far beyond what we expected for the price and we were thrilled when we saw the location. An easy 10 minute walk to the very centre of the city or 30 seconds round the corner for tram, bus and metro connections. Also a bustling shopping street 30 seconds away with numerous bars, places to eat, local shops, supermarkets and coffee houses... there is also a (quiet) Italian restaurant and bar at the end of the road, so very useful if you want a quiet place to eat or have a few beers in the evening.

Communication with Evert was easy, quick and friendly. He let me know immediately that he would not personally be there but check in would be accommodated by his friend Hamid, who was equally friendly. He picked us up from the airport, gave us tips on where to go (and where to avoid) and was very friendly. I had his mobile number and he assured us we could contact him at any time if we needed anything (at one point I had a query about the key and he replied immediately and was super friendly about it).

The apartment has everything you need for a short stay in the city. The stairs are VERY steep and a bit alarming to a tourist, but this is not against the apartment or Evert, more a note to future visitors that carrying luggage up and down can be a bit daunting as there's no lift (which is noted on the listing). From our viewpoint, however, Hamid insisted on helping with our bags, so another tick in the box for their friendliness! He also made sure our Wifi was connected and that we knew how to work the heating before he left, so we felt everything was covered.

The apartment does not have a kettle or toaster, although we used the stove for coffee/tea and, to be honest, for a short stay this is hardly an issue at all.

The pics/description on the site are accurate.

Would absolutely recommend this place to anyone planning a short visit to Amsterdam. I am genuinely amazed at the price given the location/quality of the apartment. Thank you so much to Evert and Hamid - you made my 30th birthday holiday a wonderful experience!

It's not usual for us to write bad reviews, but our latest experience unfortunately has brought us to write this, which in short was extremely disappointing given the price of the apartment. Once we found the place, in which we were given clear instructions and a fast checkin, we unfortunately found a construction site right within the apartment building on the ground floor! A wooden plank crossed across a construction hole from the front entrance to the stairs, which was both unsafe to use and a struggle with out luggages. Once we checked into the apartment, we found a broken toilet (they informed us that the button was broken but the toilet kept on making leaking noises the whole time and we couldn't sleep, and we literally had to put our hand behind the wall to flush the toilet), the washing machine was full of someone else's laundry, with water leaking out of it - to couple it all off, other laundry was being dried right in the living room! The apartment floor was also sandy, presumably because of the construction site on the ground floor. We then had people smoking downstairs late at night and making noises at 5am. No explanation was given as to how the thermostat was regulated, at which point the apartment was an unbearable 26 degrees inside. Unfortunately we received no feedback from the host on these issues. Not recommended!

It was staying at ClinkNOORD! The staff promptly responded to my emails and the rooms are spotlessly clean. The location was super perfect for my needs! I would recommend for any traveler.

Cool place all in all. Small rooms, beds are OK but you are sleeping really close to the person in the next bed. Rooms are very silent tho. The lobby downstairs is a really cool space. I expected to work there but there was always really loud music (and lot's of people in party mood) so it wasn't so comfortable for that. The main downside is that the windows don't open in the whole building so summer days are really hot and the air gets stuffed on the room (can't imagine how it can get in a room for 8!).
The service is good all in all and the location is nice because you're forced to cross the river everyday which is cool (and free)
Laundry room needs an upgrade. 3 washer and dryers servicing the whole building, in which 1 washer and 2 dryers were out of order. 4 bdr female dorm was clean and quiet.

My trip to Amsterdam was my first time staying in a hostel as well as travelling solo so I was initially a bit nervous beforehand however I am happy to say that I had an absolutely wonderful experience! I felt very safe during my stay here, the location is fantastic and just a 3 minute ferry ride (free!) over to Amsterdam Centraal Station. Check in/out was quick and easy and the staff were super friendly and approachable. This room was a decent size with useful power plugs/usb ports and a reading light above each bed and the beds themselves were also fairly comfortable. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Hey, very nice place in the heart of the city. Irecommend you all to stay here with Chun!

Very nice apartment in a lovely place, in the heart of the city : perfect location!
Everything went well: the flat is clean, Chun was quick to answer, really helpful and flexible.
I recommend you to stay here!

Our stay at Chun's place was more than great Although Chun was unavailable to meet us at the time of the check in, he was very responsive online to our Questions . The room is exactly pictured;  clean, comfortable, full equipped and very good located as well. We can highly recommend Chun's Apt.

Chun's place is conveniently located in a nice area of Amsterdam close to a park and on a square with a couple of bars, a cafÃ©, and is a 5 minute walk from plenty of shops, etc.
The apartment itself has a small kitchen with everything you need for a short stay, a large living room area, a corner with a large double bed, and a small bathroom. The place is clean and tastefully decorated so would be a good option for a business traveller or couple visiting the city for a few days and wanting to stay out of the city centre.
I had some issues with collecting the keys (was supposed to collect them from a laundry which turned out to be closed) but Chun replies quickly to messages so we got everything sorted out and I was able to check in within about an hour.

This apartment is a large, clean studio with great windows, and it is not far from the metro or great parts of Amsterdam. The loud bars and music around it can make getting to sleep a challenge, so bring white noise.
So nice to meet them

Superb! Beautiful, stylish, very clean and comfy apartment bathed in sunshine, especially on the terrace sofa in the morning. Perfect for couples or families. Neighbourhood is filled with lovely local cafes, independent shops and of course canals to stop for picnics or drinks. Lovely canal side walk or tram to centre parts. Hosts (Reiner and Rosa) are super friendly, trustworthy, very quick at communicating and so helpful. We recommend it very highly!

Very nice apartment in Amsterdam. Big living/dining room and place to sit outside. The furniture is modern, bathroom and kitchen are quite new. Everything you need live was already in the aparment. We really enjoyed our stay.

The neighbourhood is quiet but there are plenty of stores and possiblities to get something to eat in walking distance.

Public transportation is very close and it only takes about 10 minutes to get to the city centre.
The host canceled this reservation 86 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Amazing place!!! I really enjoyed my stay. I am planning on coming back with my wife. Thank you so much Amarah for a good stay

This is a wonderful space in a great location.  Very clean and spacious!  A very nice apartment on the first floor and even has a balcony overlooking the road, which was fun. and lots of large windows for a bright and airy feel.  Even though this is located on a busy street, there were no problems with noise and the bedrooms are at the back of the apartment and are very quiet.  The restaurant on the ground floor was also very mellow and was never a noise problem.  Many restaurants are located within the same block and there are tram stops within two blocks.  The full-size refrigerator (with a freezer!) and washer/dryer were true luxuries.  The separate toilet room also helped our family get through routines more quickly.  The beds were very comfortable and also nice towels and other fittings!  Truly lux compared to other places we have stayed.

A perfect location of this property next to a big street market where you can have snacks and breakfast and shopping, 5 mins cycling to Van Gogh Museum and the square. It is convenient to get every site around centre if you rent a bike. It is the first choice for family and friends trip
This place was amazing! The location couldnâÄôt have been better! The space was clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend choosing this apartment to stay at. You will not be disappointed!
The apartment was in a very good location and had a very roomy feel to it. Would stay again :)
Appartement agrÃ©able pour une famille. IdÃ©al pour passer quelques jours Ã  Amsterdam.

Super plek. Erg schoon. Voor Amsterdamse begrippen een zeer goede prijs-kwaliteitverhouding.

Wij waren met een peuter en met mijn ouders. Dan is het een stuk gezelliger dan een hotelkamer.

Great apartment, very comfortable beds and sofas, very spacious.
Lovely walked to city center, easy to catch the tram witch you can see coming and going from the Apartment windows every 15 minutes. It was perfect for our Trip.

Great apartment in a fantastic neighbourhood. Public transportation, restaurants and bars just around the corner. Apartment is clean, spacious and very functional. Amarah was also a great host and was very easy to reach! We had a very nice stay!

If you need a place that will accommodate your needs, then I recommend this place.  No need to look further.  The location is accessible to everything you want to explore.  Most importantly, it is very CLEAN!  Highly recommended.

Amarahs Place was an absolutely amazing experience in terms of hospitality , location, space, and Amenities.
Amarah is a very kind and gracious host, promptly available to help out with any questions , full of local tips. The location was one of the best. Walking distance or just a short tram ride away from all the major sightseeing and dining attractions.
The apartment is very spacious and fully equipped with whatever one could possibly need to make it a home. Including cereals, cookies, tea coffee etc etc .
Amarah very kindly gave us a late checkout and letâÄôs us even keep our bags until later .
This enhances the experience of our time in Amsterdam tremendously . It was always lovely to come back home and spend our evenings there cooking and relaxing . A true home away from home . Thanks Amarah
Great location! Great stay :)

I expected a lot and the place was even better! It's a huge, comfy place to come back to after a long day of site seeing. We bought dinner every night at the market around the corner and ate it relaxing in the dining room looking out onto the street. Couldn't be better.
Apartment was clean and modern. Great amenities available. Location of the place is brilliant also, walking distance to most popular places
Amazing apartment and location. Close to public transport and supermarkets.  Loads of places to eat nearby.
Apartamento muito bem localizado, perto dos melhores pontos de AmsterdÃ£. Tudo funcionando perfeitamente. Respostas rÃ¡pidas da Amarah, uma super anfitriÃ£.
AmarahâÄôs place is an excellent spot to stay if you are visiting Amsterdam with a group. Wonderful location and spacious apartment.

Amarah's place was very comfortable and nice and the location was even better! We really enjoyed our stay. Amarah was also very quick to assist with any issues that came up.

Thanks for hosting!
Apartment was as great as its advertised and Amarah was a great host helping with anything we needed. Highly recommended
Sparkling clean. Amarah was easy to communicate with and especially accommodating. Beautiful loft.

A spacious and clean apartment in a perfect location, a short bike ride to any attraction as well as walking distance to a huge amount of great restaurants and shopping in the market. Others note the bar downstairs but we found this hardly was impactful to peace and quiet inside the apartment.

Its an amazing apartment, So spacious and luxurious, Every detail was excellent. The location is perfect for getting to and from anywhere you want to go as tram 4 has a stop right across the road. There is also a Supermarket just round the corner for your supplies. Only negative was having to climb a steep staircase to the apartment but what do you expect in quirky Amsterdam, But the view totally makes up for it and it will blow your mind!!!
5 star place

AmarahâÄôs place was very comfy, stylish, and not really far from AmsterdamâÄôs attractions!
My friends and I were visiting the city for the second time and staying in this house was absolutely an added value to the trip!
Great hospitality, and very helpful instructions..

Very good

Stunning apartment with very comfortable bedrooms, a full size tub and shower which feels like a luxury item travelling through Europe. The size and space was above and beyond what I expected and made it much easier for three adult men to co habitate for a weekend. The location is great, literally right next to the Albert Cuypstraat outdoor market, walking distance to a few coffee shops, and a quick and easy stroll across the street to catch the #4 tram to take you up to Rembrandt square or further up the Damrak. Amirah was great in replying to messages almost instantly as well, she was a fantastic host that accommodated our unique check in requirements. Highly recommend 5 stars!
This place was very nice and very clean.  The location was great - close access to public transportation and restaurants.  the place was comfortable and stylish.  We would definitely stay here again.
Matched de beschrijving! Aanbeveling!
Beautiful, clean, and great location.

Good location only 10mins from Dam square on tram. Apartment was clean and tidy, spacious, beds were really comfy. Communication with Amarah was easy and her responses were very quick. Would defo stay here again

Wonderful spacious apartment close the transport links. We loved staying at Amarah's apartment, its a couple.of minutes walk to the tram and a quick journey into Central Amsterdam. We loved being in De Pipj and walking distance to all the museums. Would highly recommend.
ItâÄôs a well-designed flat; location is top with good access to local traffic; Amarah is a highly responsive host

This is a very clean and spacious apartment which has lots of amenities close by. It was easy to walk into the centre or catch a bus or boat.
We would recommend this place and hope to return one day

Amarah's place is AMAZING. It's better than pictures portray. It is big, clean, all the amenities you could need, good location, overall GREAT. The only downfall is the very loud music that plays at night from the bar downstairs, but if you can sleep through noise, then this won't be an issue. I can't express how beautiful Amarah's place is and I would stay here again. Thank you!

Quick responses, loads of space in the apartment, really close to a Lidl and the 4 team takes you right into the centre, the tram stop is just outside the apartment. Would highly recommend

Very nice apartment

Lovely clean apartment in a great location, quick and helpful in responding to questions, would definitely stay again.
Great stay, fantastic location, clean apartment, great links to RAI and City Centre, has everything you need and Lidl close by to stock up

Amarahs Apartment is all you will need! We where 4 people and we loved it!
The Apartment is totally clean and huge. You have this high rooms where you fill so free and also the desing of the apartment is exceptional! Everyone's best choise for sure!

Amarah was always quick at responding. The place was clean, had food and a lot of amenities. It's very well located. There were lots of restaurants, supermarkets, stores and transportation nearby.
The self check-in and checkout were easy to do. Amarah also provided us with tips on how to get to the place and also had a folder laying on the desk with possible attractions for us to check while in amsterdam.

Outstanding... everything you could ask for, and the centre is literally a couple tram stops away. Best of the best.

We had a great time at Daan's place. The flat is original and very stylish with modern amenities. The location is fantastic. Daan was a great host, providing lots of tips and information about things to do in the neighbourhood. We highly recommend it.
A perfectly located property, super clean, beautiful and comfortable with the best hosts you can hope for. You are lucky if you get to stay here!

Perfect place as great or even better than in the pictures. Loved the coffee and warm welcome with great tour of home. Great communication. Convenient location. Would be psyched to stay here again.

I can tell you really love your home and neighborhood so thanks for sharing with my family.
We had a super stay!
Jonthy is an awesome host with his hospitality. We really enjoyed own time in Amsterdam. Definitely, go back and stay there. The place was amazing and cosy. Love it

The place was clean and had all the right touches to welcome a traveler to the town.
Perfect for a weekend away.
Location was right in the heart of town and we could walk to most things.
The host Jonthy was very responsive and super helpful with directions in getting around town.
We will definitely stay here again.

We loved this place, the bed was amazing & the whole space was just so
Nice & chic! Jonthy was a fab host & welcomed us with warmth. We loved staying here & would love to come back again. Thanks so much

Lovely flat. High ceilings, well equipped kitchen, bright and very comfortable. Jonthy was always friendly and available, checkin / checkout seamless, and he was flexible when we needed an extension as well as late check out. Highly recommended!
The location is awesome and the flat spacious. We loved the big comfortable bed, the great coffee, the warmth and the excellent communication.
Reinier's place was absolutely fantastic! It was spot clean and had all the amenities you may need. The bed is very comfortable and the apartment is quiet at night. Highly recommended!
Great place, and good location.  Easy access to everything.
Thank you for letting us stay in your beautiful home! It was the perfect spot to wind down after days of exploring beautiful Holland!!!

Lovely flat with great location. I enjoyed staying in this flat. Felt like home. It has everything you expect from a proper flat. only few minutes walking distance away from Hoofddorpplein where you will find many buses and trams that will suit you. There is a supermarket just couple of minutes walking distance away.

Reiniers and Kates apartment is perfect for a couple. It's very light and there's more than enough space including a full kitchen,... The apartment is located in a quieter area of the city with lots of small cafÃ©s and restaurants around it. Getting into the city by tram is no problem at all and Vondelpark is just 10 min by foot away. We can fully recommend Reiniers apartment.
Very clean, well priced, easy access to the city centre via team and friendly and communicative host

The place is cosy, comfy and very clean. I really love the decoration as it made me feel like home. The host is also very friendly and helpful. And it is located in the good location and very easy to travel to the city centre. I really recommend this place to stay. :)
Very clean, very helpful and well priced would recommend to anyone who is looking for somewhere nice to stay

Myrthe was a very attentive host. She responded quickly to emails and let us check in early, as well as store our luggage so we could explore more of Amsterdam before departing. She also provided suggestions on things to do, restaurants and taxi service. Her accommodations were very comfortable and clean. Perfect for a couple of nights stay in Amsterdam!

It was a perfect stay, Myrthe was very receptive to every question we had and she gave a lot of recomendations of everything to make our stay PERFECT. The access to Metro was very easy so the location is just perfect for the excellent price.

A lovely, bright and cheerful space, very convenient for bus and trams. The apartment is very nicely decorated but still cosy and comfortable, and was perfect for 2 adults and 2 children to share. The stairs are a bit daunting - not a place for anyone with mobility issues - but the location was very peaceful and quiet. The neighbourhood has many nice restaurants - with kids in tow we especially liked Mojo on the canal and pastry breakfasts at Kwekkeboom. Oosterpark and the Tropen Museum are just a short walk away.

Alojamiento ubicado en una zona tranquila, a 10 minutos en bicicleta del centro. Se encuentra restaurantes y supermercados cercanos. Las habitaciones son sÃºper limpias y muy bien decoradas. Myrthe nos brindÃ? siempre su ayuda de manera inmediata .

Wonderful small apartment and very clean. The hike to the 3rd floor was a mission but didn't put us off as we were out doing tourist stuff every day.  Very close to the city and a short hop on the tram.

O interior do apartamento esta todo reformado e bem decorado. A limpeza deixou bem a desejar, porÃ©m a anfitriÃ£ nos explicou que terceiriza esse serviÃ§o e nos pediu desculpa. O prÃ©dio tambÃ©m estava em reforma e nÃ£o fomos avisados com antecedÃªncia. Apartamento no quarto andar, sem elevador.

MyrtheâÄôs place was ideal for our coupleâÄôs week-end. The place was super clean and very nicely decorated. Renting bikes was the best to go to the city center. Ask Myrthe for advice on restaurants, all her recommendations were very good!
Only problem was that there was no spoons or forks and knifes. The host was a bit slow to reply. Enjoyable stay overall tho

Very good place in a very good location. Cafe,  bakery and butchery (delicious meat balls!) on the next corner. Myrthe was very kind and helpful with the directions how to find the place and back to the airport. The apartment was sparkling clean and comfortable, warm. Good coffeee and all you need for a short stay.
Nice apartment! Very clean and modern. Quite, beautiful neighborhood next to the center of Amsterdam. Communication was very good and reliable as well.

We had a lovely stay at Myrthe's. The location of her B & B was great, close to restaurants, grocery stores, bike rental, shops and the tram. Her B & B was very clean and we loved her style. It was great to have the coffee maker and refrigerator.  Myrthe was quick to respond to my messages and provided suggestions of places and things to do while in Amsterdam.

MyrtheâÄôs place was a perfect location for travelling into Amsterdam central via the train station (Amsterdam Muiderpoort) which was only a 10 minute walk away (and then 6 mins on the train direct!)
We found our favourite breakfast spot âÄòBagels and BeansâÄô only a few minutes walk away and the area round the apartment is lovely.
The apartment itself is clean and bright with comfy beds and the shower room/bathroom are clean and nice.
It was really easy to get into the apartment with the lockbox and Myrthe was a great host easy to communicate quickly with.
Thanks for a great stay!
A very satisfying stay, the room was clean, the apartment was in a good location and the host was very friendly!Thank you Myrthe!
Lovely top floor appartment conviniently close to the center!

Lovely little place, comfy beds, good location.
Very basic, but perfect for a short stay.
Myrthe was a lovely host and always present if needed.

Great place for a trip to Amsterdam

This apartment is located close to the Anne Frank House and the Jordaan neighborhood. The whole area is quite touristy, but still pretty and with a good amount of options within walking distance.  The positives: the place has a great view down onto the canal, the heater works well, everything was clean upon arrival, the kitchen was convenient, and communication with the host was good. While the apartment is generally comfortable, there were also a few downsides for us: the drainage in the bathroom (sink and shower) were really slow, the WiFi and the speakers were unreliable initially (although my techie husband was able to fix the issue), the front door locks were difficult, the upstairs neighbor was fairly loud, and the linens were somewhat threadbare.

Das Apartment ist sehr modern eingerichtet und sauber. Die Gastgeberin ist jederzeit ansprechbar und sehr bemÃ?ht WÃ?nsche zu erfÃ?llen oder Probleme zu beseitigen. Was man wissen sollte, aber in der Beschreibung nicht zu erkennen ist. Das Apartment ist ca 25qm groÃü, inklusive der Badzelle mit Dusche. Das Apartment liegt nicht am Wasser. Das Wasser ist ca 80m entfernt und ist vom Apartment nicht zu sehen. Der Blick aus dem Apartment zeigt ein Eingangstor eines FabrikgelÃ?ndes. The apartment is very modern and clean. The hostess is always available and tries very hard to fulfill requests or to solve problems. What you should know, but cannot be seen in the description. The apartment is about 25 square meters, including the bathroom with shower. The apartment is not on the water. The water is about 80m away and cannot be seen from the apartment. The view from the apartment shows an entrance gate to a factory site. The Country Side View shown in the pictures is two plots away and cannot be seen from the apartment. The apartment is located in the departure lane of Schiphol Airport. In the evening, about 12 traffic machines below 1000m fly over the apartment within 30 minutes. The bikes urgently need to be repaired and overhauled. The area is very beautiful and the center of Amsterdam can be reached within 40 minutes by bike after 12 km. The apartment is recommended as long as the location doesn't bother you.
